CVE-2018-0001.title: Juniper Junos Use-After-Free Memory Error in J-Web Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code on the Target System
CVE-2018-0001.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper Junos. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.Cure53 reported this vulnerability.The vendor has assigned PR 1269932 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0001.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2018-0002.title: Juniper Junos Packet Processing Flaw in flowd Lets Remote Users Cause the Target Service to Crash
CVE-2018-0002.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper Junos. A remote user can cause the target service to crash.A remote user can return a specially crafted TCP/IP response packet via unicast IPv4 to trigger a memory corruption error and cause the flowd daemon to crash.Systems with a Service PIC with any ALG enabled are affected.The vendor has assigned PR 1183181 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0002.extra: A remote user can cause the target flowd service to crash.

CVE-2018-0007.title: Juniper Junos LLDP Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service and Remote Authenticated Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2018-0007.body: Some vulnerabilities were reported in Juniper Junos. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system. A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges.A remote user can send specially crafted LLDP packets via a local segment broadcast to trigger a memory corruption error and cause denial of service conditions.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted LLDP packets to gain elevated privileges and take control of the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted LLDP packets via an LLDP proxy through local segment broadcast(s) to trigger a memory corruption error and cause denial of service conditions that may cascade to adjacent devices.Systems that support running LLDP daemons are affected.The vendor has assigned PR 1252823 to these vulnerabilities.UK's National Cyber Security Centre (NCSC) reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-0007.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2018-0008.title: Juniper Junos Commit Script Error Lets Local Physically Local Users Obtain Root Privileges in Certain Cases
CVE-2018-0008.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper Junos. A physically local user can obtain root privileges on the target system in certain cases.A physically local user on the console can gain root access without authenticating after an authenticated administrator has run a commit script containing certain instructions and the system reboots into a "safe mode" authentication state.The vendor has assigned PR 1179601 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0008.extra: A physically local user can obtain root privileges on the target system in certain cases.

CVE-2018-0011.title: Juniper Junos Space Multiple Flaws Let Remote Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information and Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks and Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2018-0011.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Juniper Junos Space. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.A local user can gain elevated privileges on the target system [CVE-2018-0012].A remote user can send a specially crafted request to cause the target system to include a file and disclose potentially sensitive information on the target system [CVE-2018-0013].The management interface does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2018-0011]. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Juniper Junos Space management interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The team at cyberhouse.ge reported the file inclusion vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0011.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Juniper Junos Space management interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the interface, or take actions on the interface acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-0013.title: Juniper Junos Space Multiple Flaws Let Remote Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information and Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks and Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2018-0013.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Juniper Junos Space. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.A local user can gain elevated privileges on the target system [CVE-2018-0012].A remote user can send a specially crafted request to cause the target system to include a file and disclose potentially sensitive information on the target system [CVE-2018-0013].The management interface does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2018-0011]. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Juniper Junos Space management interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The team at cyberhouse.ge reported the file inclusion vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0013.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Juniper Junos Space management interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the interface, or take actions on the interface acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-0014.title: Juniper ScreenOS Etherleak Flaw Lets Remote Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information from Unpadded Ethernet Packets
CVE-2018-0014.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper ScreenOS. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.The system does not pad unused portions of Ethernet packets. A remote user on the local network that can monitor the packets can obtain potentially sensitive information from fragments of system memory that are included in the Ethernet packets.The vendor has assigned PR 1281648 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0014.extra: A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.

CVE-2018-0017.title: Juniper Junos Processing Flaw in NAT-PT Function Lets Remote Users Cause the Target Service to Crash
CVE-2018-0017.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper Junos. A remote user can cause the target service to crash.A remote user can send a specially crafted valid IPv6 packet to trigger a flaw in the Network Address Translation - Protocol Translation (NAT-PT) function and cause the target flowd service to crash.The vendor has assigned PR 1261863 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0017.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to crash.

CVE-2018-0018.title: Juniper Junos SRX Series IDP Policy Compilation Flaw Lets Remote Users Bypass the Firewall
CVE-2018-0018.body: A vulnerability reported in Juniper Junos. A remote user can bypass security controls on the target system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted packets when IDP policies are being compiled to bypass the firewall and access resources on the target system or network.Systems with IDP policies applied to one or more rules are affected.The vendor has assigned PR 1151743 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0018.extra: A remote user can bypass the firewall to access hosts or resources on the protected network.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.

CVE-2018-0019.title: Juniper Junos SNMP Processing Flaw in SNMP MIB-II Subagent Daemon Lets Remote Users Cause the Target Service to Crash
CVE-2018-0019.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper Junos. A remote user can cause the target service to crash.A remote user can cause the target SNMP MIB-II subagent daemon (mib2d) to crash, preventing access via SNMP.Systems with SNMP mib2d enabled are affected.Routing, switching, and firewall functions are not affected.The vendor has assigned PR 1241134 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0019.extra: A remote user can cause the target mib2d service to crash.

CVE-2018-0020.title: Juniper Junos BGP UPDATE Processing Bug Lets Remote Users Cause the Target 'rpd' Service to Crash
CVE-2018-0020.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper Junos. A remote user can cause the target service to crash.A remote user can send a specially crafted BGP UPDATE to cause the target routing process daemon (rpd) to crash and restart.The vendor has assigned PR 1299199 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0020.extra: A remote user can cause the target rpd service to crash and restart.

CVE-2018-0024.title: Juniper Junos Shell Privilege Management Flaw Lets Local Users Obtain Root Privileges
CVE-2018-0024.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper Junos. A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.A local unprivileged user can exploit a shell privilege management flaw to gain full control of the target system.The EX Series, QFX3500, QFX3600, QFX5100, and SRX Series platforms are affected.The vendor has assigned PR 1004217 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0024.extra: A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.

CVE-2018-0027.title: Juniper Junos RSVP PATH Processing Bug Lets Remote Users Cause the Target 'rpd' Service to Crash
CVE-2018-0027.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper Junos. A remote user can cause the target routing protocol daemon to crash.A remote user can send a specially crafted RSVP PATH message to an interface that has RSVP enabled to cause the target routing protocol daemon (RPD) to hang or crash. As a result, routing updates will not be processed.The vendor has assigned PR 1214350 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0027.extra: A remote user can cause the target routing protocol daemon to crash.

CVE-2018-0032.title: Juniper Junos BGP UPDATE Processing Bug Lets Remote Users Cause the Target 'rpd' Service to Crash
CVE-2018-0032.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper Junos. A remote user can cause the target service to crash.A remote user can send a specially crafted BGP UPDATE to cause the target routing process daemon (RPD) to crash and restart.The vendor has assigned PR 1327708 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0032.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to crash and restart.

CVE-2018-0034.title: Juniper Junos IPv6 DHCP Processing Bug Lets Remote Users Cause the Target JDHCPD Service to Crash
CVE-2018-0034.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper Junos. A remote user can cause the target service to crash.A remote user can send a specially crafted IPv6 packet to the target system to cause the target JDHCPD service to crash.Systems configured for IPv6 DHCP processing using the JDHCPD daemon are affected.The vendor has assigned PR 1334230 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0034.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to crash.

CVE-2018-0037.title: Juniper Junos BGP NOTIFICATION Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code on the Target System
CVE-2018-0037.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper Junos. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted BGP NOTIFICATION messages to the target device to cause the target routing protocol daemon (RPD) process to crash or execute arbitrary code on the target system.The vendor has assigned PR 1340689 to this vulnerability.Internet2 and The Indiana University GlobalNOC reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0037.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2018-0043.title: Juniper Junos MPLS Processing Bug Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code on the Target System
CVE-2018-0043.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper Junos. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted MPLS packet to trigger a flaw in the routing protocol daemon (RPD) and cause the RPD to crash or execute arbitrary code on the target system.IPv4 and IPv6 are attack vectors.The vendor has assigned PR 1328058 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0043.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2018-0045.title: Juniper Junos Draft-Rosen MVPN Control Processing Bug Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code on the Target System
CVE-2018-0045.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper Junos. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted Draft-Rosen MVPN control packet to cause the target routing protocol daemon (RPD) to crash and restart or potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system.Systems affected are configured for Draft-Rosen multicast virtual private network (MVPN) and are multicast-enabled and configured to use Protocol Independent Multicast (PIM) protocol within the VPN.A remote user from the PE device within the MPLS domain that can forward IP multicast traffic in the core can trigger this flaw.The vendor has assigned PR 1339567 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0045.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2018-0046.title: Juniper Junos Space Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-0046.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper Junos Space. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Juniper Junos Space software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vendor has assigned PRs 1337619 and 1337619 to these vulnerabilities.Marcel Bilal from IT-Dienstleistungszentrum Berlin reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0046.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Juniper Junos Space software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-0047.title: Juniper Junos Space Security Director Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-0047.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper Junos Space Security Director. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Juniper Junos Space software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vendor has assigned PR 1337620 to this vulnerability.Marcel Bilal of IT-Dienstleistungszentrum Berlin reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0047.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Juniper Junos Space Security Director software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-0049.title: Juniper Junos MPLS Null Pointer Dereference Lets Remote Users Cause the Target System to Crash
CVE-2018-0049.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper Junos. A remote user can cause the target system to crash.A remote user can send a specially crafted MPLS packet on a particular type of interface to trigger a null pointer dereference and cause the kernel to crash.The vendor has assigned PR 1380862 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0049.extra: A remote user can cause the target system to crash.

CVE-2018-0050.title: Juniper Junos MPLS RSVP Processing Bug Lets Remote Users Cause the Target System to Crash
CVE-2018-0050.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper Junos. A remote user can cause the target system to crash.A remote user can send a specially crafted Routing Protocol Daemon (RPD) RSVP message via IPv4 to cause the target RPD to crash.Versions prior to 14.1R1 are not affected.The vendor has assigned PR 1087100 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0050.extra: A remote user can cause the target system to crash.

CVE-2018-0051.title: Juniper Junos MS-PIC/MS-MIC/MS-DPC/RSX SIP Application Layer Gateway Processing Bug Lets Remote Users Cause the Target Service to Crash
CVE-2018-0051.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper Junos. A remote user can cause the target service to crash.A remote user can send specially crafted SIP application layer gateway (ALG) data to cause the target MS-PIC, MS-MIC, MS-MPC, MS-DPC, or SRX flow daemon (flowd) process to crash.Systems with NAT or stateful firewall configuration combined with the SIP ALG enabled are affected.The vendor has assigned PR 1326394 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0051.extra: A remote user can cause the target SIP ALG service to crash.

CVE-2018-0052.title: Juniper Junos Undocumented RSH Account Lets Remote Authenticated Users Execute Arbitrary Code With Root Privileges on the Target System
CVE-2018-0052.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper Junos. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote authenticated user can enable the RSH service and if the PAM authentication is disabled, a remote authenticated user can obtain root access on the target system.When RSH is enabled, the device listens to RSH connections on port 514, except on FreeBSD 10+ versions.The vendor has assigned PR 1288932 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0052.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2018-0053.title: Juniper Junos vSRX Series Lets Physically Local Users Bypass Login Restrictions
CVE-2018-0053.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper Junos. A local user can bypass security restrictions.A local user can bypass authentication controls during the initial boot sequence to gain full control of the target system.The vendor has assigned PR 1078011 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0053.extra: A physicall local user can bypass login controls on the target system.

CVE-2018-0055.title: Juniper Junos DHCPv6 to Broadband Edge (BBE) Processing Bug Let Remote Users Cause the Target 'jdhcpd' Service to Crash
CVE-2018-0055.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper Junos. A remote user can cause the target 'jdhcpd' service to crash.A remote user can send a specially crafted DHCPv6 message to a device configured as a DHCP server in a Broadband Edge (BBE) environment to cause the target 'jdhcpd' service to restart.The vendor has assigned PR 1368377 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0055.extra: A remote user can cause the target 'jdhcpd' service to restart.

CVE-2018-0056.title: Juniper Junos MX Series 'l2-backhaul VPN' Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2018-0056.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper Junos MX Series. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote user can cause a Layer 2 Address Learning Daemon (L2ALD) daemon to crash when attempting to delete the duplicate MAC address when the particular entry is not found in the internal MAC address table.MX Series devices with l2-backhaul VPN configured are affected.The vendor has assigned PR 1338688 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0056.extra: A remote user can cause certain denial of service conditions.

CVE-2018-0060.title: Juniper Junos DHCP Processing Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2018-0060.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper Junos. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote user can exploit an input validation flaw in the device control daemon process (dcd) when the target device requests an IP address and address mask for itself.Junos devices configured to use DHCP are affected.The vendor has assigned PR 1082817 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0060.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2018-0062.title: Juniper Junos J-Web Service Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2018-0062.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper Junos. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted J-Web service data to prevent other users from authenticating with or performing J-Web operations.The vendor has assigned PR 1264695 to this vulnerability.Alex Chash from SecureCom Limited reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0062.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2018-0087.title: Cisco Web Security Appliance FTP Authentication Bug Lets Remote Users Gain FTP Access to the Target System
CVE-2018-0087.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Web Security Appliance (WSA). A remote user can gain FTP access to the target system.A remote user with a valid username can connect to the management IP address and exploit an FTP user credential validation flaw to upload or download FTP-accessible files on the target system.Cisco AsyncOS version 10.5.1 for WSA Software is affected.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCvf74281 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0087.extra: A remote user can gain FTP access to the target system.

CVE-2018-0091.title: Cisco Identity Services Engine Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-0091.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Identity Services Engine. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The web-based management interface does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Cisco Identity Services Engine interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCvf73922 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0091.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Cisco Identity Services Engine interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the interface, or take actions on the interface acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-0093.title: Cisco Web Security Appliance Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-0093.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Web Security Appliance. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The web-based management interface does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Cisco Web Security Appliance interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCvf37392 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0093.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Cisco Web Security Appliance interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the interface, or take actions on the interface acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-0107.title: Cisco Prime Service Catalog Access Control Flaw Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks
CVE-2018-0107.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Prime Service Catalog. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.A remote user can create a specially crafted HTML page or URL that, when loaded by the target authenticated user, will take actions on the target interface acting as the target user.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCvg30313 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0107.extra: A remote user can take actions on the target system acting as the target authenticated user.

CVE-2018-0109.title: Cisco WebEx Meetings Server Flaw Lets Remote Authenticated Root Users View Shared Secrets on the Target System
CVE-2018-0109.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco WebEx Meetings Server. A remote authenticated user can obtain shared secrets on the target system.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted data to view shared secrets on the target system.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCvg42664 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0109.extra: A remote authenticated root user can obtain shared secrets on the target system.

CVE-2018-0111.title: Cisco WebEx Meetings Server Flaw Lets Remote Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information on the Target System
CVE-2018-0111.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco WebEx Meetings Server. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted request to view potentially sensitive information on the target system.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCvg46806 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0111.extra: A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.

CVE-2018-0112.title: Cisco WebEx Meetings Server File Processing Flaw Lets Remote Authenticated Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-0112.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco WebEx Meetings Server. A remote authenticated user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote authenticated user can create a specially crafted Flash ('.swf') file that, when loaded by the target meeting attendee user, will trigger an input validation flaw and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.Cisco WebEx Business Suite clients, Cisco WebEx Meetings, and Cisco WebEx Meetings Server are affected.The vendor has assigned bug IDs CSCvg19384 and CSCvi10746 to this vulnerability.Alexandros Zacharis of ENISA reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0112.extra: A remote authenticated user can create content that, when loaded by the target meeting attendee user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2018-0113.title: Cisco UCS Central Input Validation Flaw in an Operations Script Lets Remote Authenticated Users Execute Arbitrary Commands on the Target System
CVE-2018-0113.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco UCS Central. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary commands on the target system.A remote authenticated user can send a specially crafted request to the user interface to trigger an input validation flaw in an operations script and execute arbitrary shell commands on the target system. The commands will run with the privileges of the daemon user.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCve70825 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0113.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary commands on the target system.

CVE-2018-0115.title: Cisco ASR 5000 Series Router StartOS CLI Input Validation Flaw Lets Local Users Obtain Root Privileges
CVE-2018-0115.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco ASR 5000 Series Router. A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.A local user can supply specially crafted arguments to trigger an input validation flaw in the Cisco StarOS command line interface and execute arbitrary commands on the target system with root privileges.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCvf93332 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0115.extra: A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.

CVE-2018-0118.title: Cisco Unified Communications Manager Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-0118.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Unified Communications Manager. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The web-based management interface does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Cisco Unified Communications Manager software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCvg51264 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0118.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Cisco Unified Communications Manager interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-0120.title: Cisco Unified Communications Manager Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Authenticated Users Inject SQL Commands
CVE-2018-0120.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Unified Communications Manager. A remote authenticated user can inject SQL commands.The web framework does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote authenticated user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute SQL commands on the underlying database. This can be exploited to determine the presence of certain values in the database.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCvg74810 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0120.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.

CVE-2018-0122.title: Cisco ASR 5000 Series Router CLI Input Validation Flaw Lets Local Users Overwrite Files in Flash Memory on the Target System
CVE-2018-0122.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco ASR 5000 Series Router. A local user can overwrite files on the target system.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCvf93335 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0122.extra: A local administrator user can overwrite files in flash memory on the target system.

CVE-2018-0123.title: Cisco IOS/IOS XE Input Validation Bug in Diagnostic Shell Lets Local Users Overwrite System Files on the Target System
CVE-2018-0123.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco IOS/IOS XE. A local user can overwrite system files on the target system.A local user on the diagnostic shell can supply specially crafted diagnostic shell commands to exploit an input validation flaw and overwrite ostensibly restricted system files.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCvg41950 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0123.extra: A local user can overwrite system files on the target system.

CVE-2018-0125.title: Cisco Small Business RV132W/RV134W Routers Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code on the Target System
CVE-2018-0125.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Small Business RV132W/RV134W routers. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted HTTP request to the target system to exploit an input validation flaw and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with root privileges.The Cisco RV132W ADSL2+ Wireless-N VPN and RV134W VDSL2 Wireless-AC VPN Routers are affected.The vendor has assigned bug IDs CSCvg92737 and CSCvh60170 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0125.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code with root privileges on the target system.

CVE-2018-0132.title: Cisco IOS XR Routing Update Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2018-0132.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco IOS XR. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.The system does not properly process extremely long routing updates. A remote user can send a large routing update to trigger an inconsistency between the forwarding information base (FIB) and the routing information base (RIB) and cause denial of service conditions.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCus84718 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0132.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2018-0135.title: Cisco Unified Communications Manager Unspecified Input Validation Bug Lets Remote Authenticated Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2018-0135.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Unified Communications Manager. A remote authenticated user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted data to trigger an input validation flaw and obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCvf17644 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0135.extra: A remote authenticated user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.

CVE-2018-0144.title: Cisco Prime Data Center Network Manager Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-0144.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Prime Data Center Network Manager. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The web-based management interface does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Cisco Prime Data Center Network Manager software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCvg81051 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0144.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Cisco Prime Data Center Network Manager software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-0148.title: Cisco UCS Director Access Control Flaw Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks
CVE-2018-0148.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco UCS Director. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.A remote user can create a specially crafted HTML page or URL that, when loaded by the target authenticated user, will take actions on the target web-based management interface acting as the target user.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCvf71929 to this vulnerability.Praveen Kumaresh of PwC SDC Bangalore and Ekzhin Ear of NCI Agency Cyber Security separately reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0148.extra: A remote user can take actions on the target system acting as the target authenticated user.

CVE-2018-0149.title: Cisco Unified Computing System Director Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-0149.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Unified Computing System Director. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The web-based management interface does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Cisco Unified Computing System Director interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCvh12994 to this vulnerability.Ear Ekzhin reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0149.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Cisco Unified Computing System Director interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the interface, or take actions on the interface acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-0151.title: Cisco IOS/IOS XE QoS Buffer Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-0151.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco IOS and IOS XE. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to UDP port 18999 on the target system to trigger a buffer overflow in the quality of service (QoS) subsystem and execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges on the target system.Traffic transiting a device is not an attack vector.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCvf73881 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0151.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2018-0156.title: Cisco IOS/IOS XE Smart Install Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Cause the Target System to Reload
CVE-2018-0156.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco IOS and IOS XE. A remote user can cause the target system to reload.A remote user can send a specially crafted Smart Install packet to the target device on TCP port 4786 to trigger an input validation flaw and cause the target system to reload.The vendor has assigned bug IDs CSCvd36820 and CSCvd40673 to this vulnerability.This vulnerability was found during internal security testing.
CVE-2018-0156.extra: A remote user can cause the target system to reload.

CVE-2018-0159.title: Cisco IOS/IOS XE IKE Processing Flaws Let Remote Users Cause the Target System to Reload
CVE-2018-0159.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco IOS and IOS XE. A remote user can cause the target system to reload.A remote user can send specially crafted Internet Key Exchange Version 1 (IKEv1) packets to the target system during an IKE negotiation to trigger an input validation flaw and cause the target system to reload [CVE-2018-0159].A remote user can send specially crafted IKEv2 packets to the target system to trigger a memory leak and cause the target system to reload [CVE-2018-0158].The vendor has assigned bug IDs CSCuj73916 and CSCvf22394 to these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-0159.extra: A remote user can cause the target system to reload.

CVE-2018-0167.title: Cisco IOS/IOS XE/IOS XR Link Layer Discovery Protocol Bugs Let Remote Users on the Local Network Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2018-0167.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco IOS, IOS XE, and IOS XR. A remote user can gain elevated privileges.A remote authenticated user on the local network can send a specially crafted Link Layer Discovery Protocol (LLDP) data unit (PDU) to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges on the target system [CVE-2018-0167].A remote authenticated user on the local network can send a specially crafted LLDP PDU that, when a local user executes a specific show command via the command line interface, will trigger a format string error and execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges on the target system [CVE-2018-0175].The vendor has assigned bug IDs CSCuo17183, CSCvd73487, and CSCvd73664 to these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-0167.extra: A remote user on the local network can gain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2018-0169.title: Cisco IOS XE Command Line Interface Validation Bugs Let Local Users Obtain Root Privileges
CVE-2018-0169.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco IOS XE. A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.A local user with user EXEC mode privileges (level 1 privileges) can send command line interface commands with specially crafted arguments to execute arbitrary commands on the underlying operating system with root privileges.The vendor has assigned bug IDs CSCtw85441, CSCtw85441CSCus42252, CSCus42252CSCuv95370, and CSCuv95370 to these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-0169.extra: A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.

CVE-2018-0170.title: Cisco IOS XE Umbrella Integration Memory Free Error Lets Remote Users Cause the Target System to Reload
CVE-2018-0170.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco IOS XE. A remote user can cause the target system to reload.A remote user can send specially crafted IP packets to the target device to trigger a freed memory access error in the Cisco Umbrella Integration feature and cause the target system to reload.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCvb86327 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0170.extra: A remote user can cause the target system to reload.

CVE-2018-0171.title: Cisco IOS/IOS XE Buffer Overflow in Processing Smart Install Packets Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-0171.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco IOS and IOS XE. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted Smart Install message to TCP port 4786 to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.Systems that have the Smart Install client feature enabled are affected.The vendor has assigned bug IDs CSCvd36820 and CSCvg76186 to this vulnerability.[Editor's note: On April 9, 2018, the vendor clarified that this vulnerability is not being actively exploited. However, the vendor also reported that a general "protocol misuse issue" in the Cisco Smart Install Client is being actively exploited on systems that have the feature enabled, not specific to any individual vulnerability in the Smart Install feature.]George Nosenko (via GeekPwn) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0171.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2018-0172.title: Cisco IOS/IOS XE DHCP Option 82 Processing Bugs Let Remote Users Cause the Target System to Reload
CVE-2018-0172.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco IOS and IOS XE. A remote user can cause the target system to reload.A remote DHCP relay agent can return DHCPv4 packets with specially crafted DHCP option 82 data to trigger a heap overflow and cause the target system to reload [CVE-2018-0172].A remote DHCP server can return DHCPv4 DHCPOFFER messages with specially crafted DHCP option 82 data to trigger an error and cause the target system to reload [CVE-2018-0173].A remote DHCP relay agent can return DHCPv4 packets with specially crafted DHCP option 82 data to trigger an input validation flaw and cause the target system to reload [CVE-2018-0174].The vendor has assigned bug IDs CSCvg62730, CSCvg62754, and CSCuh91645 to these vulnerabilities.Tenable reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-0172.extra: A remote user can cause the target system to reload.

CVE-2018-0173.title: Cisco IOS/IOS XE DHCP Option 82 Processing Bugs Let Remote Users Cause the Target System to Reload
CVE-2018-0173.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco IOS and IOS XE. A remote user can cause the target system to reload.A remote DHCP relay agent can return DHCPv4 packets with specially crafted DHCP option 82 data to trigger a heap overflow and cause the target system to reload [CVE-2018-0172].A remote DHCP server can return DHCPv4 DHCPOFFER messages with specially crafted DHCP option 82 data to trigger an error and cause the target system to reload [CVE-2018-0173].A remote DHCP relay agent can return DHCPv4 packets with specially crafted DHCP option 82 data to trigger an input validation flaw and cause the target system to reload [CVE-2018-0174].The vendor has assigned bug IDs CSCvg62730, CSCvg62754, and CSCuh91645 to these vulnerabilities.Tenable reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-0173.extra: A remote user can cause the target system to reload.

CVE-2018-0174.title: Cisco IOS/IOS XE DHCP Option 82 Processing Bugs Let Remote Users Cause the Target System to Reload
CVE-2018-0174.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco IOS and IOS XE. A remote user can cause the target system to reload.A remote DHCP relay agent can return DHCPv4 packets with specially crafted DHCP option 82 data to trigger a heap overflow and cause the target system to reload [CVE-2018-0172].A remote DHCP server can return DHCPv4 DHCPOFFER messages with specially crafted DHCP option 82 data to trigger an error and cause the target system to reload [CVE-2018-0173].A remote DHCP relay agent can return DHCPv4 packets with specially crafted DHCP option 82 data to trigger an input validation flaw and cause the target system to reload [CVE-2018-0174].The vendor has assigned bug IDs CSCvg62730, CSCvg62754, and CSCuh91645 to these vulnerabilities.Tenable reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-0174.extra: A remote user can cause the target system to reload.

CVE-2018-0176.title: Cisco IOS XE Command Line Interface Validation Bugs Let Local Users Obtain Root Privileges
CVE-2018-0176.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco IOS XE. A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.A local user with user EXEC mode privileges (level 1 privileges) can send command line interface commands with specially crafted arguments to execute arbitrary commands on the underlying operating system with root privileges.The vendor has assigned bug IDs CSCtw85441, CSCtw85441CSCus42252, CSCus42252CSCuv95370, and CSCuv95370 to these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-0176.extra: A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.

CVE-2018-0199.title: Cisco Jabber for Windows Input Validation Flaw in Web Page Attributes Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-0199.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Jabber for Windows. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The Cisco Jabber Client Framework (JCF) does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in web page attributes before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Cisco Jabber for Windows interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Cisco Jabber for Mac is also affected.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCve53989 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0199.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Cisco Jabber for Windows interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

The code will originate from the site running the Cisco Prime Service Catalog software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCvh65713 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0200.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Cisco Prime Service Catalog software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-0201.title: Cisco Jabber for Windows Input Validation Flaw in Processing Embedded Media Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-0201.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Jabber for Windows. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The Cisco Jabber Client Framework (JCF) does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input during web page generation before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Cisco Jabber for Windows interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.This vulnerability can be exploited via embedded media in an instant message.Cisco Jabber for Mac is also affected.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCve54001 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0201.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Cisco Jabber for Windows interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-0205.title: Cisco Prime Collaboration Provisioning Tool Input Validation Flaw in Database Fields Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-0205.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Prime Collaboration Provisioning Tool. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in the database before displaying the input. A remote user can inject specially crafted data into the database to cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Cisco Prime Collaboration software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCvd86609 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0205.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Cisco Prime Collaboration software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-0206.title: Cisco Unified Communications Manager Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks

A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The web-based management interface does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. CVE-2018-0206.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Cisco Unified Communications Manager (CallManager) software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-0210.title: Cisco Prime Data Center Network Manager Access Control Flaw Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks
CVE-2018-0210.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Prime Data Center Network Manager. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.A remote user can create a specially crafted HTML page or URL that, when loaded by the target authenticated user, will take actions on the target web-based management interface acting as the target user.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCvg88291 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0210.extra: A remote user can take actions on the target system acting as the target authenticated user.

CVE-2018-0211.title: Cisco Identity Services Engine Multiple Bugs Let Local Users Deny Service, Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting and Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks, and Let Remote Authenticated Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2018-0211.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco Identity Services Engine. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks. A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system. A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.A local user with administrative privileges can supply a specially crafted command line interface (CLI) command to trigger an input validation flaw and cause denial of service conditions on the target system [CVE-2018-0211]. A manual reboot is required to return the system to normal operations.The web-based management interface does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2018-0212]. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Cisco Identity Services Engine interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote authenticated user can send a specially crafted HTTP request to trigger an input validation flaw and reset credentials on the target system [CVE-2018-0213].A local user can supply a specially crafted CLI command to trigger an input validation flaw and execute arbitrary commands on the host operating system with the privileges of the local user [CVE-2018-0214].A remote user can create a specially crafted HTML page or URL that, when loaded by the target authenticated user, will take actions on the target web-based management interface acting as the target user [CVE-2018-0215, CVE-2018-0216].A local user with administrator privileges can supply a specially crafted CLI configuration command to inject underlying operating system commands or cause the user session to hang or disconnect [CVE-2018-0221].=The vendor has assigned Bug IDs CSCvf63414, CSCvh51992, CSCvf69963, CSCvf69753, CSCvf49844, CSCuv32863, CSCvf69805, and CSCvg95479 to these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-0211.extra: A remote user can take actions on the target system acting as the target authenticated user.A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Cisco Identity Services Engine interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the interface, or take actions on the interface acting as the target user.

As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote authenticated user can send a specially crafted HTTP request to trigger an input validation flaw and reset credentials on the target system [CVE-2018-0213].A local user can supply a specially crafted CLI command to trigger an input validation flaw and execute arbitrary commands on the host operating system with the privileges of the local user [CVE-2018-0214].A remote user can create a specially crafted HTML page or URL that, when loaded by the target authenticated user, will take actions on the target web-based management interface acting as the target user [CVE-2018-0215, CVE-2018-0216].A local user with administrator privileges can supply a specially crafted CLI configuration command to inject underlying operating system commands or cause the user session to hang or disconnect [CVE-2018-0221].=The vendor has assigned Bug IDs CSCvf63414, CSCvh51992, CSCvf69963, CSCvf69753, CSCvf49844, CSCuv32863, CSCvf69805, and CSCvg95479 to these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-0215.extra: A remote user can take actions on the target system acting as the target authenticated user.A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Cisco Identity Services Engine interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the interface, or take actions on the interface acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-0216.title: Cisco Identity Services Engine Multiple Bugs Let Local Users Deny Service, Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting and Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks, and Let Remote Authenticated Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2018-0216.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco Identity Services Engine. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks. A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system. A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.A local user with administrative privileges can supply a specially crafted command line interface (CLI) command to trigger an input validation flaw and cause denial of service conditions on the target system [CVE-2018-0211]. A manual reboot is required to return the system to normal operations.The web-based management interface does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2018-0212]. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Cisco Identity Services Engine interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote authenticated user can send a specially crafted HTTP request to trigger an input validation flaw and reset credentials on the target system [CVE-2018-0213].A local user can supply a specially crafted CLI command to trigger an input validation flaw and execute arbitrary commands on the host operating system with the privileges of the local user [CVE-2018-0214].A remote user can create a specially crafted HTML page or URL that, when loaded by the target authenticated user, will take actions on the target web-based management interface acting as the target user [CVE-2018-0215, CVE-2018-0216].A local user with administrator privileges can supply a specially crafted CLI configuration command to inject underlying operating system commands or cause the user session to hang or disconnect [CVE-2018-0221].=The vendor has assigned Bug IDs CSCvf63414, CSCvh51992, CSCvf69963, CSCvf69753, CSCvf49844, CSCuv32863, CSCvf69805, and CSCvg95479 to these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-0216.extra: A remote user can take actions on the target system acting as the target authenticated user.A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Cisco Identity Services Engine interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the interface, or take actions on the interface acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-0217.title: Cisco ASR 5000 Series Router StartOS CLI Input Validation Flaws Let Local Users Obtain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2018-0217.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco ASR 5000 Series Routers. A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.A local user with administrator privileges can supply specially crafted command line interface (CLI) command arguments to exploit an input validation flaw in the Cisco StarOS operating system and execute arbitrary commands on the target system [CVE-2018-0217, CVE-2018-0224].CVE-2018-0224 can be exploited to obtain root privileges.The vendor has assigned bug IDs CSCvg29441 and CSCvg38807 to these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-0217.extra: A local administrative user can obtain root privileges on the target system.

CVE-2018-0219.title: Cisco UCS Director Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-0219.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Unified Computing System (UCS) Director. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The web-based management interface does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Cisco UCS Director interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCvg86518 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0219.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Cisco UCS Director interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the interface, or take actions on the interface acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-0221.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco Identity Services Engine. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks. A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system. A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Cisco Identity Services Engine interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote authenticated user can send a specially crafted HTTP request to trigger an input validation flaw and reset credentials on the target system [CVE-2018-0213].A local user can supply a specially crafted CLI command to trigger an input validation flaw and execute arbitrary commands on the host operating system with the privileges of the local user [CVE-2018-0214].A remote user can create a specially crafted HTML page or URL that, when loaded by the target authenticated user, will take actions on the target web-based management interface acting as the target user [CVE-2018-0215, CVE-2018-0216].A local user with administrator privileges can supply a specially crafted CLI configuration command to inject underlying operating system commands or cause the user session to hang or disconnect [CVE-2018-0221].=The vendor has assigned Bug IDs CSCvf63414, CSCvh51992, CSCvf69963, CSCvf69753, CSCvf49844, CSCuv32863, CSCvf69805, and CSCvg95479 to these vulnerabilities.
