CVE-2018-0955.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Flaws Let Remote Users Bypass UMCI Policy and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-0955.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Internet Explorer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can bypass security controls on the target system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-0955].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-8114, CVE-2018-8122]. This can be exploited via an embedded ActiveX control marked "safe for initialization" in an application or Microsoft Office document that hosts the Internet Explorer (IE) rendering engine. Version 11 is affected.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will bypass Device Guard User Mode Code Integrity (UMCI) policies on the target user's system [CVE-2018-8126]. Version 11 is affected.Matt Nelson (@enigma0x3) of SpecterOps and Yuki Chen of Qihoo 360 Vulcan Team reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-0955.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can bypass security controls on the target system.

CVE-2018-0957.title: Microsoft Hyper-V Input Validation Flaw Lets Local Guest Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Host System Memory Information
CVE-2018-0957.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Hyper-V. A local user on the guest system can obtain potentially sensitive information from system memory on the host system.A local user on the guest system can run a specially crafted application to trigger an input validation flaw and cause the Hyper-V host operating system to disclose potentially sensitive host system memory information [CVE-2018-0957, CVE-2018-0964].
CVE-2018-0957.extra: A local user on the guest system can obtain potentially sensitive information from system memory on the host system.

CVE-2018-0959.title: Microsoft Hyper-V Input Validation Flaws Let Local Users on a Guest System Gain Elevated Privileges on the Host System
CVE-2018-0959.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Hyper-V. A local user on the guest system can gain elevated privileges on the host system.A local user on the guest system can run a specially crafted application to trigger an input validation flaw and execute arbitrary code on the host system [CVE-2018-0959].A local user on the guest system can send specially crafted vSMB data to trigger an input validation flaw and execute arbitrary code on the host system [CVE-2018-0961].
CVE-2018-0959.extra: A local user on the guest system can gain elevated privileges on the host system.

CVE-2018-0961.title: Microsoft Hyper-V Input Validation Flaws Let Local Users on a Guest System Gain Elevated Privileges on the Host System
CVE-2018-0961.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Hyper-V. A local user on the guest system can gain elevated privileges on the host system.A local user on the guest system can run a specially crafted application to trigger an input validation flaw and execute arbitrary code on the host system [CVE-2018-0959].A local user on the guest system can send specially crafted vSMB data to trigger an input validation flaw and execute arbitrary code on the host system [CVE-2018-0961].
CVE-2018-0961.extra: A local user on the guest system can gain elevated privileges on the host system.

CVE-2018-0965.title: Microsoft Hyper-V Multiple Bugs Let Local Guest System Users Deny Service, Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information, and Cause the Host System to Crash
CVE-2018-0965.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Hyper-V. A local user on the guest system can gain elevated privileges on the host system. A local user on the guest system can cause denial of service conditions on the target system. A local user on the guest system can obtain potentially sensitive information.A local user on the guest system can run a specially crafted application to trigger an input validation error and execute arbitrary code on the target host system [CVE-2018-0965]. Versions 2016 and 10.x are affected.A local user on the guest system can run a specially crafted application to trigger an input validation error and execute arbitrary code on the target host system [CVE-2018-8439].A local user on the guest system can run a specially crafted application to trigger an input validation error and obtain potentially sensitive information from host system memory [CVE-2018-8434].A local user on a guest system can reboot the guest system multiple times until the Windows Hyper-V BIOS loader fails to provide a high-entropy source [CVE-2018-8435].A local privileged user on a guest operating system can send specially crafted data to trigger an error in the Microsoft Hyper-V Network Switch on the host system and cause the host system to crash [CVE-2018-8436, CVE-2018-8437, CVE-2018-8438].Giwan Go, Hyoung-Kee Choi in HIT Lab at Sungkyunkwan University, Niels Ferguson of Microsoft Corporation, Peter Hlavaty (@zer0mem), KeenLab at Tencent, Nick Freeman, and Daniel King (@long123king) of MSRC Microsoft reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-0965.extra: A local user on the guest system can cause denial of service conditions on the target host system.A local user on the guest system can gain elevated privileges on the target host system.A local user on the guest system can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target host system.

CVE-2018-0978.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Multiple Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Bypass Security Controls
CVE-2018-0978.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Internet Explorer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can bypass security controls on the target system.A remote user can create specially crafted web content or a '.url' file that, when loaded by the target user, will bypass the Mark of the Web (MOTW) tagging, causing security controls based on the MOTW tagging to be bypassed [CVE-2018-8113].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-0978, CVE-2018-8249, CVE-2018-8267].Dmitri Kaslov of Telspace Systems (via Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative), Mateusz Garncarek of ING Tech Poland, Piotr Madej of ING Tech Poland, Eric Lawrence, and Scott Bell of Security-Assessment.com reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-0978.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can bypass security controls that are based on the MOTW tagging on the target system.

CVE-2018-0979.title: Microsoft Edge Multiple Object Memory Handling Errors Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2018-0979.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Edge. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error in the Chakra scripting engine and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-0990, CVE-2018-0993, CVE-2018-0994, CVE-2018-0995, CVE-2018-0979, CVE-2018-0980, CVE-2018-1019].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error in the browser and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-1023].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error in the Microsoft Edge PDF Reader to obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system. [CVE-2018-0998].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error and obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system [CVE-2018-0892].Wei of Qihoo 360 Vulcan Team, Yuki Chen of Qihoo 360 Vulcan Team, Liu Long of Qihoo 360Vulcan Team, Lokihardt of Google Project Zero, hungtt28 of Viettel Cyber Security, Abdulrahman Al-Qabandi, and Johnathan Norman - WDG OS Security Team reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-0979.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.

CVE-2018-0980.title: Microsoft Edge Multiple Object Memory Handling Errors Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2018-0980.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Edge. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error in the Chakra scripting engine and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-0990, CVE-2018-0993, CVE-2018-0994, CVE-2018-0995, CVE-2018-0979, CVE-2018-0980, CVE-2018-1019].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error in the browser and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-1023].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error in the Microsoft Edge PDF Reader to obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system. [CVE-2018-0998].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error and obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system [CVE-2018-0892].Wei of Qihoo 360 Vulcan Team, Yuki Chen of Qihoo 360 Vulcan Team, Liu Long of Qihoo 360Vulcan Team, Lokihardt of Google Project Zero, hungtt28 of Viettel Cyber Security, Abdulrahman Al-Qabandi, and Johnathan Norman - WDG OS Security Team reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-0980.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.

CVE-2018-0981.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Object Memory Handling Bugs Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2018-0981.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Internet Explorer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will obtain potentially sensitive information on the target user's system [CVE-2018-0987, CVE-2018-0989, CVE-2018-0981, CVE-2018-1000].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-0988, CVE-2018-0996, CVE-2018-1001]. This can also be exploited via an embedded ActiveX control marked 'safe for initialization' in an application or Microsoft Office document hosting the Internet Explorer (IE) rendering engine.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-0991, CVE-2018-0997, CVE-2018-0870, CVE-2018-1018, CVE-2018-1020].Yuki Chen of Qihoo 360 Vulcan Team, Anonymous (via Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative), Wei of Qihoo 360 Vulcan Team, Genwei Jiang of FireEye, Inc, and hungtt28 of Viettel Cyber Security reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-0981.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will obtain potentially sensitive information on the target user's system.

CVE-2018-0986.title: Microsoft Windows Defender File Processing Memory Corruption Error Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-0986.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Windows Defender. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when scanned by the target Microsoft Malware Protection Engine, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with LocalSystem privileges.Thomas Dullien of Google Project Zero reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-0986.extra: A remote user can create content that, when scanned by the target application, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2018-1000001.title: Glibc Buffer Underflow in __realpath() Lets Local Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-1000001.body: A vulnerability was reported in Glibc. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can trigger a buffer underflow in the __realpath() function in 'stdlib/canonicalize.c' to execute arbitrary code on the target system. This can be exploited against set user id (setuid) root applications to gain root privileges on the target system.The vulnerability occurs due to a change in the processing of pathnames in the getcwd() command introduced in Linux kernel version 2.6.36.The original advisory is available at:https://www.halfdog.net/Security/2017/LibcRealpathBufferUnderflow/halfdog reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-1000001.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2018-1000005.title: cURL HTTP/2 Trailer Processor Out-of-Bound Memory Read Error Lets Remote Users Deny Service or Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2018-1000005.body: A vulnerability was reported in cURL. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted HTTP/2 trailer to trigger an out-of-bounds memory read error and cause the application to crash or potentially sensitive information from services that echo back or otherwise use the trailers.The vendor was notified on January 10, 2018.Zhouyihai Ding reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-1000005.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.

CVE-2018-1000120.title: curl FTP Pathname Heap Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-1000120.body: A vulnerability was reported in curl. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user that can control the paths that curl uses for FTP can create specially crafted path names containing the control characters '%00' to trigger a heap overflow and potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system.Applications configured with '--ftp-method singlecwd' or the libcurl alternative 'CURLOPT_FTP_FILEMETHOD' are affected.The vendor was notified on January 29, 2018.Duy Phan Thanh reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-1000120.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2018-1000121.title: curl Null Pointer Dereference in LDAP URL Processing Lets Remote Users Cause the Target Application to Crash
CVE-2018-1000121.body: A vulnerability was reported in curl. A remote user can cause the target application to crash.A remote server can return a specially crafted redirect to an LDAP URL to trigger a null pointer dereference in ldap_get_attribute_ber() can cause the target application to crash.Applications that allow LDAP URLs are also affected.curl versions built to use OpenLDAP are affected.The vendor was notified on March 6, 2018.Dario Weisser reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-1000121.extra: A remote server can cause the target application to crash.

CVE-2018-1000122.title: curl RTSP URL Processing Buffer Copy Error Lets Remote Users Cause the Target Application to Crash
CVE-2018-1000122.body: A vulnerability was reported in curl. A remote user can cause the target application to crash.A remote user can cause the target application to trigger a buffer copy error in processing RTSP URLs and cause the application to crash or access potentially sensitive information on the target system.The vendor was notified on February 20, 2018.Max Dymond reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-1000122.extra: A remote user can cause the target application to crash.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.

CVE-2018-1000199.title: Linux Kernel ptrace() Error Handling Flaw Lets Local Users Cause Denial of Service Conditions on the Target System
CVE-2018-1000199.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Linux kernel. A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A local user can invoke the modify_user_hw_breakpoint() function to trigger an error handling flaw and cause the kernel to crash.Systems built with hardware breakpoint support (CONFIG_HAVE_HW_BREAKPOINT) are affected.Andy Lutomirski reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-1000199.extra: A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.

CVE-2018-1000300.title: curl FTP Shutdown Response Buffer Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code on the Target System
CVE-2018-1000300.body: A vulnerability was reported in curl. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote server can return specially crafted FTP data to overflow a buffer and potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system.Dario Weisser reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-1000300.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2018-1000301.title: curl RTSP Response Processing Flaw in Curl_http_readwrite_headers() Lets Remote Users Deny Service or Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2018-1000301.body: A vulnerability was reported in curl. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A remote server can return a specially crafted RTSP response to cause the Curl_http_readwrite_headers() function to read beyond the buffer and disclose potentially sensitive information or cause denial of service conditions on the target system.The vendor was notified on March 24, 2018.
CVE-2018-1000301.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.

This can also be exploited via an embedded ActiveX control marked 'safe for initialization' in an application or Microsoft Office document hosting the Internet Explorer (IE) rendering engine.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-0991, CVE-2018-0997, CVE-2018-0870, CVE-2018-1018, CVE-2018-1020].Yuki Chen of Qihoo 360 Vulcan Team, Anonymous (via Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative), Wei of Qihoo 360 Vulcan Team, Genwei Jiang of FireEye, Inc, and hungtt28 of Viettel Cyber Security reported these vulnerabilities.

CVE-2018-1003.title: Microsoft Jet Database Engine Buffer Overflow in Processing Files Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-1003.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Jet Database Engine. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Excel file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow in the Microsoft Jet database engine and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Honggang Ren of Fortinet's FortiGuard Labs reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-1003.extra: A remote user can create an Excel file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2018-1004.title: Windows VBScript Engine Object Memory Handling Flaw Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-1004.body: A vulnerability was reported in Windows VBScript Engine. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user via Internet Explorer (IE), will trigger an object memory handling flaw in the VBScript engine and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system. This can also be exploited via an embedded ActiveX control marked 'safe for initialization' in an application or Microsoft Office document hosting the IE rendering engine.Anonymous (via Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative) and Yuki Chen of Qihoo 360 Vulcan Team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-1004.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2018-1005.title: Microsoft SharePoint Server Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Authenticated Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-1005.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft SharePoint Server. A remote authenticated user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote authenticated user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Microsoft SharePoint software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Ashar Javed of Hyundai AutoEver Europe GmbH reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-1005.extra: A remote authenticated user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Microsoft SharePoint Server software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-10059.title: Cacti Input Validation Flaw in get_current_page() Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-10059.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cacti. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Cacti software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The get_current_page() function in 'lib/functions.php' is affected.andermat8 on github reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-10059.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Cacti software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-10060.title: Cacti Input Validation Flaw in get_current_page() Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-10060.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cacti. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Cacti software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The get_current_page() function in 'lib/functions.php' is affected.andermat8 on github reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-10060.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Cacti software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-10061.title: Cacti Input Validation Flaw in get_current_page() Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-10061.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cacti. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Cacti software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The get_current_page() function in 'lib/functions.php' is affected.andermat8 on github reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-10061.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Cacti software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-1010.title: Windows Font Library and Graphics Components Processing Errors Let Remote Users Deny Service and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-1010.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Windows Font Library and Graphics Components. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an error in the Windows font library in the handling of embedded fonts and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-1010, CVE-2018-1012, CVE-2018-1013, CVE-2018-1015, CVE-2018-1016].A remote user can trigger an object memory handling error and cause the target system to stop responding [CVE-2018-8116].Hossein Lotfi, Secunia Research at Flexera Software, reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-1010.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can cause the target system to stop responding.

CVE-2018-10102.title: WordPress Bugs Let Remote Users Conduct Redirect and Cross-Site Scritping Attacks
CVE-2018-10102.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in WordPress. A remote user can redirect the target user's browser to an arbitrary site. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not use the wp_safe_redirect() function when redirecting the login page and SSL is forced. A remote user may be able to create a URL that, when loaded by the target user, will redirect the target user's browser to an arbitrary site [CVE-2018-10100].The get_the_generator() function does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in the 'version' string before displaying the input in generator tags [CVE-2018-10102]. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the WordPress software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The wp_http_validate_url() function considers 'localhost' as the same host as the server [CVE-2018-10101]. The impact was not specified.xknown of the WordPress Security Team, Nitin Venkatesh (nitstorm), and Garth Mortensen of the WordPress Security Team reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-10102.extra: A remote user can cause the target user's browser to be redirected to an arbitrary web site.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the WordPress software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-1012.title: Windows Font Library and Graphics Components Processing Errors Let Remote Users Deny Service and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-1012.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Windows Font Library and Graphics Components. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an error in the Windows font library in the handling of embedded fonts and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-1010, CVE-2018-1012, CVE-2018-1013, CVE-2018-1015, CVE-2018-1016].A remote user can trigger an object memory handling error and cause the target system to stop responding [CVE-2018-8116].Hossein Lotfi, Secunia Research at Flexera Software, reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-1012.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can cause the target system to stop responding.

CVE-2018-10124.title: Linux Kernel Integer Negation Error Lets Local Users Cause Denial of Service Conditions
CVE-2018-10124.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Linux kernel. A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A local user can supply a specially crafted value to trigger an integer negation error in the kill_something_info() function in 'kernel/signal.c' and cause denial of service conditions on the target system.The impact is compiler and architecture dependent.
CVE-2018-10124.extra: A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.

CVE-2018-1013.title: Windows Font Library and Graphics Components Processing Errors Let Remote Users Deny Service and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-1013.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Windows Font Library and Graphics Components. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an error in the Windows font library in the handling of embedded fonts and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-1010, CVE-2018-1012, CVE-2018-1013, CVE-2018-1015, CVE-2018-1016].A remote user can trigger an object memory handling error and cause the target system to stop responding [CVE-2018-8116].Hossein Lotfi, Secunia Research at Flexera Software, reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-1013.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can cause the target system to stop responding.

CVE-2018-10139.title: Palo Alto PAN-OS Input Validation Flaw in GlobalProtect Gateway Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-10139.body: A vulnerability was reported in Palo Alto PAN-OS. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The GlobalProtect Gateway interface does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Palo Alto PAN-OS interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Systems using PAN-OS GlobalProtect gateway are affected.Brandon Freshour reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-10139.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Palo Alto PAN-OS interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the interface, or take actions on the interface acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-1014.title: Microsoft SharePoint Server Input Validation Flaw in Loading Silverlight Content Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-1014.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft SharePoint Server. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input related to Microsoft Silverlight. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user that does not have Silverlight installed, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Microsoft SharePoint software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to cause the target user to be redirected to an arbitrary site.Flavio Baldassi of Horizon Security reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-1014.extra: A remote user can cause the target user to be redirected to an arbitrary site.

CVE-2018-10140.title: Palo Alto PAN-OS Management Web Interface Bug Lets Remote Authenticated Users Deny Service
CVE-2018-10140.body: A vulnerability was reported in Palo Alto PAN-OS. A remote authenticated user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the management web interface to shutdown all management sessions and cause all logged in users to be redirected to the login page.Mario Aaron Lopez Payes reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-10140.extra: A remote authenticated user can shutdown all management sessions and cause all logged in users to be redirected to the login page.

CVE-2018-1015.title: Windows Font Library and Graphics Components Processing Errors Let Remote Users Deny Service and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-1015.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Windows Font Library and Graphics Components. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an error in the Windows font library in the handling of embedded fonts and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-1010, CVE-2018-1012, CVE-2018-1013, CVE-2018-1015, CVE-2018-1016].A remote user can trigger an object memory handling error and cause the target system to stop responding [CVE-2018-8116].Hossein Lotfi, Secunia Research at Flexera Software, reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-1015.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can cause the target system to stop responding.

CVE-2018-1016.title: Windows Font Library and Graphics Components Processing Errors Let Remote Users Deny Service and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-1016.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Windows Font Library and Graphics Components. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an error in the Windows font library in the handling of embedded fonts and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-1010, CVE-2018-1012, CVE-2018-1013, CVE-2018-1015, CVE-2018-1016].A remote user can trigger an object memory handling error and cause the target system to stop responding [CVE-2018-8116].Hossein Lotfi, Secunia Research at Flexera Software, reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-1016.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can cause the target system to stop responding.

CVE-2018-1018.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Object Memory Handling Bugs Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2018-1018.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Internet Explorer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will obtain potentially sensitive information on the target user's system [CVE-2018-0987, CVE-2018-0989, CVE-2018-0981, CVE-2018-1000].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-0988, CVE-2018-0996, CVE-2018-1001]. This can also be exploited via an embedded ActiveX control marked 'safe for initialization' in an application or Microsoft Office document hosting the Internet Explorer (IE) rendering engine.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-0991, CVE-2018-0997, CVE-2018-0870, CVE-2018-1018, CVE-2018-1020].Yuki Chen of Qihoo 360 Vulcan Team, Anonymous (via Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative), Wei of Qihoo 360 Vulcan Team, Genwei Jiang of FireEye, Inc, and hungtt28 of Viettel Cyber Security reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-1018.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will obtain potentially sensitive information on the target user's system.

CVE-2018-10188.title: phpMyAdmin Access Control Flaw Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks to Execute Arbitrary SQL Commands
CVE-2018-10188.body: A vulnerability was reported in phpMyAdmin. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.A remote user can create a specially crafted HTML page or URL that, when loaded by the target authenticated user, will take actions on the target interface acting as the target user. This can be exploited to execute arbitrary SQL commands on the target database.
CVE-2018-10188.extra: A remote user can take actions on the target system acting as the target authenticated user, including executing arbitrary SQL commands on the target database.

CVE-2018-1019.title: Microsoft Edge Multiple Object Memory Handling Errors Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2018-1019.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Edge. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error in the Chakra scripting engine and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-0990, CVE-2018-0993, CVE-2018-0994, CVE-2018-0995, CVE-2018-0979, CVE-2018-0980, CVE-2018-1019].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error in the browser and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-1023].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error in the Microsoft Edge PDF Reader to obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system. [CVE-2018-0998].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error and obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system [CVE-2018-0892].Wei of Qihoo 360 Vulcan Team, Yuki Chen of Qihoo 360 Vulcan Team, Liu Long of Qihoo 360Vulcan Team, Lokihardt of Google Project Zero, hungtt28 of Viettel Cyber Security, Abdulrahman Al-Qabandi, and Johnathan Norman - WDG OS Security Team reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-1019.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.

CVE-2018-10194.title: Ghostscript Buffer Overflow in pprintg1() in Processing Files Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-10194.body: A vulnerability was reported in Ghostscript. A remote user may be able to cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when processed by the target application, will trigger an input validation flaw in pdf_set_text_matrix() in 'gdevpdts.c' and buffer overflow in the pprintg1() function and cause the target application to crash or potentially execute arbitrary code. The code will run with the privileges of the target application.Vitor Silva reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-10194.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will cause the target application to crash or potentially execute arbitrary code.

CVE-2018-1020.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Object Memory Handling Bugs Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2018-1020.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Internet Explorer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will obtain potentially sensitive information on the target user's system [CVE-2018-0987, CVE-2018-0989, CVE-2018-0981, CVE-2018-1000].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-0988, CVE-2018-0996, CVE-2018-1001]. This can also be exploited via an embedded ActiveX control marked 'safe for initialization' in an application or Microsoft Office document hosting the Internet Explorer (IE) rendering engine.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-0991, CVE-2018-0997, CVE-2018-0870, CVE-2018-1018, CVE-2018-1020].Yuki Chen of Qihoo 360 Vulcan Team, Anonymous (via Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative), Wei of Qihoo 360 Vulcan Team, Genwei Jiang of FireEye, Inc, and hungtt28 of Viettel Cyber Security reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-1020.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will obtain potentially sensitive information on the target user's system.

CVE-2018-1022.title: Microsoft Edge Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code, Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information, and Bypass Security Restrictions on the Target System
CVE-2018-1022.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Edge. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can bypass security controls on the target system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-8128, CVE-2018-8137, CVE-2018-8139, CVE-2018-0945, CVE-2018-0946, CVE-2018-0951, CVE-2018-0953, CVE-2018-8123, CVE-2018-8178, CVE-2018-8179].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error in the Chakra scripting engine and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-8130, CVE-2018-8133, CVE-2018-0943].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error in the Chakra scripting engine and access potentially sensitive memory contents on the target user's system [CVE-2018-8145].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error and access potentially sensitive information on the target user's system [CVE-2018-1021, CVE-2018-1025].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-0954, CVE-2018-1022]. This can be exploited via and embeded ActiveX control marked as "safe for initialization" or via an application or Microsoft Office document that hosts the browser rendering engine.A remote user can bypass Same-Origin Policy (SOP) restrictions to cause the target user's browser to send potentially sensitive data [CVE-2018-8112].Lokihardt of Google Project Zero, Johnathan Norman, Windows & Devices Group - Operating System Security Team, Yuki Chen of Qihoo 360 Vulcan Team, Zhong Zhaochen of tophant.com, akayn (via Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative), RanchoIce of Tencent ZhanluLab (via Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative), Instructor of Tencent ZhanluLab, Danny__Wei of Tencent's Xuanwu Lab (via Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative), Aradnok, Richard Zhu (fluorescence) (via Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative), and Marcin Towalski (@mtowalski1) reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-1022.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can bypass security controls on the target system.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.

CVE-2018-1023.title: Microsoft Edge Multiple Object Memory Handling Errors Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2018-1023.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Edge. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error in the Chakra scripting engine and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-0990, CVE-2018-0993, CVE-2018-0994, CVE-2018-0995, CVE-2018-0979, CVE-2018-0980, CVE-2018-1019].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error in the browser and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-1023].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error in the Microsoft Edge PDF Reader to obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system. [CVE-2018-0998].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error and obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system [CVE-2018-0892].Wei of Qihoo 360 Vulcan Team, Yuki Chen of Qihoo 360 Vulcan Team, Liu Long of Qihoo 360Vulcan Team, Lokihardt of Google Project Zero, hungtt28 of Viettel Cyber Security, Abdulrahman Al-Qabandi, and Johnathan Norman - WDG OS Security Team reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-1023.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.

CVE-2018-1028.title: Microsoft Office Memory Access Errors Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2018-1028.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Office. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A remote user can send a Rich Text Format (RTF) email message containing a specially crafted OLE object that, when opened or previewed by the target user, will obtain potentially sensitive information on the target user's system [CVE-2018-0950]. This can be exploited to conduct brute-force guessing attacks against NTLM to a remote SMB server. Versions 2007 SP3, 2010 SP2, 2013 SP1, 2013 RT SP1, 2016, 2016 Click-to-Run (C2R), and Office Compatibility Pack SP3 are affected.A remote user can create a specially crafted document file that, when opened by the target user, will obtain potentially sensitive information from memory on the target user's system [CVE-2018-1007]. Versions 2007 SP3, 2010 SP2, 2013 SP1, 2013 RT SP1, 2016, 2016 Click-to-Run (C2R), and Office Compatibility Pack SP3 are affected.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when opened by the target user via Microsoft Office, will trigger an object memory handling error and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-1026]. Versions 2007 SP3, 2010 SP2, 2013 SP1, 2013 RT SP1, 2016, 2016 Click-to-Run (C2R), and Office Compatibility Pack SP3 are affected.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a flaw in the handling of embedded fonts in the Office graphics component and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-1028]. The Preview Pane is not an attack vector for this vulnerability.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when opened by the target user via Microsoft Office, will trigger an object memory handling error and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-1030].Will Dormann CERT/CC, Vladislav Stolyarov of Kaspersky Lab, and Jaanus Kaap of Clarified Security reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-1028.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.

CVE-2018-1032.title: Microsoft SharePoint Server Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Authenticated Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-1032.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft SharePoint. A remote authenticated user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote authenticated user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Microsoft SharePoint Server software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Jakub Palaczynski, ING Business Shared Services, reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-1032.extra: A remote authenticated user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Microsoft SharePoint Server software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-1034.title: Microsoft SharePoint Server Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Authenticated Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-1034.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft SharePoint. A remote authenticated user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote authenticated user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Microsoft SharePoint software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Graham McMynn of Microsoft reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-1034.extra: A remote authenticated user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Microsoft SharePoint Server software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-1050.title: Samba Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Cause the Target Print Spooler Service to Crash
CVE-2018-1050.body: A vulnerability was reported in Samba. A remote user can cause the target print spooler service to crash.A remote user can send specially crafted RPC calls to the 'spoolss' service to trigger a null pointer error and cause the target print spooler service to crash.Systems configured with the the 'spoolss' service as an external daemon are affected.
CVE-2018-1050.extra: A remote user can cause the target print spooler service to crash.

CVE-2018-10547.title: PHP Multiple Flaws Let Remote Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information, Deny Service, and Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-10547.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in PHP. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a heap buffer overread in exif_iif_add_value() and obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system [CVE-2018-10549].A remote LDAP server can return a specially crafted response to cause the target application to crash [CVE-2018-10548].The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2018-10547]. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the PHP software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A user can create specially crafted data that, when processed using a stream filter with 'convert.iconv.*', will cause the target application to enter an infinite loop and consume excessive CPU resources [CVE-2018-10546].A user can bypass opcache access controls to obtain potentially sensitive information from process memory of another user's PHP application via gcore [CVE-2018-10545].The specific impact of these vulnerabilities depends on the applications that use the affected functions or services.p.mehrer from metaways.de, scorneli from Red Hat, cyoung from Tripwire, and phpldap from katzen.cc reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-10547.extra: A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the PHP software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-10548.title: PHP Multiple Flaws Let Remote Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information, Deny Service, and Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-10548.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in PHP. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a heap buffer overread in exif_iif_add_value() and obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system [CVE-2018-10549].A remote LDAP server can return a specially crafted response to cause the target application to crash [CVE-2018-10548].The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2018-10547]. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the PHP software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A user can create specially crafted data that, when processed using a stream filter with 'convert.iconv.*', will cause the target application to enter an infinite loop and consume excessive CPU resources [CVE-2018-10546].A user can bypass opcache access controls to obtain potentially sensitive information from process memory of another user's PHP application via gcore [CVE-2018-10545].The specific impact of these vulnerabilities depends on the applications that use the affected functions or services.p.mehrer from metaways.de, scorneli from Red Hat, cyoung from Tripwire, and phpldap from katzen.cc reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-10548.extra: A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the PHP software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the PHP software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A user can create specially crafted data that, when processed using a stream filter with 'convert.iconv.*', will cause the target application to enter an infinite loop and consume excessive CPU resources [CVE-2018-10546].A user can bypass opcache access controls to obtain potentially sensitive information from process memory of another user's PHP application via gcore [CVE-2018-10545].The specific impact of these vulnerabilities depends on the applications that use the affected functions or services.p.mehrer from metaways.de, scorneli from Red Hat, cyoung from Tripwire, and phpldap from katzen.cc reported these vulnerabilities.

CVE-2018-1065.title: Linux Kernel Netfilter jumpstack Allocation Error Lets Local Users Cause Denial of Service Conditions on the Target System
CVE-2018-1065.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Linux kernel. A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A local user with the capability to insert iptables/netfilter rules can insert a specially crafted rule to trigger a jump to an invalid chain and cause the target system to crash.The original advisory is available at:http://lists.openwall.net/netdev/2018/01/27/46
CVE-2018-1065.extra: A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.

CVE-2018-10858.title: Samba 'libsmbclient' Directory Listing Validation Flaw Lets Remote Authenticated Users Cause the Target User's SMB Service to Crash
CVE-2018-10858.body: A vulnerability was reported in Samba. A remote authenticated user can cause the target service to crash.A remote authenticated SMB server can return a specially crafted value to overwrite client heap memory.Svyatoslav Phirsov reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-10858.extra: A remote authenticated user can cause the target user's SMB client to crash.

CVE-2018-10874.title: Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Bugs in Ansible Component Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2018-10874.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.The system reads the 'ansible.cfg' file from the current working directory when running an ad-hoc command [CVE-2018-10874]. A local user can modify the file to reference arbitrary plugin or module paths to cause the system to execute arbitrary code from those paths.The system loads inventory variables from the current working directory when running an ad-hoc command [CVE-2018-10875]. A local user can modify the variables to cause the system to execute arbitrary code.Michael Scherer (OSAS) and Brian Coca (Red Hat) reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-10874.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2018-10897.title: Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Path Validation Flaw in 'reposync' Lets Remote Users Modify Files on the Target System
CVE-2018-10897.body: A vulnerability was reported in Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization. A remote user can modify files on the target system.The 'reposync' component of 'yum-utils' does not properly validate paths in remote repository configuration files.A remote user in control of a repository can return specially crafted data to the connected target user to overwrite files on the target user's system.Jay Grizzard (Clover Network) and Aaron Levy (Clover Network) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-10897.extra: A remote user in control of a repository can overwrite files on the target user's system.

CVE-2018-10915.title: PostgreSQL Bugs Let Remote Authenticated Users Access Systems and Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information from System Memory
CVE-2018-10915.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in PostgreSQL. A remote authenticated user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system. A remote authenticated user can gain access to the target system.A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in 'libpq' to gain access to other systems without authenticating to those systems [CVE-2018-10915].Andrew Krasichkov reported this vulnerability.A remote authenticated user that can issue a 'CREATE TABLE' command can execute a specially crafted 'upsert' command to read arbitrary portions of system memory [CVE-2018-10925].
CVE-2018-10915.extra: A remote authenticated user can obtain potentially sensitive information from system memory.A remote authenticated user can gain access to the target system.

CVE-2018-11051.title: RSA Certificate Manager Path Traversal Flaw in Enroll Server Components Lets Remote Users Obtain Files on the Target System
CVE-2018-11051.body: A vulnerability was reported in RSA Certificate Manager. A remote user can obtain files on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted request to exploit a path traversal flaw and view files on the target system with the privileges of the web service.The RSA CMP Enroll Server and the RSA REST Enroll Server are affected.
CVE-2018-11051.extra: A remote user can obtain files on the target system.

CVE-2018-11059.title: RSA Archer Flaws Let Remote Authenticated Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks and Gain Elevated Privileges via a REST API
CVE-2018-11059.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in RSA Archer. A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges. A remote authenticated user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2018-11059]. A remote authenticated user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the RSA Archer eGRC software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote authenticated user can bypass REST API access controls to gain elevated privileges on the target system [CVE-2018-11060].Francesca Perrone and Donato Onofri of Business Integration Partners reported one vulnerability.
CVE-2018-11059.extra: A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote authenticated user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the RSA Archer eGRC software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-11065.title: RSA Archer Input Validation Flaw in Embedded WorkPoint Component Lets Remote Authenticated Users Inject SQL Commands
CVE-2018-11065.body: A vulnerability was reported in RSA Archer. A remote authenticated user can inject SQL commands.The software does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote authenticated user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute SQL commands on the underlying database.Giulio Comi of Horizon Security reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-11065.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.

CVE-2018-11073.title: RSA Authentication Manager Input Validation Flaws Let Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-11073.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in RSA Authentication Manager. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the RSA Authentication Manager software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.An authenticated Operations administrator can exploit this flaw [CVE-2018-11073].The embedded MadCap Flare Help files are affected [CVE-2018-11074].A Security Console page is affected [CVE-2018-11075].
CVE-2018-11073.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the RSA Authentication Manager software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-11077.title: VMware vSphere Data Protection Multiple Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-11077.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in VMware vSphere Data Protection. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-11066].A remote user can create an arbitrary web URL to redirect the target user [CVE-2018-11067].The Java management console's SSL/TLS private key may be leaked in the Java management client package [CVE-2018-11076].A remote user can create a specially crafted 'getlogs' OS command injection to cause the target user to execute arbitrary commands with root privileges [CVE-2018-11077].
CVE-2018-11077.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2018-1111.title: Red Hat DCHP NetworkManager Script Component Lets Remote Users on the Local Network Execute Arbitrary Commands with Root Privileges on the Target System
CVE-2018-1111.body: A vulnerability was reported in Red Hat DHCP. A remote user on the local network can execute arbitrary commands on the target system.A remote user on the local network can return specially crafted data via dhcp to trigger a command injection flaw in the NetworkManager integration script included in the DHCP client packages in Red Hat Enterprise Linux to execute execute arbitrary commands on the target system. The commands will run with root privileges.A remote DHCP server or a remote user that can spoof a DHCP server can exploit this flaw.Felix Wilhelm (Google Security Team) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-1111.extra: A remote user on the local network can execute arbitrary commands on the target system.

CVE-2018-11233.title: Git Submodule Name Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code on the Target System
CVE-2018-11233.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Git. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A user can obtain portions of system memory.The software does not properly validate submodule "names" supplied via the untrusted .gitmodules file when appending them to the '$GIT_DIR/modules' directory. A remote repository can return specially crafted data to create or overwrite files on the target user's system when the repository is cloned, causing arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system [CVE-2018-11235].Etienne Stalmans reported this vulnerability.A use can exploit an input validation flaw in processing path names on NTFS-based systems to read random memory contents [CVE-2018-11233].
CVE-2018-11233.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A user can obtain portions of system memory.

CVE-2018-11235.title: Git Submodule Name Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code on the Target System
CVE-2018-11235.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Git. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A user can obtain portions of system memory.The software does not properly validate submodule "names" supplied via the untrusted .gitmodules file when appending them to the '$GIT_DIR/modules' directory. A remote repository can return specially crafted data to create or overwrite files on the target user's system when the repository is cloned, causing arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system [CVE-2018-11235].Etienne Stalmans reported this vulnerability.A use can exploit an input validation flaw in processing path names on NTFS-based systems to read random memory contents [CVE-2018-11233].
CVE-2018-11235.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A user can obtain portions of system memory.

CVE-2018-1124.title: Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Integer Overflows in procps-ng Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2018-1124.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can trigger an integer overflow and resulting heap overflow in file2strvec to execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges [CVE-2018-1124].A local user can trigger an integer truncation error in [CVE-2018-1126].The vulnerability resides in the procps-ng component.Qualys Research Labs reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-1124.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2018-11258.title: Google Android Multiple Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Let Applications Gain Elevated Privileges and Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2018-11258.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Google Android. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. An application can gain elevated privileges. An application can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.An application can exploit flaws in the Framework to bypass user interaction requirements to gain elevated privileges on the target system [CVE-2018-9438, CVE-2018-9445, CVE-2018-9451, CVE-2018-9458].An application can exploit flaws in the System component to bypass user interaction requirements to gain elevated privileges on the target system [CVE-2018-9436, CVE-2018-9446, CVE-2018-9448, CVE-2018-9450, CVE-2018-9453, CVE-2018-9454, CVE-2018-9455, CVE-2018-9459].An application can exploit flaws in the Kernel component to bypass user interaction requirements to gain elevated privileges on the target system [CVE-2017-18249, CVE-2018-9465].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a flaw in the Media framework and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-9427, CVE-2018-9437, CVE-2018-9444].A remote user can exploit flaws in Several Qualcomm components to view potentially sensitive information on the target system [CVE-2017-13077, CVE-2017-18281, CVE-2018-11260, CVE-2018-5383].Several Qualcomm closed-source components are affected by other vulnerabilities [CVE-2017-18280, CVE-2017-18282, CVE-2017-18283, CVE-2017-18292, CVE-2017-18293, CVE-2017-18294, CVE-2017-18295, CVE-2017-18296, CVE-2017-18297, CVE-2017-18298, CVE-2017-18299, CVE-2017-18300, CVE-2017-18301, CVE-2017-18302, CVE-2017-18303, CVE-2017-18304, CVE-2017-18305, CVE-2017-18308, CVE-2017-18309, CVE-2017-18310, CVE-2018-11258, CVE-2018-11305].
CVE-2018-11258.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.An application can gain elevated privileges on the target system.An application can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.

CVE-2018-1126.title: Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Integer Overflows in procps-ng Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2018-1126.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can trigger an integer overflow and resulting heap overflow in file2strvec to execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges [CVE-2018-1124].A local user can trigger an integer truncation error in [CVE-2018-1126].The vulnerability resides in the procps-ng component.Qualys Research Labs reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-1126.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.
