CVE-2018-11321.title: Joomla! Multiple Flaws Let Remote Authenticated Users Modify ACLs and Execute Arbitrary Code, Remote Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information and Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks, and Local Users Obtain Passwords
CVE-2018-11321.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Joomla!. A remote authenticated user can modify data on the target system. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A local user can view the administrator password in certain cases.The media manager does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in file and folder names before displaying the input [CVE-2018-6378]. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Joomla! software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in redirect URIs containing a username and password before displaying the input [CVE-2018-11328]. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Joomla! software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user. Versions 3.1.2 and after are affected.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in various fields before displaying the input [CVE-2018-11326]. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Joomla! software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user. Versions 3.0.0 and after are affected.The system may recreate a session that was to be destroyed due to a race condition [CVE-2018-11324]. The impact was not specified. Versions 3.0.0 and after are affected.A remote authenticated user that has privileges to create custom fields can modify the filtering options in com_fields to inject an unvalidated option and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2018-11321]. Versions 3.7.0 and after are affected.[Editor's note: The vendor has assigned CVE-2018-11321 a Severity of "Low" and an Impact of "Moderate".]A local user can view the plain text password for the administrator account when the web install application autofills password fields after a form validation error or navigating to a previous install step [CVE-2018-11325]. Versions 3.0.0 and after are affected.A remote user can view potentially sensitive names of tags that are unpublished or published with restricted view permissions [CVE-2018-11327]. Versions 3.1.0 and after are affected.A remote authenticated user can upload PHAR files, which may be processed as executable PHP scripts by the web server on some systems [CVE-2018-11322]. Versions 2.5.0 and after are affected.A remote authenticated user can modify the access levels of user groups that have higher permissions [CVE-2018-11323]. Versions 2.5.0 and after are affected.Matias Aguirre (JSST), Demis Palma (JSST), Phil Taylor (JSST), David Jardin (JSST), Benjamin Trenkle (JSST), Kai Zhao of 3H Security Team & Zhouyuan Yang (FortiGuard Labs), and Sascha Egerer reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-11321.extra: A remote authenticated user can modify access control lists (ACLs) on the target system.A local user can view the administrator password in certain cases.A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Joomla! software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Joomla! software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in redirect URIs containing a username and password before displaying the input [CVE-2018-11328]. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Joomla! software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user. Versions 3.1.2 and after are affected.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in various fields before displaying the input [CVE-2018-11326]. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Joomla! software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user. Versions 3.0.0 and after are affected.The system may recreate a session that was to be destroyed due to a race condition [CVE-2018-11324]. The impact was not specified. Versions 3.0.0 and after are affected.A remote authenticated user that has privileges to create custom fields can modify the filtering options in com_fields to inject an unvalidated option and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2018-11321]. Versions 3.7.0 and after are affected.[Editor's note: The vendor has assigned CVE-2018-11321 a Severity of "Low" and an Impact of "Moderate".]A local user can view the plain text password for the administrator account when the web install application autofills password fields after a form validation error or navigating to a previous install step [CVE-2018-11325]. Versions 3.0.0 and after are affected.A remote user can view potentially sensitive names of tags that are unpublished or published with restricted view permissions [CVE-2018-11327]. Versions 3.1.0 and after are affected.A remote authenticated user can upload PHAR files, which may be processed as executable PHP scripts by the web server on some systems [CVE-2018-11322]. Versions 2.5.0 and after are affected.A remote authenticated user can modify the access levels of user groups that have higher permissions [CVE-2018-11323]. Versions 2.5.0 and after are affected.Matias Aguirre (JSST), Demis Palma (JSST), Phil Taylor (JSST), David Jardin (JSST), Benjamin Trenkle (JSST), Kai Zhao of 3H Security Team & Zhouyuan Yang (FortiGuard Labs), and Sascha Egerer reported these vulnerabilities.

CVE-2018-11354.title: Wireshark Bugs in Multiple Dissectors Let Remote Users Cause the Application to Crash or Consume Excessive Memory Resources
CVE-2018-11354.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Wireshark. A remote user can consume excessive memory on the target system. A remote user can cause the target service to crash.A remote user can send specially crafted data to cause the target dissector to crash.The LDSS dissector is affected [CVE-2018-11362].The IEEE 1905.1a dissector is affected [CVE-2018-11354]The RTCP dissector is affected [CVE-2018-11355]. Version 2.6.0 is affected.The DNS dissector is affected [CVE-2018-11356].The GSM A DTAP dissector is affected [CVE-2018-11360].The Q.931 dissector is affected [CVE-2018-11358].The IEEE 802.11 dissector is affected [CVE-2018-11361]. Version 2.6.0 is affected.The RRC dissector and other dissectors are affected [CVE-2018-11359].A remote user can send specially crafted data to cause the LTP and other dissectors to consume excessive memory on the target system [CVE-2018-11357].The OSS-Fuzz project reported some of these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-11354.extra: A remote user can consume excessive memory resources on the target system.A remote user can cause the target dissector to crash.

CVE-2018-11409.title: Splunk REST Endpoint Lets Remote Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information on the Target System
CVE-2018-11409.body: A vulnerability was reported in Splunk. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A remote user can submit a specially crafted request to a REST endpoint to view potentially sensitive information about the host operating system, hardware, and Splunk license on the target system.A demonstration exploit URL is provided:https://[target]:8000/en-US/splunkd/__raw/services/server/info/server-info?output_mode=jsonThe search head, heavy forwarder, universal forwarder, and indexer components are affected.The original advisory is available at:https://github.com/kofa2002/splunkKoF2002 reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-11409.extra: A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.

CVE-2018-1147.title: Tenable Nessus Bugs Let Remote Authenticated Users Bypass Session Security and Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-1147.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Tenable Nessus. A remote authenticated user can bypass security restrictions. A remote authenticated user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in '.nessus' files [CVE-2018-1147]. A remote authenticated user can upload a specially crafted '.nessus' file that, when viewed by the target administrator user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Tenable Nessus software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote authenticated user can conduct a session fixation attack to bypass session security controls and maintain access after a password change [CVE-2018-1148].Toshitsugu Yoneyama of Mitsui Bussan Secure Directions, Inc. and Vincent Yiu of MDSec Consulting reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-1147.extra: A remote authenticated user can bypass security controls on the target system.A remote authenticated user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Tenable Nessus software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-11516.title: VLC Media Player Use-After-Free Memory Error in Processing SWF Files Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-11516.body: A vulnerability was reported in VLC Media Player. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted SWF file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a use-after-free memory error in the Demux() function in 'demux/avformat/demux.c' and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.
CVE-2018-11516.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2018-11529.title: VLC Media Player Use-After-Free Memory Error in Processing MKV Files Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code on the Target System
CVE-2018-11529.body: A vulnerability was reported in VLC Media Player. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can create a specially crafted MKV file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a use-after-free memory error and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Demonstration exploit code is available at:http://seclists.org/fulldisclosure/2018/Jul/28
CVE-2018-11529.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2018-1155.title: Tenable SecurityCenter PHP/JQuery Component Bugs Let Remote Users Determine Valid Usernames and Let Remote Authenticated Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-1155.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Tenable SecurityCenter. A remote user can determine valid usernames on the target system. A remote authenticated user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.A remote user can send specially crafted requests to determine valid usernames on the target system [CVE-2018-1154].The Reports feature area does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in an image filename paraeter before displaying the input [CVE-2018-1155]. A remote authenticated user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Tenable SecurityCenter software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Markus Weiler, SySS GmbH, and Cosmin Maier each reported one vulnerability.
CVE-2018-1155.extra: A remote user can determine valid usernames on the target system.A remote authenticated user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Tenable SecurityCenter software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-1171.title: Solaris Multiple Flaws Let Remote and Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges, Access and Modify Data, and Deny Service
CVE-2018-1171.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Solaris and related components. A remote or local user can gain elevated privileges. A remote or local user can access and modify data on the target system. A remote or local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Solaris Cluster NAS device addition component to gain elevated privileges [CVE-2018-2930].A local user can exploit a flaw in the Sun ZFS Storage Appliance Kit (AK) API frameworks component to gain elevated privileges [CVE-2018-3057].A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Solaris RAD component to access and modify data [CVE-2018-2928].A local user can exploit a flaw in the Solaris Availability Suite Service component to gain elevated privileges [CVE-2018-2892].A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the Solaris Kernel component to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-2908].A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the Solaris NVIDIA-GFX Kernel driver component to partially access data, partially modify data, and deny service [CVE-2018-2926].A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Sun ZFS Storage Appliance Kit (AK) API frameworks component to gain elevated privileges [CVE-2018-2918].A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the Sun ZFS Storage Appliance Kit (AK) API frameworks component to partially access data, partially modify data, and partially deny service [CVE-2018-2920].A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Oracle SuperCluster Specific Software SuperCluster Virtual Assistant component to access data, partially modify data, and deny service [CVE-2018-2932].A local user can exploit a flaw in the Solaris Kernel component to gain elevated privileges [CVE-2018-1171].A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Sun ZFS Storage Appliance Kit (AK) User Interface component to partially access data [CVE-2018-2921].A local user can exploit a flaw in the Sun ZFS Storage Appliance Kit (AK) API frameworks component to partially access data, partially modify data, and partially deny service [CVE-2018-2924].A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Sun ZFS Storage Appliance Kit (AK) User Interface component to partially modify data [CVE-2018-2937].A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Sun ZFS Storage Appliance Kit (AK) API frameworks component to cause partial denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-2917].A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Sun ZFS Storage Appliance Kit (AK) Core Services component to partially access data [CVE-2018-2905].A local user can exploit a flaw in the Solaris Kernel component to access data [CVE-2018-2903].A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the Sun ZFS Storage Appliance Kit (AK) HTTP data path subsystems component to partially access data [CVE-2018-2927].A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Hardware Management Pack Ipmitool component to partially access data [CVE-2018-2906].A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Solaris Kernel component to cause partial denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-2901].A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the Sun ZFS Storage Appliance Kit (AK) API frameworks component to cause partial denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-2916].A local user can exploit a flaw in the Sun ZFS Storage Appliance Kit (AK) Core Services component to partially access data [CVE-2018-2923].Neil Kettle of Trustwave Spiderlabs reported one vulnerability.
CVE-2018-1171.extra: A remote user can obtain data on the target system.A remote user can modify data on the target system.A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can obtain data on the target system.A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can modify data on the target system.A remote user can gain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2018-11776.title: Apache Struts Undefined Namespace Processing Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code on the Target System
CVE-2018-11776.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apache Struts. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.On systems using a result where a namespace value is not set and where higher-level action configuration(s) do not have a namespace value or have a wildcard namespace, a remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.On systems using a url tag where a namespace value is not set and where higher-level action configuration(s) do not have a namespace value or have a wildcard namespace, a remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.Man Yue Mo from the Semmle Security Research team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-11776.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2018-11776.title: MySQL Multiple Flaws Let Remote Users Gain Elevated Privileges, Remote Authenticated Users Access and Modify Data, and Remote and Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2018-11776.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in MySQL. A remote user can gain elevated privileges. A remote authenticated user can access and modify data on the target system. A remote or local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote user can exploit a flaw in the MySQL Enterprise Monitor Monitoring: General (Apache Struts 2) component to gain elevated privileges [CVE-2018-11776].A remote user can exploit a flaw in the MySQL Enterprise Monitor Monitoring: General (Apache Tomcat) component to gain elevated privileges [CVE-2018-8014].A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the MySQL Connectors Connector/J component to gain elevated privileges [CVE-2018-3258].A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the MySQL Enterprise Monitor Monitoring: General (Spring Framework) component to gain elevated privileges [CVE-2018-1258].A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the MySQL Server InnoDB (zlib) component to gain elevated privileges [CVE-2016-9843].A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the MySQL Server Server: Parser component to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-3155].A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the MySQL Server InnoDB component to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-3143, CVE-2018-3156, CVE-2018-3251].A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the MySQL Server Server: DML component to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-3182].A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the MySQL Server Server: Optimizer component to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-3137, CVE-2018-3203].A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the MySQL Server Server: Parser component to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-3133, CVE-2018-3145].A remote user can exploit a flaw in the MySQL Server Server: Security: Audit component to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-3144].A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the MySQL Server InnoDB component to partially modify data and cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-3185].A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the MySQL Server Server: DDL component to partially modify data and cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-3195].A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the MySQL Server Server: Merge component to partially modify data and cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-3247].A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the MySQL Server Server: Optimizer component to partially modify data and cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-3187].A local user can exploit a flaw in the MySQL Server Client programs component to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-3174].A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the MySQL Server Server: Partition component to partially modify data and cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-3171].A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the MySQL Server InnoDB component to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-3277, CVE-2018-3162, CVE-2018-3173, CVE-2018-3200].A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the MySQL Server Server: DDL component to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-3170].A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the MySQL Server Server: Information Schema component to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-3212].A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the MySQL Server Server: JSON component to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-3280].A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the MySQL Server Server: Memcached component to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-3276].A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the MySQL Server Server: Optimizer component to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-3186].A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the MySQL Server Server: Partition component to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-3161].A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the MySQL Server Server: RBR component to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-3278].A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the MySQL Server Server: Security: Roles component to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-3279].A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the MySQL Server Server: Storage Engines component to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-3282].A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the MySQL Server Server: Windows component to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-3285].A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the MySQL Server InnoDB component to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-3284].A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the MySQL Server Server: Logging component to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-3283].A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the MySQL Server Server: Security: Privileges component to partially modify data [CVE-2018-3286].Michael Orlitzky reported one vulnerability.
CVE-2018-11776.extra: A remote authenticated user can obtain data on the target system.A remote authenticated user can modify data on the target system.A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can gain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2018-1182.title: RSA Identity Governance and Lifecycle Lets Local Users Obtain Root Privileges
CVE-2018-1182.body: A vulnerability was reported in RSA Identity Management and Governance. A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.Certain local users can execute arbitrary scripts on the target system with root privileges.
CVE-2018-1182.extra: A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.

CVE-2018-1184.title: EMC RecoverPoint Command Injection Bugs Let Local Users Obtain Root Privileges
CVE-2018-1184.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in EMC RecoverPoint. A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.A local user with 'admin' privileges can supply specially crafted data via the Admin command line interface (CLI) to escape from the restricted shell to an interactive shell and run arbitrary commands with root privileges [CVE-2018-1185].A local user with 'boxmgmt' privileges can supply specially crafted data via the Boxmgmt command line interface (CLI) to run arbitrary commands with root privileges [CVE-2018-1184].Janjua, Mike Erman, Jack Backer, and Alexander Gonzalez from Northrop Grumman reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-1184.extra: A local user can execute arbitrary commands with root privileges on the target system.

CVE-2018-1185.title: EMC RecoverPoint Command Injection Bugs Let Local Users Obtain Root Privileges
CVE-2018-1185.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in EMC RecoverPoint. A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.A local user with 'admin' privileges can supply specially crafted data via the Admin command line interface (CLI) to escape from the restricted shell to an interactive shell and run arbitrary commands with root privileges [CVE-2018-1185].A local user with 'boxmgmt' privileges can supply specially crafted data via the Boxmgmt command line interface (CLI) to run arbitrary commands with root privileges [CVE-2018-1184].Janjua, Mike Erman, Jack Backer, and Alexander Gonzalez from Northrop Grumman reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-1185.extra: A local user can execute arbitrary commands with root privileges on the target system.

CVE-2018-12086.title: Wireshark MS-WSP/Steam IHS Discovery/CoAP/OpcUa Processing Bugs Lets Remote Users Cause the Target Service to Crash
CVE-2018-12086.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Wireshark. A remote user can cause the target service to crash.A remote user can send a specially crafted MS-WSP packet [CVE-2018-18227].A remote user can send a specially crafted Steam IHS Discovery packet [CVE-2018-18226]. Versions 2.6.0 to 2.6.3 are affected.A remote user can send a specially crafted CoAP dissector packet [CVE-2018-18225]. Versions 2.6.0 to 2.6.3 are affected.A remote user can send a specially crafted OpcUa dissector packets [CVE-2018-12086].
CVE-2018-12086.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to crash.

CVE-2018-1218.title: Dell EMC NetWorker Buffer Overflow in 'nsrd' Daemon Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2018-1218.body: A vulnerability was reported in Dell EMC NetWorker. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a buffer overflow in the 'nsrd' daemon and cause denial of service conditions for users of NetWorker systems.Marek Cybul reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-1218.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2018-1232.title: RSA Authentication Agent for Web Multiple Flaws Let Remote Users Deny Service and Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks and Let Local Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2018-1232.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in RSA Authentication Agent for Web for IIS and Apache Web Server. A remote user can cause the target service to crash. A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.A remote user can supply specially crafted cookies to trigger a stack overflow and cause the target service to crash [CVE-2018-1232].The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2018-1233]. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the RSA Authentication Agent software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A local user can exploit an access control flaw on a Windows Named Pipe to obtain potentially sensitive configuration properties for the target authentication agent [CVE-2018-1234]. RSA Authentication Agent for Web for IIS is affected.Harrison Neal reported two vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-1232.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to crash.A local user can view configuration properties for the target authentication agent.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the RSA Authentication Agent software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-12358.title: Mozilla Firefox Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks, Bypass Security Restrictions, Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information, and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-12358.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks. A remote user can bypass security controls on the target system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A buffer overflow may occur when rendering canvas content [CVE-2018-12359].A use-after-free memory error may occur when using focus() [CVE-2018-12360].An integer overflow may occur in the SwizzleData code while calculating buffer sizes [CVE-2018-12361].An integer overflow may occur during graphics operations in the Supplemental Streaming SIMD Extensions 3 (SSSE3) scaler [CVE-2018-12362].A segmentation fault may occur in the media recorder when the track type is changed during capture [CVE-2018-5156].A use-after-free memory error may occur when script uses mutation events to append DOM nodes [CVE-2018-12363].An integer overflow may occur in the Skia library when allocating memory for edge builders on some systems with at least 16 GB of RAM [CVE-2018-12371].Other memory corruption errors may occur [CVE-2018-5186].The browser does not warn users when opening executable files with the SettingContent-ms extension [CVE-2018-12368]. Windows-based systems are affected.WebExtensions bundled with embedded experiments do not properly check access controls. A WebExtension can gain full browser permissions [CVE-2018-12369].An NPAPI plugin can send non-simple requests to bypass cross-origin restrictions and conduct cross-site request forgery (CSRF) attacks [CVE-2018-12364].An IPC child process can escape the content sandbox and list the names of arbitrary files on the file system [CVE-2018-12365].An out-of-bounds memory read error may occur during QCMS color profile transformations [CVE-2018-12366].The PerformanceNavigationTiming method can be used as a precision timer to attempt to bypass Spectre mitigations [CVE-2018-12367].SameSite cookie protections are not validated in Reader View. A user can bypass cross-site request forgery protection [CVE-2018-12370].A remote user can bypass same-origin restrictions via service workers and redirection [CVE-2018-12358].Abdulrahman Alqabandi, Alex Gaynor, Andrea Marchesini, Ben Kelly, Boris Zbarsky, Christian Holler, Christoph Diehl, David Black, David Major, F. Alonso (revskills), Gary Kwong, Jason Kratzer, Jean-Yves Avenard, Jon Coppeard, Jonathan Kingston, Jun Kokatsu, Marcia Knous, Nicolas B. Pierron, Nils, Nils Ohlmeier, OSS-Fuzz, R, Randell Jesup, Ronald Crane, Sebastian Hengst, Ted Campbell, and anonymous reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-12358.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can take actions on the target system acting as the target authenticated user.A remote user can bypass security controls on the target system.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.

CVE-2018-12361.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks. A remote user can bypass security controls on the target system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A buffer overflow may occur when rendering canvas content [CVE-2018-12359].A use-after-free memory error may occur when using focus() [CVE-2018-12360].An integer overflow may occur in the SwizzleData code while calculating buffer sizes [CVE-2018-12361].An integer overflow may occur during graphics operations in the Supplemental Streaming SIMD Extensions 3 (SSSE3) scaler [CVE-2018-12362].A segmentation fault may occur in the media recorder when the track type is changed during capture [CVE-2018-5156].A use-after-free memory error may occur when script uses mutation events to append DOM nodes [CVE-2018-12363].An integer overflow may occur in the Skia library when allocating memory for edge builders on some systems with at least 16 GB of RAM [CVE-2018-12371].Other memory corruption errors may occur [CVE-2018-5186].The browser does not warn users when opening executable files with the SettingContent-ms extension [CVE-2018-12368]. Windows-based systems are affected.WebExtensions bundled with embedded experiments do not properly check access controls. A WebExtension can gain full browser permissions [CVE-2018-12369].An NPAPI plugin can send non-simple requests to bypass cross-origin restrictions and conduct cross-site request forgery (CSRF) attacks [CVE-2018-12364].An IPC child process can escape the content sandbox and list the names of arbitrary files on the file system [CVE-2018-12365].An out-of-bounds memory read error may occur during QCMS color profile transformations [CVE-2018-12366].The PerformanceNavigationTiming method can be used as a precision timer to attempt to bypass Spectre mitigations [CVE-2018-12367].SameSite cookie protections are not validated in Reader View. A user can bypass cross-site request forgery protection [CVE-2018-12370].A remote user can bypass same-origin restrictions via service workers and redirection [CVE-2018-12358].Abdulrahman Alqabandi, Alex Gaynor, Andrea Marchesini, Ben Kelly, Boris Zbarsky, Christian Holler, Christoph Diehl, David Black, David Major, F. Alonso (revskills), Gary Kwong, Jason Kratzer, Jean-Yves Avenard, Jon Coppeard, Jonathan Kingston, Jun Kokatsu, Marcia Knous, Nicolas B. Pierron, Nils, Nils Ohlmeier, OSS-Fuzz, R, Randell Jesup, Ronald Crane, Sebastian Hengst, Ted Campbell, and anonymous reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-12361.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can take actions on the target system acting as the target authenticated user.A remote user can bypass security controls on the target system.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.

CVE-2018-12375.title: Mozilla Firefox Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Spoof the Address Bar, Bypass Security Restrictions, and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-12375.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can bypass security controls on the target system. A remote user can spoof the address bar.A remote user can use a 'javascript:' URI with JavaScript to insert text before the domain name to spoof the address bar [CVE-2018-12382]. Firefox for Android is affected.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A use-after-free memory error may occur in certain cases when refresh driver timers are refreshed [CVE-2018-12377].A use-after-free memory error may occur when an IndexedDB index is deleted while still in use [CVE-2018-12378].An out-of-bounds memory write error may occur when the Mozilla Updater opens a MAR format file that contains a very long item filename [CVE-2018-12379].When the automount feature with autofs is used to create a mount point on the local file system, content can be loaded from this file system using a 'file:' URI without being processed via the proxy settings [CVE-2017-16541]. macOS is affected. Linux-based systems with autofs installed are also affected.When the target user drags and drops an Outlook email message into the browser, a page navigation may occur [CVE-2018-12381]. Windows-based systems with Outlook installed are affected.When a master password is set after version 58.0, unencrypted passwords are not deleted [CVE-2018-12383].Other memory safety errors may occur [CVE-2018-12375, CVE-2018-12376].Alex Gaynor, Andrei Cristian Petcu, Bogdan Tara, Boris Zbarsky, Christian Holler, Christoph Diehl, Filippo Cavallarin, Gary Kwong, Holger Fuhrmannek, Jana Squires, Jason Kratzer, Jed Davis, Jesse Ruderman, Jordi Chancel, Jurgen Gaeremyn, Karl Tomlinson, Looben Yang, Mats Palmgren, Nicolas Grunbaum, Nika Layzell, Nils, Sebastian Hengst, Ted Campbell, Tyson Smith, and Zhanjia Song reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-12375.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can bypass security controls on the target system.A remote user can spoof the address bar.

Windows-based systems with Outlook installed are affected.When a master password is set after version 58.0, unencrypted passwords are not deleted [CVE-2018-12383].Other memory safety errors may occur [CVE-2018-12375, CVE-2018-12376].Alex Gaynor, Andrei Cristian Petcu, Bogdan Tara, Boris Zbarsky, Christian Holler, Christoph Diehl, Filippo Cavallarin, Gary Kwong, Holger Fuhrmannek, Jana Squires, Jason Kratzer, Jed Davis, Jesse Ruderman, Jordi Chancel, Jurgen Gaeremyn, Karl Tomlinson, Looben Yang, Mats Palmgren, Nicolas Grunbaum, Nika Layzell, Nils, Sebastian Hengst, Ted Campbell, Tyson Smith, and Zhanjia Song reported these vulnerabilities.

CVE-2018-12385.title: Mozilla Firefox ESR Bugs Let Users Bypass Security Restrictions and Cause the Target User's Browser to Crash
CVE-2018-12385.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Mozilla Firefox ESR. A user can cause the target service to crash. A user can bypass security controls on the target system.A user that can exploit a separate vulnerability and write to the local cache in the target user's profile directory can cause the browser to crash for target users switching between the Nightly and Release versions of the browser [CVE-2018-12385].When a master password is set after version 58.0, unencrypted passwords are not deleted [CVE-2018-12383].Jurgen Gaeremyn and Philipp reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-12385.extra: A user can bypass security controls on the target system.A user can cause the target user's browser to crash.

CVE-2018-12385.title: Mozilla Firefox Lets Users Cause the Target User's Browser to Crash
CVE-2018-12385.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mozilla Firefox. A user can cause denial of service conditions.A user that can exploit a separate vulnerability and write to the local cache in the target user's profile directory can cause the browser to crash for target users switching between the Nightly and Release versions of the browser.Philipp reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-12385.extra: A user can cause denial of service conditions on the target user's browser.

CVE-2018-12387.title: Mozilla Firefox File Processing Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-12387.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a register allocation and type confusion error and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2018-12386].A remote user can trigger a bailout error in the JavaScript JIT compiler when inlining 'Array.prototype.push' to potentially execute arbitrary code within the sandboxed content process [CVE-2018-12387].Samuel Gross, Bruno Keith (via Beyond Security's SecuriTeam Secure Disclosure program), and Niklas Baumstark (via Beyond Security's SecuriTeam Secure Disclosure program) reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-12387.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2018-12388.title: Mozilla Firefox Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service, Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information, and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-12388.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.On Firefox for Android, a remote user can cause audio data to be loaded in violation of service policy via HTTP Live Streaming [CVE-2018-12391].A remote user can cause a crash with nested event loops [CVE-2018-12392].A remote user can cause an integer overflow during Unicode conversion while loading JavaScript [CVE-2018-12393]. 64-bit builds are not affected.A remote user can cause a WebExtension bypass of domain restrictions through header rewriting [CVE-2018-12395].A remote user can cause a WebExtension to run disallowed scripts [CVE-2018-12396].A remote user can cause a missing WebExtension warning prompt when requesting local file access [CVE-2018-12397].A remote user can inject stylesheets and bypass Content Security Policy (CSP) in some special resource URLs [CVE-2018-12398].A remote user can spoof the protocol registration notification bar [CVE-2018-12399].On Firefox for Android, favicons are cached in private browsing mode [CVE-2018-12400].A remote user can cause a denial of service attack when special resource URL parsing [CVE-2018-12401].A remote user can cause SameSite cookies to leak when explicitly saved [CVE-2018-12402].A remote user can cause a mixed content warning to be not displayed when an HTTPS page loads a favicon via HTTP [CVE-2018-12403].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-12388, CVE-2018-12389, CVE-2018-12390].1lastBr3ath, Abdulrahman Alqabandi, Bob Owen, Bogdan Tara, Boris Zbarsky, Calixte Denizet, Christian Holler, Dana Keeler, Daniel Veditz, Gary Kwong, Jason Kratzer, Jed Davis, Jun Kokatsu, Konark Modi, Marcia Knous, Mathias Wu, Nils, Philipp, Raul Gurzau, Raymond Forbes, Rob Wu, Andrew Swan, Ronald Crane, Steve Fink, Taegeon Lee, Tyson Smith, Yigit Can Yilmaz, cgvwzq, and r reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-12388.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.

CVE-2018-12401.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.On Firefox for Android, a remote user can cause audio data to be loaded in violation of service policy via HTTP Live Streaming [CVE-2018-12391].A remote user can cause a crash with nested event loops [CVE-2018-12392].A remote user can cause an integer overflow during Unicode conversion while loading JavaScript [CVE-2018-12393]. 64-bit builds are not affected.A remote user can cause a WebExtension bypass of domain restrictions through header rewriting [CVE-2018-12395].A remote user can cause a WebExtension to run disallowed scripts [CVE-2018-12396].A remote user can cause a missing WebExtension warning prompt when requesting local file access [CVE-2018-12397].A remote user can inject stylesheets and bypass Content Security Policy (CSP) in some special resource URLs [CVE-2018-12398].A remote user can spoof the protocol registration notification bar [CVE-2018-12399].On Firefox for Android, favicons are cached in private browsing mode [CVE-2018-12400].A remote user can cause a denial of service attack when special resource URL parsing [CVE-2018-12401].A remote user can cause SameSite cookies to leak when explicitly saved [CVE-2018-12402].A remote user can cause a mixed content warning to be not displayed when an HTTPS page loads a favicon via HTTP [CVE-2018-12403].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-12388, CVE-2018-12389, CVE-2018-12390].1lastBr3ath, Abdulrahman Alqabandi, Bob Owen, Bogdan Tara, Boris Zbarsky, Calixte Denizet, Christian Holler, Dana Keeler, Daniel Veditz, Gary Kwong, Jason Kratzer, Jed Davis, Jun Kokatsu, Konark Modi, Marcia Knous, Mathias Wu, Nils, Philipp, Raul Gurzau, Raymond Forbes, Rob Wu, Andrew Swan, Ronald Crane, Steve Fink, Taegeon Lee, Tyson Smith, Yigit Can Yilmaz, cgvwzq, and r reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-12401.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.

CVE-2018-1252.title: RSA Web Threat Detection Input Validation Flaw in Administration and Forensics Applications Lets Remote Authenticated Users Inject SQL Commands
CVE-2018-1252.body: A vulnerability was reported in RSA Web Threat Detection. A remote authenticated user can inject SQL commands.The Administration and Forensics applications do not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote authenticated user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute SQL commands on the underlying back-end database. This can be exploited to gain access to the target tool's monitoring and user information.
CVE-2018-1252.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.

CVE-2018-1253.title: RSA Authentication Manager Input Validation Flaws Let Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-1253.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in RSA Authentication Manager. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The Operations Console does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2018-1253]. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target authenticated Operations Console user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the RSA Authentication Manager software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The Security Console does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2018-1254]. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target Security Console user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the RSA Authentication Manager software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2018-1253.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the RSA Authentication Manager software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-1255.title: RSA Identity Governance and Lifecycle Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks and Remote Authenticated Users Execute System Commands
CVE-2018-1255.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in RSA Identity Governance and Lifecycle. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary commands on the target system. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.A remote authenticated user can bypass Java Security Policies and execute arbitrary system commands on the target system with the privileges of the target application [CVE-2018-1245].The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2018-1255]. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the RSA Identity Governance and Lifecycle software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Lukasz Plonka reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-1255.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary commands on the target system.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the RSA Identity Governance and Lifecycle software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-12581.title: phpMyAdmin Input Validation Flaw in Designer Feature Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-12581.body: A vulnerability was reported in phpMyAdmin. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The Designer feature does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in database names before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the phpMyAdmin software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.William Desportes reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-12581.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the phpMyAdmin software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-12711.title: Joomla! Input Validation Flaw in Language Switcher Module Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-12711.body: A vulnerability was reported in Joomla!. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The language switcher module does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Joomla! software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Borja Lorenzo, Innotecsystem, reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-12711.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Joomla! software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-12712.title: Joomla! Local Include File Bug Lets Remote Users Execute Local PHP Code
CVE-2018-12712.body: A vulnerability was reported in Joomla!. A remote user can include and execute PHP code on the target system.The software does not properly validate classes on systems using PHP 5.3. A remote user can supply a specially crafted URL to cause the target system to include and execute PHP code located on the target system. The PHP code, including operating system commands, if any, will run with the privileges of the target web service.Systems using PHP 5.3 are affected.Davide Tampellini reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-12712.extra: A remote user can execute PHP code located on the target system with the privileges of the target web service.

CVE-2018-12754.title: Adobe Acrobat/Reader Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Bypass Security, Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information, and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-12754.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe Acrobat/Reader. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can bypass security controls on the target system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A double-free memory error may occur [CVE-2018-12782].A heap overflow may occur [CVE-2018-5015, CVE-2018-5028, CVE-2018-5032, CVE-2018-5036, CVE-2018-5038, CVE-2018-5040, CVE-2018-5041, CVE-2018-5045, CVE-2018-5052, CVE-2018-5058, CVE-2018-5067, CVE-2018-12785, CVE-2018-12788, CVE-2018-12798].A use-after-free memory error may occur [CVE-2018-5009, CVE-2018-5011, CVE-2018-5065, CVE-2018-12756, CVE-2018-12770, CVE-2018-12772, CVE-2018-12773, CVE-2018-12776, CVE-2018-12783, CVE-2018-12791, CVE-2018-12792, CVE-2018-12796, CVE-2018-12797].An out-of-bounds memory write error may occur [CVE-2018-5020, CVE-2018-5021, CVE-2018-5042, CVE-2018-5059, CVE-2018-5064, CVE-2018-5069, CVE-2018-5070, CVE-2018-12754, CVE-2018-12755, CVE-2018-12758, CVE-2018-12760, CVE-2018-12771, CVE-2018-12787].A type confusion error may occur [CVE-2018-5057, CVE-2018-12793, CVE-2018-12794].An untrusted pointer dereference may occur [CVE-2018-5012, CVE-2018-5030].Buffer errors may occur [CVE-2018-5034, CVE-2018-5037, CVE-2018-5043, CVE-2018-12784]. system [CVE-2018-12851, CVE-2018-12847, CVE-2018-12846, CVE-2018-12837, CVE-2018-12836, CVE-2018-12833, CVE-2018-12832].A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the CVE-2018-12799.title: Adobe Acrobat/Reader Memory Errors Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-12799.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe Acrobat/Reader. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an out-of-bounds memory write error and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-12808].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an untrusted pointer dereference and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-12799]. Abdul AzizHariri (via Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative) and Cybellum Technologies LTD reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-12799.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2018-12801.title: Adobe Acrobat/Reader Bugs Let Remote Users Obtain Potentiality Sensitive Information and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-12801.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe Acrobat/Reader. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A remote user can trigger an out-of-bounds memory write error to execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2018-12848].A remote user can trigger an out-of-bounds memory read error to view potentially sensitive information on the target system [CVE-2018-12775, CVE-2018-12778, CVE-2018-12801, CVE-2018-12840, CVE-2018-12849, CVE-2018-12850].Anonymous (via Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative), CybellumTechnologies LTD, and Omri Herscovici (via Vulnerability Research Check Point Software Technologies Ltd.) reported these vulnerabilities.

CVE-2018-12804.title: Adobe Connect Authentication Bypass Lets Remote Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information and Hijack User Sessions
CVE-2018-12804.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe Connect. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system. A remote user can hijack the target user's session.A remote user can send a specially crafted request to bypass authentication and view potentially sensitive information on the target system [CVE-2018-4994].A remote user can bypass authentication and hijack a target user's session [CVE-2018-12804].TannerLLC reported one vulnerability.
CVE-2018-12804.extra: A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A remote user can hijack the target user's session.

CVE-2018-12806.title: Adobe Experience Manager Multiple Flaws Let Remote Users Modify Data and Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-12806.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe Experience Manager. A remote user can modify data on the target system. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.A remote user can exploit an input validation flaw to modify data on the target system [CVE-2018-12807].The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2018-5005, CVE-2018-12806]. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Adobe Experience Manager software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Nagamarimuthuof Cognizant Technology Solutions - Enterprise Risk & Security Solutions and Chia Min Jun Lennon reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-12806.extra: A remote user can modify data on the target system.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Adobe Experience Manager software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-12807.title: Adobe Experience Manager Multiple Flaws Let Remote Users Modify Data and Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-12807.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe Experience Manager. A remote user can modify data on the target system. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.A remote user can exploit an input validation flaw to modify data on the target system [CVE-2018-12807].The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2018-5005, CVE-2018-12806]. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Adobe Experience Manager software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Nagamarimuthuof Cognizant Technology Solutions - Enterprise Risk & Security Solutions and Chia Min Jun Lennon reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-12807.extra: A remote user can modify data on the target system.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Adobe Experience Manager software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-12808.title: Adobe Acrobat/Reader Memory Errors Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-12808.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe Acrobat/Reader. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an out-of-bounds memory write error and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-12808].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an untrusted pointer dereference and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-12799]. Abdul AzizHariri (via Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative) and Cybellum Technologies LTD reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-12808.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2018-12810.title: Adobe Photoshop CC Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-12810.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe Photoshop CC. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Kushal Arvind Shah of Fortinet's FortiGuardLabs reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-12810.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2018-12824.title: Adobe Flash Player Multiple Flaws Let Remote Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information, Bypass Security Restrictions, and Obtain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2018-12824.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe Flash Player. A remote user can gain elevated privileges. A remote user can bypass security controls on the target system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A remote user can trigger an out-of-bounds memory read error to view potentially sensitive information on the target system [CVE-2018-12824, CVE-2018-12826, CVE-2018-12827].A remote user can exploit a flaw in a component to gain elevated privileges on the target system [CVE-2018-12828].A remote user can bypass security controls on the target system [CVE-2018-12825].Anonymous (via Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative), Chenming Xu and Dan Caselden, ICEBRG Gigamon, Dor Hadad of Palo Alto Networks, Kai Song from TenCent, and Mateusz Jurczyk and NatalieSilvanovichof Google Project Zero reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-12824.extra: A remote user can gain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote user can bypass security controls on the target system.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.

CVE-2018-12892.title: Xen Lets Local Administrative Users on a Guest System Write to Read-Only Disks in Certain Cases
CVE-2018-12892.body: A vulnerability was reported in Xen. A local administrative user on the guest system can write to read-only SCSI disks in certain cases.A local administrative user on the guest system can exploit a flaw in libxl to bypass the read-only restrictions on a SCSI disk image in certain cases.Emulated SCSI disks are affected. IDE disks are not affected.Systems using qemu-xen as the device model version are affected.Systems using libxl or libxl-based toolstacks (e.g., xl, libvirt with the libxl driver) are affected.Andrew Reimers of OrionVM reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-12892.extra: A local administrative user on the guest system can write to read-only SCSI disks in certain cases.

CVE-2018-1301.title: Apache HTTPD Header Processing Bug Lets Remote Users Cause the Target Service to Crash
CVE-2018-1301.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apache HTTPD. A remote user can cause the target service to crash.A remote user can send a specially crafted HTTP request to trigger an out-of-bounds memory access error after a header size limit has been reached to cause the target service to crash.Robert Swiecki reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-1301.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to crash.

CVE-2018-1302.title: Apache HTTPD Write-after-free Memory Error in Processing HTTP/2 Streams Has Unspecified Impact
CVE-2018-1302.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apache HTTPD. The impact was not specified.A remote user can send specially crafted data to cause a null pointer to be written to freed memory when shutting down an HTTP/2 stream.The impact was not specified.Robert Swiecki reported this vulnerability.

CVE-2018-1303.title: Apache HTTPD Out-of-bounds Memory Read Error in mod_cache_socache Lets Remote Users Cause the Target Service to Crash
CVE-2018-1303.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apache HTTPD mod_cache_socache. A remote user can cause the target service to crash.A remote user can send a specially crafted HTTP request header to trigger an out-of-bounds memory read error in mod_cache_socache and cause the target service to crash.Robert Swiecki reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-1303.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to crash.

CVE-2018-1312.title: Apache HTTPD mod_auth_digest Weak Nonce Generation Lets Remote Users Bypass Replay Protection in Certain Cases
CVE-2018-1312.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apache HTTPD mod_auth_digest. A remote user can bypass security controls on the target system.The system does not properly generate an HTTP Digest authentication nonce. On systems that have a cluster of servers that use a common Digest authentication configuration, a remote user may be able to replay HTTP requests across the cluster without detection by the target server(s). Nicolas Daniels reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-1312.extra: A remote user may be able to bypass replay protection on the target system in certain cases.

CVE-2018-13258.title: MediaWiki Multiple Flaws Let Remote Authenticated Users Bypass Security Restrictions and Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2018-13258.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in MediaWiki. A remote authenticated user can bypass security restrictions. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.The '$wgRateLimits' rate limiter entry for 'user' overrides the setting for 'newbie' users [CVE-2018-0503]. A remote authenticated user can bypass intended limits.When a log event is partially hidden, a remote authenticated user can access potentially sensitive information via the 'Special:Redirect/logid' function [CVE-2018-0504].A remote authenticated user with permissions to change user rights can bypass certain security controls on the target system [CVE-2018-0505].The version 1.31 tar archive is missing '.htaccess' files [CVE-2018-13258].Rxy and JJMC89 reported some of these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-13258.extra: A remote authenticated user can bypass security controls on the target system.A remote authenticated user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.

CVE-2018-13406.title: Linux Kernel Integer Overflow in uvesafb_setcmap() Lets Local Users Cause Denial of Service Conditions on the Target System
CVE-2018-13406.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Linux kernel. A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A local user can trigger an integer overflow in the uvesafb_setcmap() function in 'drivers/video/fbdev/uvesafb.c' and cause the kernel to crash.
CVE-2018-13406.extra: A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.

CVE-2018-1351.title: Fortinet FortiManager Input Validation Flaw in Managed Device Configuration View Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-1351.body: A vulnerability was reported in Fortinet FortiManager. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user with command line interface configuration access can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target administrative user's browser when the administrator view the managed devices configuration. The code will originate from the site running the Fortinet FortiManager software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Sven Wandersleb, link protect GmbH, reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-1351.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Fortinet FortiManager software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-1361.title: IBM WebSphere Portal Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-1361.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM WebSphere Portal. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the IBM WebSphere Portal software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2018-1361.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the IBM WebSphere software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-1368.title: IBM Security Guardium Database Activity Monitor Unspecified Bug Lets Local Users Perform Some Administrative Actions to Access Reports and Modify Configuration Data
CVE-2018-1368.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM Security Guardium Database Activity Monitor. A local user can access report data on the target system. A local user can modify configuration data on the target system.A local user with low privileges can view report pages and perform some administrative actions to modify configuration data on the target system.
CVE-2018-1368.extra: A local user can access report data on the target system.A local user can modify configuration data on the target system.

CVE-2018-13785.title: Oracle Java SE Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Gain Elevated Privileges, Remote and Local Users Access and Modify Data, and Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2018-13785.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Oracle Java SE. A remote user can gain elevated privileges. A remote or local user can access and modify data on the target system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Scripting component to gain elevated privileges [CVE-2018-3183].A remote user can exploit a flaw in the JavaFX component to gain elevated privileges [CVE-2018-3209].A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Hotspot component to gain elevated privileges [CVE-2018-3169].A remote user can exploit a flaw in the JNDI component to gain elevated privileges [CVE-2018-3149].A local user can exploit a flaw in the Serviceability component to access and modify data [CVE-2018-3211].A remote user can exploit a flaw in the JSSE component to partially access data, partially modify data, and partially deny service [CVE-2018-3180].A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Sound component to cause partial denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-3214].A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Sound component to partially access data [CVE-2018-3157].A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Utility component to partially modify data [CVE-2018-3150].A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Deployment (libpng) component to cause partial denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-13785].A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Security component to partially modify data [CVE-2018-3136].A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Networking component to partially access data [CVE-2018-3139].Artem Smotrakov, Felix Dorre, Krzysztof Szafranski, Nelson William Gamazo Sanchez of Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative, and Tobias Ospelt of modzero reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-13785.extra: A remote user can obtain data on the target system.A remote user can modify data on the target system.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can obtain data on the target system.A local user can modify data on the target system.A remote user can gain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2018-1384.title: IBM Business Process Manager Input Validation Flaw in Business Space Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-1384.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM Business Process Manager. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the IBM Business Process Manager software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The Business Space component is affected.
CVE-2018-1384.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the IBM Business Process Manager software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-1401.title: IBM WebSphere Portal Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-1401.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM WebSphere Portal. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the IBM WebSphere Portal software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2018-1401.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the IBM WebSphere Portal software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser.
