As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Jarad Kopf reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-1413.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the IBM Cognos Analytics software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-1427.title: IBM Security Network Protection GSKit Flaws Let Local Users Obtain Passwords and Other Sensitive Information and Deny Service
CVE-2018-1427.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in IBM Security Network Protection. A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system. A local user can obtain passwords on the target system. A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.The IBM GSKit component uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms [CVE-2018-1428]. A local user may be able to decrypt sensitive information on the target system.A local user can set specially crafted environment variable values to trigger a buffer overflow in the IBM GSkit component and cause denial of service conditions on the target system [CVE-2018-1427].The IBM GSKit component duplicates the PRNG state across fork() system calls when multiple ICC instances are loaded [CVE-2018-1426]. As a result, the system may create duplicate Session IDs or key material.The GSKit CMS KDB logic does not salt the hash function [CVE-2018-1447]. As a result, passwords may not be sufficiently protected. A local user may be able to recover weak passwords.
CVE-2018-1427.extra: A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A local user can obtain passwords on the target system.A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.

CVE-2018-1429.title: IBM MQ Appliance Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-1429.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM MQ Appliance. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The interface does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the IBM MQ Appliance interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2018-1429.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the IBM MQ Appliance interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the interface, or take actions on the interface acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-1432.title: IBM InfoSphere Information Server Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Frame Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-1432.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM InfoSphere Information Server. A remote user can conduct cross-frame scripting attacks.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will load content from the target system within an HTML iframe and attempt to conduct cross-site scripting, cross-site request forgery, clickjacking, or phishing attacks.
CVE-2018-1432.extra: A remote user can load valid content from the target system within an HTML iframe and attempt to conduct cross-site scripting, cross-site request forgery, clickjacking, or phishing attacks.

CVE-2018-14339.title: Wireshark Bugs in Multiple Dissectors Let Remote Users Cause the Application to Crash or Consume Excessive CPU Resources
CVE-2018-14339.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Wireshark. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to cause the target dissector to crash.The ISMP dissector is affected [CVE-2018-14344].Dissectors that use zlib decompression may be affected [CVE-2018-14340].The ASN.1 BER dissector is affected [CVE-2018-14343].The MMSE dissector is affected [CVE-2018-14339].The HTTP2 protocol dissector is affected [CVE-2018-14369].The CoAP protocol dissector is affected [CVE-2018-14367]. Versions 2.4.x and 2.6.x are affected. The IEEE 802.11 protocol dissector is affected [CVE-2018-14370]. Versions 2.4.x and 2.6.x are affected. A remote user can consume excessive CPU resources on the target system.The Bazaar protocol dissector is affected [CVE-2018-14368].The BGP dissector is affected [CVE-2018-14342].The DICOM dissector is affected [CVE-2018-14341].Jyrki Penttinen, Bill Nickless, and the he OSS-Fuzz project reported some of these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-14339.extra: A remote user can consume excessive CPU resources on the target system.A remote user can cause the target application to crash.

CVE-2018-1443.title: IBM Security Access Manager Flaw Lets Remote Authenticated Users Access the Target System As a Different User
CVE-2018-1443.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM Security Access Manager. A remote authenticated user can gain access to the target system as a different user.A remote authenticated user can exploit an XML parsing flaw in Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML)-based single sign-on (SSO) systems to gain access to the target system acting as a different user.[Editor's note: The vendor's CVSS score lists this vulnerability as having a local attack vector.]
CVE-2018-1443.extra: A remote authenticated user can gain access to the target system acting as a different user.

CVE-2018-1459.title: IBM DB2 Buffer Overflow in 'rah.exe' Lets Local Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-1459.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM DB2. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can trigger a stack overflow in 'rah.exe' to execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges on the target system.Quentin Rhoads-Herrera reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-1459.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2018-14598.title: X.org libX11 Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service and Potentially Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-14598.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in X.org libX11. A remote user can cause the target service to crash. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote X server can return a specially crafted response to trigger an off-by-one memory write error in the XGetFontPath(), XListExtensions(), and XListFonts() functions to potentially execute arbitrary code on the target X client [CVE-2018-14599].A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger an out-of-bounds memory write error and potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2018-14600].A remote server can return a specially crafted reply to cause the target X client to crash [CVE-2018-14598].Tobias Stoeckmann reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-14598.extra: A remote user can cause the target application to crash.A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2018-14600.title: X.org libX11 Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service and Potentially Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-14600.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in X.org libX11. A remote user can cause the target service to crash. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote X server can return a specially crafted response to trigger an off-by-one memory write error in the XGetFontPath(), XListExtensions(), and XListFonts() functions to potentially execute arbitrary code on the target X client [CVE-2018-14599].A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger an out-of-bounds memory write error and potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2018-14600].A remote server can return a specially crafted reply to cause the target X client to crash [CVE-2018-14598].Tobias Stoeckmann reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-14600.extra: A remote user can cause the target application to crash.A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2018-14618.title: libcurl Curl_ntlm_core_mk_nt_hash() Buffer Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-14618.body: A vulnerability was reported in libcurl on 32-bit systems. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted NTLM authentication password to trigger a buffer overflow in Curl_ntlm_core_mk_nt_hash() in 'lib/curl_ntlm_core.c' and execute arbitrary code on the target system.Systems with a 32-bit size_t and that use more than 2 GB of memory for the password field are affected.Zhaoyang Wu reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-14618.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2018-14656.title: Linux Kernel Missing Address Validation in show_opcodes() Lets Local Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information on the Target System
CVE-2018-14656.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Linux kernel. A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A local user can run a specially crafted application to trigger a missing address check in show_opcodes() to cause potentially sensitive information on the target system to be written to the dmesg log.
CVE-2018-14656.extra: A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system to be written to the dmesg log.

CVE-2018-14667.title: Red Hat JBoss EAP RichFaces Access Control Bug Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code on the Target System
CVE-2018-14667.body: A vulnerability was reported in Red Hat JBoss. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted UserResource RichFaces expression language that contains a tainted java serialized object org.ajax4jsf.resource.UserResource$UriData expression that will trigger deserialization after clearing white list protections. As a result, arbitrary code may be executed on the target system.Joao Filho Matos Figueiredo reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-14667.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2018-14680.title: Clam AntiVirus Memory Errors in 'libmspack' Component Let Remote Users Deny Service and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-14680.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Clam AntiVirus. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote user can create a specially crafted CHM file that, when processed by the target application, will trigger an error in the 'libmspack' component and cause denial of service conditions on the target system [CVE-2018-14679, CVE-2018-14680].A remote user can create a specially crafted KWAJ file that, when processed by the target application, will will trigger an error in the 'libmspack' component and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2018-14681].A remote user can create a specially crafted CHM file that, when processed by the target application, will will trigger an error in the 'libmspack' component and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2018-14682].Hanno Bock, Jakub Wilk, and Dmitry Glavatskikh reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-14680.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when processed by the target application, will execute arbitrary code or cause denial of service conditions on the target system.

CVE-2018-14681.title: Clam AntiVirus Memory Errors in 'libmspack' Component Let Remote Users Deny Service and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-14681.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Clam AntiVirus. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. CVE-2018-14681.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when processed by the target application, will execute arbitrary code or cause denial of service conditions on the target system.

CVE-2018-14775.title: OpenBSD IO Port Permissions Bug Lets Local Users Cause Denial of Service Conditions
CVE-2018-14775.body: A vulnerability was reported in OpenBSD Kernel. A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A local user can run a specially crafted application to trigger an access control flaw in tss_alloc() in 'sys/arch/i386/i386/gdt.c' and cause the system to crash.
CVE-2018-14775.extra: A local user can cause the target system to crash.

CVE-2018-14806.title: Advantech WebAccess Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2018-14806.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Advantech Ethernet I/O Module. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A local user can gain system privileges on the target system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2018-14816].A remote user can use a specially crafted '.dll' file to delete arbitrary files on the target system [CVE-2018-14820].A remote user can trigger a path traversal flaw to execute arbitrary code [CVE-2018-14806].A local user can perform certain actions with system level privileges [CVE-2018-14828].
CVE-2018-14806.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A local user can obtain system privileges on the target system.

CVE-2018-1488.title: IBM DB2 Buffer Overflow in db2licm Lets Local Users Obtain Root Privileges
CVE-2018-1488.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM DB2. A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.A local user can trigger a buffer overflow in db2licm to execute arbitrary code on the target system with root privileges.Rich Mirch reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-1488.extra: A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.

CVE-2018-1502.title: IBM Content Manager Enterprise Edition Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-1502.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM Content Manager Enterprise Edition. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The Resource Manager does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the IBM Content Manager Enterprise Edition software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Okan Coskun reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-1502.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the IBM Content Manager Enterprise Edition software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-1503.title: IBM WebSphere MQ Header Processing Bug Lets Remote Authenticated Users Deny Service on RCVR or CLUSRCVR Channels
CVE-2018-1503.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM WebSphere MQ. A remote authenticated user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote authenticated user can send messages containing specially crafted headers to the target RCVR or CLUSRCVR type channels to cause the system to enter retry status and cause transmission of subsequent messages to fail.
CVE-2018-1503.extra: A remote authenticated user can cause transmission of subsequent messages to fail.

CVE-2018-1515.title: IBM DB2 Buffer Overflow in db2convert Lets Local Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-1515.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM DB2. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can trigger a buffer overflow in db2convert to execute arbitrary code on the target system.Systems that have a privileged script that call db2convert may allow code execution with the privileges of the DB2 process.[Editor's note: The vendor notes that these tools are not installed with set user id (setuid) privileges by default and do not allow privilege escalation when called directly.]
CVE-2018-1515.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2018-15312.title: F5 BIG-IP Input Validation Flaw in Configuration Utility Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-15312.body: A vulnerability was reported in F5 BIG-IP. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The configuration utility does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the F5 BIG-IP software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2018-15312.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the F5 BIG-IP software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-15408.title: Cisco WebEx Player File Processing Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-15408.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco WebEx Player. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.The system does not properly validate Advanced Recording Format (ARF) and Webex Recording Format (WRF) files. A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative, Steven Seeley (mr_me) of Source Incite (via Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative), Michael Flanders (via Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative), Yonghui Han of Fortinet FortiGuard Labs, and Fortinet FortiGuard Labs reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-15408.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2018-15428.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco IOS XR. A remote user can cause the target system to reload.A remote user that can send a specially crafted Border Gateway Protocol (BGP) parameter value in a certain BGP update message can cause the target system to restart.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCvj58445 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-15428.extra: A remote user can cause the target system to reload.

CVE-2018-15438.title: Cisco Prime Collaboration Assurance Access Control Flaw Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks
CVE-2018-15438.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Prime Collaboration Assurance. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.A remote user can create a specially crafted HTML page or URL that, when loaded by the target authenticated user, will take actions on the target interface acting as the target user.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCvj07251 to this vulnerability.

CVE-2018-1544.title: IBM DB2 Buffer Overflows in db2exmig and db2exfmt Let Local Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-1544.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in IBM DB2. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can trigger a buffer overflow in db2exmig and db2exfmt to execute arbitrary code on the target system.Systems that have a privileged script that call db2exmig or db2exfmt may allow code execution with the privileges of the DB2 process.[Editor's note: The vendor notes that these tools are not installed with set user id (setuid) privileges by default and do not allow privilege escalation when called directly.]
CVE-2018-1544.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2018-15442.title: Cisco WebEx Meetings File Processing Flaw Lets Remote Authenticated Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-15442.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco WebEx Meetings. A remote authenticated user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the update service of Cisco Webex Meetings Desktop App for Windows to update the service to execute arbitrary commands as a privileged System level user.In Active Directory deployments, the vulnerability can be exploited remotely.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCvk70841 to this vulnerability.Ron Bowes and Jeff McJunkin of Counter Hack reported this vulnerability.The original advisories are available at:https://webexec.org/https://blog.skullsecurity.org/2018/technical-rundown-of-webexec
CVE-2018-15442.extra: A remote authenticated user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2018-15454.title: Cisco ASA 5500-X Session Initiation Protocol Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2018-15454.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco ASA. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) data to cause a target device to reload or to cause high CPU consumption on the target device.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCvm43975 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-15454.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2018-1555.title: IBM FileNet Content Manager Bugs Let Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-1555.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in IBM FileNet Content Manager. A remote authenticated user can consume excessive memory on the target system. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can conduct XML external entity attacks to obtain files on the target system.The web user interface does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2018-1555, CVE-2018-1556]. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the IBM FileNet Content Manager software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote authenticated user can supply specially crafted XML External Entity (XXE) data to the target Administration Console for Content Platform Engine (ACCE) interface component to read files on the target system with the privileges of the target service or to consume excessive memory on the target system [CVE-2018-1542].Jayson Grace reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-1555.extra: A remote authenticated user can consume excessive memory resources on the target system.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the IBM FileNet Content Manager software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can read files on the target system with the privileges of the target service.

CVE-2018-1556.title: IBM FileNet Content Manager Bugs Let Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-1556.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in IBM FileNet Content Manager. A remote authenticated user can consume excessive memory on the target system. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can conduct XML external entity attacks to obtain files on the target system.The web user interface does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2018-1555, CVE-2018-1556]. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the IBM FileNet Content Manager software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote authenticated user can supply specially crafted XML External Entity (XXE) data to the target Administration Console for Content Platform Engine (ACCE) interface component to read files on the target system with the privileges of the target service or to consume excessive memory on the target system [CVE-2018-1542].Jayson Grace reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-1556.extra: A remote authenticated user can consume excessive memory resources on the target system.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the IBM FileNet Content Manager software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can read files on the target system with the privileges of the target service.

CVE-2018-15594.title: Linux Kernel paravirt_patch_call Indirect Call Processing Lets Local Users View Portions of System Memory for Paravirtualized Guests
CVE-2018-15594.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Linux kernel. A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information from system memory.The paravirt_patch_call/jump() functions in 'arch/x86/kernel/paravirt.c' do not properly process certain indirect calls. A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information from system memory for a target paravirtualized guest system.Nadav Amit reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-15594.extra: A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information from system memory for a target paravirtualized guest system.

CVE-2018-15605.title: phpMyAdmin Input Validation Flaw in File Import Feature Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-15605.body: A vulnerability was reported in phpMyAdmin. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The file import dialog does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the phpMyAdmin software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2018-15605.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the phpMyAdmin software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-1565.title: IBM DB2 Buffer Overflows in db2exmig and db2exfmt Let Local Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-1565.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in IBM DB2. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can trigger a buffer overflow in db2exmig and db2exfmt to execute arbitrary code on the target system.Systems that have a privileged script that call db2exmig or db2exfmt may allow code execution with the privileges of the DB2 process.[Editor's note: The vendor notes that these tools are not installed with set user id (setuid) privileges by default and do not allow privilege escalation when called directly.]
CVE-2018-1565.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2018-15765.title: Dell EMC Secure Remote Services File Permission Bugs Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2018-15765.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Dell EMC Secure Remote Services. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.The system includes several configuration files with world-readable permissions [CVE-2018-11080]. A local user can modify the contents to gain elevated privileges.The system stores plaintext passwords in a configuration file [CVE-2018-11079].The system stores potentially sensitive information as log file contents [CVE-2018-15765].
CVE-2018-15765.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2018-15771.title: EMC RecoverPoint Flaws Lets Users View Arbitrary Files on the Target System
CVE-2018-15771.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in EMC RecoverPoint. A local user can access arbitrary files on the target system.A local user on the boxmgmt interface can supply a specially crafted request to determine the location of arbitrary system files [CVE-2018-15771].A local user on the boxmgmt interface can exploit a resource consumption flaw to make the system slow or to determine the location of arbitrary system files [CVE-2018-15772].Paul Taylor (@bao7uo) reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-15771.extra: A local user on the boxmgmt interface can obtain arbitrary files on the target system.

CVE-2018-15880.title: Joomla! Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Bypass Access Controls
CVE-2018-15880.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Joomla!. A remote user can access data on the target system. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can upload arbitrary files.The frontend profile does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Joomla! software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Other access control checks can lead to an access control violation.A remote user can bypass the InputFilter for PHAR stubs.Fouad Maakor, Davide Tampellini, and Elisa Foltyn (COOLCAT CREATIONS) reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-15880.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Joomla! software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2018-15960.title: Adobe ColdFusion Multiple Flaws Let Remote Users View Potentially Sensitive Information, Upload and Modify Files, and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-15960.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe ColdFusion. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote user can access data on the target system. A remote user can modify files on the target system. A remote user can upload files to the target system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a deserialization error and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2018-15965, CVE-2018-15957, CVE-2018-15958, CVE-2018-15959].A remote user can upload files and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2018-15961].A remote user can exploit a component to view potentially sensitive information on the target system [CVE-2018-15964].A remote user can create arbitrary folders on the target system [CVE-2018-15963].A remote user can list the files in a directory on the target system [CVE-2018-15962].A remote user can exploit a component to overwrite arbitrary files on the target system [CVE-2018-15960].Matthias Kaiser of Code White GmbH, Gsrc from Venustech-Adlab, Pete Freitag of Foundeo, and Nick Bloor of Cognitous Ltd reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-15960.extra: A remote user can obtain data on the target system.A remote user can modify files on the target system.A remote user can upload files to the target system.A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.

CVE-2018-1614.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server Unspecified Flaw in SAML Response Processing Lets Remote Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information on the Target System
CVE-2018-1614.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM WebSphere Application Server. CVE-2018-16291.title: Foxit Reader Multiple Flaws Let Remote Users Deny Service, Execute Arbitrary Code, and Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2018-16291.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Foxit Reader. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can cause the target user's application to crash. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.An out-of-bounds memory read/write error may occur when parsing non-integer strings when converting HTML files to PDF files.A use-after-free memory error may occur when parsing non-integer strings when converting HTML files to PDF files.An out-of-bounds memory read error or use-after-free code execution error may occur when executing certain JavaScript due to the use of the document and auxiliary objects that have already been closed [CVE-2018-3940, CVE-2018-3941, CVE-2018-3942, CVE-2018-3943, CVE-2018-3944, CVE-2018-3945, CVE-2018-3946, CVE-2018-3957, CVE-2018-3962, CVE-2018-3958, CVE-2018-3959, CVE-2018-3960, CVE-2018-3961, CVE-2018-3964, CVE-2018-3965, CVE-2018-3966, CVE-2018-3967, CVE-2018-3993, CVE-2018-3994, CVE-2018-3995, CVE-2018-3996, CVE-2018-3997, CVE-2018-16291, CVE-2018-16293, CVE-2018-16295, CVE-2018-16296, CVE-2018-16297, CVE-2018-16294, CVE-2018-16292].A remote user can cause a use-after-free memory error by causing a dialog box to pop open repeatedly.A remote user can cause a use-after-free memory error by using objects that have been deleted or closed.A remote user can cause a use-after-free memory error using a control object after it has been deleted within a static XFA layout or using a wild pointer resulting from a deleted object after XFA re-layout.A remote user can cause a use-after-free memory error when processing certain properties of Annotation objects by using freed objects.A remote user can cause a use-after-free memory error or crash when processing PDF documents or certain properties of a PDF form.A remote user can cause an uninitialized object information disclosure when creating ArrayBuffer and DataView objects [CVE-2018-17781].A remote user can cause a memory corruption error when getting a pageIndex object without an initial value [CVE-2018-3992].A remote user can cause an out-of-bounds memory read error when processing the Lower () method of a XFA object.A remote user can trigger a type confusion error when using a null pointer without validation.A remote user can cause an out-of-bounds memory read error and crash when parsing certain BMP images due to the access of an invalid address.A remote user can cause an out-of-bounds memory read error when processing a PDF file that contains non-standard signatures.bit - Security Research (via Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative), Sooraj K S (@soorajks), and Sebastian Feldmann from GoSecure (via Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative) reported these vulnerabilities.

CVE-2018-1643.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server Input Validation Flaw in Installation Verification Tool Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-1643.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM WebSphere Application Server. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The Installation Verification Tool does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the IBM WebSphere software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Mingxuan Song reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-1643.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the IBM WebSphere software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-1655.title: IBM AIX rmsock Lets Local Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Kernel Memory Contents
CVE-2018-1655.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM AIX. A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A local user can exploit an unspecified flaw in the 'rmsock' command to obtain potentially sensitive information from kernel memory on the target system.
CVE-2018-1655.extra: A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information from kernel memory.

CVE-2018-1656.title: IBM SPSS Statistics Bugs in Java Components Let Remote Users Modify Files and Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2018-1656.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in IBM SPSS Statistics. A remote user can modify files on the target system. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote user can create a specially crafted IBM JRE Diagnostic Tooling Framework for Java (DTFJ) dump file that, when extracted by the target user, will overwrite files on the target user's system [CVE-2018-1656].A local user can invoke the Java Attach API to use other processes and execute arbitrary code to gain elevated privileges on the target system [CVE-2018-12539].
CVE-2018-1656.extra: A remote user can modify files on the target system.A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2018-1660.title: IBM WebSphere Portal Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-1660.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM WebSphere Portal. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the IBM WebSphere software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2018-1660.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the IBM WebSphere software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-1672.title: IBM WebSphere Portal Lets Remote Authenticated Users Impersonate Users on the Target System
CVE-2018-1672.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM WebSphere Portal. A remote authenticated user can gain access to the target system.A remote authenticated user can gain access to the target system acting as a target authenticated user.
CVE-2018-1672.extra: A remote authenticated user can impersonate other user's on the target system.

CVE-2018-1673.title: IBM WebSphere Portal Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-1673.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM WebSphere Portal. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the IBM WebSphere software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Giulio Comi reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-1673.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the IBM WebSphere software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-1674.title: IBM Business Process Manager Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Authenticated Users Inject SQL Commands
CVE-2018-1674.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM Business Process Manager. A remote authenticated user can inject SQL commands.The software does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote authenticated user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute SQL commands on the underlying database.
CVE-2018-1674.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.

CVE-2018-16839.title: curl Buffer Overflow in Curl_auth_create_plain_message Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-16839.body: A vulnerability was reported in curl. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted SASL password data to trigger a buffer overflow in processing the Curl_auth_create_plain_message name and password and potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system.The affected function can can be invoked using POP3(S), IMAP(S), or SMTP(S).The issue is only present on 32-bit systems.Harry Sintonen reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-16839.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2018-16840.title: curl Use-After-Free Memory Error in Curl_close() Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2018-16840.body: A vulnerability was reported in curl. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a use-after-free in closing an easy handle in the 'Curl_close()' function.Brian Carpenter, Geeknik Labs, reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-16840.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2018-16842.title: curl Buffer Overflow Lets Remote Users Cause the Target Service to Crash
CVE-2018-16842.body: A vulnerability was reported in curl. A remote user can cause the target service to crash.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a buffer overflow and read back out-of-buffer data.Brian Carpenter, Geeknik Labs, reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-16842.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to crash.

CVE-2018-1685.title: IBM DB2 Flaw in 'db2cacpy' Lets Users View Arbitrary Files on the Target System
CVE-2018-1685.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM DB2. A local user can access arbitrary files on the target system.A local user can exploit a flaw in the 'db2cacpy' utility to read arbitrary files on the target system.IBM DB2 Connect Server is also affected.Eddie Zhu reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-1685.extra: A local user can obtain arbitrary files on the target system.

CVE-2018-16850.title: PostgreSQL Transition Relation Name Misquoting Lets Remote Authenticated Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2018-16850.body: A vulnerability was reported in PostgreSQL. A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges.A remote authenticated user can CREATE a specially crafted transition name that is not properly quoted and cause it to be later executed with non-temporary schema or TRIGGER privileges and gain elevated privileges on the target system.The pg_upgrade and pg_dump functions are affected via 'CREATE TRIGGER ... REFERENCING'.Karl Czajkowski reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-16850.extra: A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2018-16854.title: Moodle Login Access Control Flaw Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks
CVE-2018-16854.body: A vulnerability was reported in Moodle. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.A remote user can create a specially crafted HTML page or URL that, when loaded by the target authenticated user, will take actions on the target interface acting as the target user.Daniel Thatcher reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-16854.extra: A remote user can take actions on the target system acting as the target authenticated user.

CVE-2018-16986.title: Cisco Aironet Flaw in Bluetooth Low Energy Stack Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-16986.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Aironet. A remote user on the local network can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user on the local network can send specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger Bluetooth Low Energy memory corruption and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.Versions 8.7.102.0 and 8.7.106.0 are affected.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCvk44163 to this vulnerability.Ben Seri, VP of Research at Armis, reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-16986.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2018-17157.title: FreeBSD NFS Server Code Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-17157.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in FreeBSD Kernel. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted network file system (NFS) content that, when loaded by the target user, either remotely or locally, will trigger a flaw in the FreeBSD NFS server code and cause the target system to crash or potentially execute arbitrary code.Systems that do not provide NFS services are not affected.Jakub Jirasek, Secunia Research at Flexera reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-17157.extra: A remote user can create content that will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2018-17158.title: FreeBSD NFS Server Code Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-17158.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in FreeBSD Kernel. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted network file system (NFS) content that, when loaded by the target user, either remotely or locally, will trigger a flaw in the FreeBSD NFS server code and cause the target system to crash or potentially execute arbitrary code.Systems that do not provide NFS services are not affected.Jakub Jirasek, Secunia Research at Flexera reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-17158.extra: A remote user can create content that will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2018-1716.title: IBM WebSphere Portal Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-1716.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM WebSphere Portal. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the IBM WebSphere software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2018-1716.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the IBM WebSphere software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-17182.title: Linux Kernel Cache Invalidation Bug Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2018-17182.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Linux kernel. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can run a specially crafted application to trigger an overflow in the cache invalidation optimization and execute arbitrary code on the target system with elevated privileges.The original advisory is available at:https://bugs.chromium.org/p/project-zero/issues/detail?id=1664Additional information is available at:https://googleprojectzero.blogspot.com/2018/09/a-cache-invalidation-bug-in-linux.htmlJann Horn of Google Project Zero reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-17182.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2018-1755.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server Liberty Non-Secure Authentication Lets Remote Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information on the Target System
CVE-2018-1755.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM WebSphere Application Server Liberty. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.The system does not use the proper transport when configured to use Java Authentication SPI for Containers (JASPIC) and to permit access via a non-secure (e.g., HTTP) port and using JASPIC or JSR375 authentication.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.
CVE-2018-1755.extra: A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.

CVE-2018-1767.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server Input Validation Flaw in CacheMonitor Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-1767.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM WebSphere. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The CacheMonitor does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the IBM WebSphere software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.vah13 reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-1767.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the IBM WebSphere software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-1770.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server Admin Console Lets Remote Authenticated Users Traverse the Directory to View Files on the Target System
CVE-2018-1770.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM WebSphere Application Server Admin Console. A remote authenticated user can view files on the target system.The Admin Console does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote authenticated user can supply a specially crafted request containing '/../' sequences to view files on target system that are located outside of the intended directory.Artem Metla reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-1770.extra: A remote authenticated user can view files on the target system.

CVE-2018-1777.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server Input Validation Flaw in Admin Console Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-1777.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM WebSphere Application Server Admin Console. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The Admin Console does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the IBM WebSphere software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Benoit Ct-Jodoin reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-1777.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the IBM WebSphere software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-17781.title: Foxit Reader Multiple Flaws Let Remote Users Deny Service, Execute Arbitrary Code, and Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2018-17781.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Foxit Reader. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can cause the target user's application to crash. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.An out-of-bounds memory read/write error may occur when parsing non-integer strings when converting HTML files to PDF files.A use-after-free memory error may occur when parsing non-integer strings when converting HTML files to PDF files.An out-of-bounds memory read error or use-after-free code execution error may occur when executing certain JavaScript due to the use of the document and auxiliary objects that have already been closed [CVE-2018-3940, CVE-2018-3941, CVE-2018-3942, CVE-2018-3943, CVE-2018-3944, CVE-2018-3945, CVE-2018-3946, CVE-2018-3957, CVE-2018-3962, CVE-2018-3958, CVE-2018-3959, CVE-2018-3960, CVE-2018-3961, CVE-2018-3964, CVE-2018-3965, CVE-2018-3966, CVE-2018-3967, CVE-2018-3993, CVE-2018-3994, CVE-2018-3995, CVE-2018-3996, CVE-2018-3997, CVE-2018-16291, CVE-2018-16293, CVE-2018-16295, CVE-2018-16296, CVE-2018-16297, CVE-2018-16294, CVE-2018-16292].A remote user can cause a use-after-free memory error by causing a dialog box to pop open repeatedly.A remote user can cause a use-after-free memory error by using objects that have been deleted or closed.A remote user can cause a use-after-free memory error using a control object after it has been deleted within a static XFA layout or using a wild pointer resulting from a deleted object after XFA re-layout.A remote user can cause a use-after-free memory error when processing certain properties of Annotation objects by using freed objects.A remote user can cause a use-after-free memory error or crash when processing PDF documents or certain properties of a PDF form.A remote user can cause an uninitialized object information disclosure when creating ArrayBuffer and DataView objects [CVE-2018-17781].A remote user can cause a memory corruption error when getting a pageIndex object without an initial value [CVE-2018-3992].A remote user can cause an out-of-bounds memory read error when processing the Lower () method of a XFA object.A remote user can trigger a type confusion error when using a null pointer without validation.A remote user can cause an out-of-bounds memory read error and crash when parsing certain BMP images due to the access of an invalid address.A remote user can cause an out-of-bounds memory read error when processing a PDF file that contains non-standard signatures.bit - MeePwn team (via Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative), anonymous (via Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative), Steven Seeley (mr_me) and Esteban Ruiz (mr_me) of Source Incite (via Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative), Steven Seeley (mr_me) of Source Incite working (via iDefense Labs), Aleksandar Nikolic of Cisco Talos, Abago Forgans (via Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative), Mat Powell of Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative, Kamlapati Choubey (via Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative), ManchurianClassmate from 360 Yunying Labs, kdot (via Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative), Kamlapati Choubey of Trend Micro Security Research (via Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative), Sooraj K S (@soorajks), and Sebastian Feldmann from GoSecure (via Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative) reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-17781.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system, cause the target user's application to crash, or obtain potentially sensitive information from the target user's system.

CVE-2018-17855.title: Joomla! Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Bypass Access Controls and Execute Arbitrary Code on the Target System
CVE-2018-17855.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Joomla!. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks. A remote user can access data on the target system. A remote user can gain access to the target system.A remote user can bypass cross-site request forgery protections in com_installer [CVE-2018-17858]. Versions 2.5.0 through 3.8.12 are affected.A remote user can bypass access control lists in com_users for the admin verification [CVE-2018-17855].A remote user can bypass access levels in com_tags for the search fields [CVE-2018-17857]. Versions 3.1.0 through 3.8.12 are affected.A remote user can bypass access levels in com_joomlaupdate to execute arbitrary code [CVE-2018-17856]. Versions 2.5.4 through 3.8.12 are affected.A remote user can bypass access levels in the com_contact contact form [CVE-2018-17859]. Versions 2.5.0 through 3.8.12 are affected.Raviraj A. Powar, Paul Freeman, Codesafescan, and David Jardin (JSST) reported these vulnerability.
CVE-2018-17855.extra: A remote user can take actions on the target system.A remote user can gain access to the target system.

CVE-2018-17858.title: Joomla! Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Bypass Access Controls and Execute Arbitrary Code on the Target System

Versions 3.1.0 through 3.8.12 are affected.A remote user can bypass access levels in com_joomlaupdate to execute arbitrary code [CVE-2018-17856]. Versions 2.5.4 through 3.8.12 are affected.A remote user can bypass access levels in the com_contact contact form [CVE-2018-17859]. Versions 2.5.0 through 3.8.12 are affected.Raviraj A. Powar, Paul Freeman, Codesafescan, and David Jardin (JSST) reported these vulnerability.
CVE-2018-17858.extra: A remote user can take actions on the target system.A remote user can gain access to the target system.

CVE-2018-17910.title: Advantech WebAccess Bugs Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2018-17910.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Advantech WebAccess. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.During installation, the application installer disables user-based access control until after installation is completed [CVE-2018-17908]. A local user can execute arbitrary commands on the target system with elevated privileges.The application does not properly validate the length of user-supplied data [CVE-2018-17910]. A local user can execute arbitrary commands on the target system with elevated privileges.
CVE-2018-17910.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2018-1793.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server Input Validation Flaw in 'SAML ear' Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-1793.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM WebSphere Application Server. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The 'SAML ear' function does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the IBM WebSphere Application Server software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Benoit Ct-Jodoin reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-1793.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the IBM WebSphere Application Server software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-1794.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server Input Validation Flaw in 'OAuth ear' Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-1794.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM WebSphere Application Server. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The 'OAuth ear' function does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the IBM WebSphere software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Benoit Ct-Jodoin reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-1794.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the IBM WebSphere Application Server software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-1797.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server Lets Remote Authenticated Users Traverse the Directory to View Files on the Target System
CVE-2018-1797.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM WebSphere Application Server. A remote user can view files on the target system.The software does not properly validate user-supplied input on systems that have an Enterprise Bundle Archive (EBA) installed and with a path external to the EBA. A remote user can supply a specially crafted ZIP archive containing 'dot dot slash' sequences that, when executed, will write arbitrary files on the target system.
CVE-2018-1797.extra: A remote user can view files on the target system.

CVE-2018-1798.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-1798.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM WebSphere Application Server. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The Message Migration Utility (SIBMsgMigration) does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the IBM WebSphere Application Server software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Benoit Cote-Jodoin from GoSecure reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-1798.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the IBM WebSphere Application Server software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-1808.title: IBM WebSphere Commerce Lets Remote Authenticated Users Execute Server Side Code on the Target System
CVE-2018-1808.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM WebSphere Commerce. A remote authenticated user can execute server side code on the target system.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted data to execute code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.
CVE-2018-1808.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute code on the target system.

CVE-2018-1820.title: IBM WebSphere Portal Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks

CVE-2018-18227.title: Wireshark MS-WSP/Steam IHS Discovery/CoAP/OpcUa Processing Bugs Lets Remote Users Cause the Target Service to Crash
CVE-2018-18227.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Wireshark. A remote user can cause the target service to crash.A remote user can send a specially crafted MS-WSP packet [CVE-2018-18227].A remote user can send a specially crafted Steam IHS Discovery packet [CVE-2018-18226]. Versions 2.6.0 to 2.6.3 are affected.A remote user can send a specially crafted CoAP dissector packet [CVE-2018-18225]. Versions 2.6.0 to 2.6.3 are affected.A remote user can send a specially crafted OpcUa dissector packets [CVE-2018-12086].
CVE-2018-18227.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to crash.

CVE-2018-18311.title: Perl Function Integer/Heap Overflows Let Local Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information or Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code in Certain Cases
CVE-2018-18311.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Perl. A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system in certain cases.A local user can trigger an integer overflow in Perl_my_setenv() to cause a heap overflow and segmentation fault [CVE-2018-18311]. Version 5.28 is affected.A remote user user can create a specially crafted regular expression to cause a heap overflow in S_regatom in 'regcomp.c' during compilation and potentially execute arbitrary code [CVE-2018-18312]. Version 5.28 is affected.A remote user can create a specially crafted regular expression to cause a heap overflow in S_grok_bslash_N in 'regcomp.c' during compilation and disclose potentially sensitive information [CVE-2018-18313].A remote user can create a specially crafted regular expression to cause a heap overflow in S_regatom in 'regcomp.c' during compilation and potentially execute arbitrary code [CVE-2018-18314].Jayakrishna Menon, Christophe Hauser, Eiichi Tsukata, and Jakub Wilk reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-18311.extra: A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system in certain cases.
