CVE-2018-6494.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.

CVE-2018-6495.title: HPE Universal Configuration Management Database Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-6495.body: A vulnerability was reported in HPE Universal Configuration Management Database. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the HPE Universal Configuration Management Database software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Bharath Kumar Pyaneni reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-6495.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the HPE Universal Configuration Management Database software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-6496.title: Micro Focus Universal Configuration Management Database Browser Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Request Forgery and Object Deserialization Attacks
CVE-2018-6496.body: A vulnerability was reported in Micro Focus Universal Configuration Management Database Browser (UCMDB). A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery and object deserialization attacks.A remote user can create a specially crafted HTML page or URL that, when loaded by the target authenticated user, will take actions on the target interface acting as the target user.A remote user can conduct java object deserialization attacks. The impact was not specified.Mateusz Garncarek reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-6496.extra: A remote user can take actions on the target system acting as the target authenticated user.

CVE-2018-6497.title: Micro Focus Universal Configuration Management Database Server Access Control Flaw Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Request Forgery and Object Deserialization Attacks
CVE-2018-6497.body: A vulnerability was reported in Micro Focus Universal Configuration Management Database (UCMDB) Server. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery and object deserialization attacks.A remote user can create a specially crafted HTML page or URL that, when loaded by the target authenticated user, will take actions on the target interface acting as the target user.A remote user can conduct java object deserialization attacks. The impact was not specified.Mateusz Garncarek reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-6497.extra: A remote user can take actions on the target system acting as the target authenticated user.

CVE-2018-6586.title: CA API Developer Portal Input Validation Flaws Let Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-6586.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in CA API Developer Portal. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the CA API Developer Portal interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the interface, or take actions on the interface acting as the target user.Profile picture management is affected [CVE-2018-6586].The widgetID variable is affected [CVE-2018-6587].The apiExplorer is affected [CVE-2018-6588].Alphan Yavas of Biznet Bilisim A.S. reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-6586.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the CA API Developer Portal interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the interface, or take actions on the interface acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-6659.title: McAfee ePolicy Orchestrator Flaws Let Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks and Remote Authenticated Administrators Modify Data and Deny Service
CVE-2018-6659.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in McAfee ePolicy Orchestrator. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote authenticated administrator user modify data and cause denial of service conditions.A remote authenticated administrator user can exploit a directory traversal flaw via Windows alternate data streams to bypass file extension restrictions when exporting an XML file [CVE-2018-6660]. This can be exploited to modify data and cause denial of service conditions.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2018-6659]. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the McAfee ePolicy Orchestrator software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Christoffer Wiman from basalt reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-6659.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the McAfee ePolicy Orchestrator software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote authenticated administrator user can view bypass file extension restrictions when exporting an XML file to modify data and cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2018-6660.title: McAfee ePolicy Orchestrator Flaws Let Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks and Remote Authenticated Administrators Modify Data and Deny Service
CVE-2018-6660.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in McAfee ePolicy Orchestrator. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote authenticated administrator user modify data and cause denial of service conditions.A remote authenticated administrator user can exploit a directory traversal flaw via Windows alternate data streams to bypass file extension restrictions when exporting an XML file [CVE-2018-6660]. This can be exploited to modify data and cause denial of service conditions.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2018-6659]. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the McAfee ePolicy Orchestrator software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Christoffer Wiman from basalt reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-6660.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the McAfee ePolicy Orchestrator software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote authenticated administrator user can view bypass file extension restrictions when exporting an XML file to modify data and cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2018-6667.title: McAfee Web Gateway JMX Service Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code on the Target System
CVE-2018-6667.body: A vulnerability was reported in McAfee Web Gateway. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to the Java management extensions (JMX) service on the administrative user interface via TCP port 1099 to execute arbitrary code on the target system.
CVE-2018-6667.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2018-6672.title: McAfee ePolicy Orchestrator Bugs Let Remote Authenticate Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information and Bypass Access Controls
CVE-2018-6672.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in McAfee ePolicy Orchestrator. A remote authenticated user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system. A remote authenticated user can bypass security restrictions.A remote authenticated user can send a specially crafted HTTP request to bypass localhost-only access controls for some functions on the target system [CVE-2018-6671].A remote authenticated user can view potentially sensitive information in plain text on the target system [CVE-2018-6672].[Editor's note: The vendor's text descriptions do not match the vendor's CVSS metrics. For CVE-2018-6671, the text indicates authentication is required but the CVSS metrics indicate no authentication is required. For CVE-2018-6672, the text indicates that the impact is information disclosure but the CVSS metrics indicate that the impact affects integrity rather than confidentiality.]
CVE-2018-6672.extra: A remote authenticated user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A remote authenticated user can bypass localhost-only security controls for some functions on the target system.

CVE-2018-6689.title: McAfee Data Loss Prevention Access Control Flaw Lets Local Users Bypass Security Restrictions
CVE-2018-6689.body: A vulnerability was reported in McAfee Data Loss Prevention. A local user can bypass security restrictions.A local user can bypass security controls on the target user's locked Windows system if certain DLP Endpoint configurations have been made by the DLP Endpoint administrator to include hyperlinks in user notification dialogs.Lockheed Martin Red Team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-6689.extra: A local user can bypass security controls on the target system.

CVE-2018-6789.title: Exim Buffer Overflow in base64d() Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-6789.body: A vulnerability was reported in Exim. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted SMTP data to trigger a buffer overflow in base64d() and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.The original advisory is available at:https://devco.re/blog/2018/03/06/exim-off-by-one-RCE-exploiting-CVE-2018-6789-en/Meh Chang, DEVCORE research team, reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-6789.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2018-6797.title: Perl Heap Overflows Let Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information, Deny Service, and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-6797.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Perl. A local user can execute arbitrary code or cause denial of service conditions on the target system. A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A local user can run Perl code with a specially crafted regular expression to trigger a heap overflow S_regatom() in 'regcomp.c' and execute arbitrary code on the target system or cause the target system to crash [CVE-2018-6797].A local user can run Perl code with a specially crafted locale dependent regular expression to trigger a heap buffer overread and access potentially sensitive information on the target system [CVE-2018-6798].A local user can run Perl code with a specially crafted pack() function call to trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system or cause the target system to crash [CVE-2018-6913].These vulnerabilities can also be exploited by remote or remote authenticated users with the ability to upload and execute Perl scripts.Brian Carpenter, Nguyen Duc Manh, and GwanYeong Kim reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-6797.extra: A local user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2018-6797.title: Apple macOS/OS X Multiple Remote Code Execution, Denial of Service, and Information Disclosure Attacks and Local Privilege Escalation Attacks
CVE-2018-6797.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Apple macOS/OS X. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system. A local user can gain system privileges on the target system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A remote attacker may be able to attack AFP servers through HTTP clients [CVE-2018-4295].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the AppleGraphicsControl component to execute arbitrary code with system privileges [CVE-2018-4410].An application can trigger a input validation flaw in the AppleGraphicsControl component to read restricted memory [CVE-2018-4417].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the ATS component to gain elevated privileges [CVE-2018-4411].An application can trigger a read-only memory flaw in the ATS component to read restricted memory [CVE-2018-4308].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the CFNetwork component to execute arbitrary code with system privileges [CVE-2018-4126].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the CoreAnimation component to execute arbitrary code with system privileges [CVE-2018-4415].A local user can trigger a weakness in the Miller-Rabin primality test to identify prime numbers [CVE-2018-4398].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the CoreFoundation component to gain elevated privileges [CVE-2018-4412].A remote user can replace the message content from the print server with arbitrary content [CVE-2018-4153].A remote user in a privileged network position can conduct denial of service attacks using the CUPS protocol [CVE-2018-4406].A remote user can trigger a input validation flaw in the Dictionary component to disclose user information [CVE-2018-4346].An application can trigger a restricted file flaw in the Dock component [CVE-2018-4403].A malicious application may be able to trigger a logic error in the dyld component to gain elevate privileges [CVE-2018-4423].An application on EFI systems cannot read access via a speculative side-channel analysis [CVE-2018-3639].A local user can trigger a modification error in the EFI component [CVE-2018-4342].A remote user can trigger an access control flaw in the Foundation component to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-4304].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the Grand Central Dispatch component to execute arbitrary code with system privileges [CVE-2018-4426].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the Heimdal component to execute arbitrary code with system privileges [CVE-2018-4331].A local user can exploit a flaw in the L1 data cache at the virtual machine entry to determine guest OS privilege [CVE-2018-3646].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the Hypervisor component to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges [CVE-2018-4242].A remote user can trigger a memory corruption error in the ICU component to trigger heap corruption [CVE-2018-4394].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the Intel Graphics Driver component to execute arbitrary code with system privileges [CVE-2018-4334].An application can trigger a input validation flaw in the Intel Graphics Driver component to read restricted memory [CVE-2018-4396, CVE-2018-4418].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the Intel Graphics Driver component to execute arbitrary code with system privileges [CVE-2018-4350].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the IOGraphics component to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges [CVE-2018-4422].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the IOHIDFamily component to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges [CVE-2018-4408].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the IOKit component to execute arbitrary code with system privileges [CVE-2018-4402].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the IOKit component [CVE-2018-4341, CVE-2018-4354].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the IOUserEthernet component to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges [CVE-2018-4401].An application can trigger an out-of-bounds access control flaw in the IPSec component to gain elevated privileges [CVE-2018-4371].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the the kernel component to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges [CVE-2018-4420].An application can trigger an access control error in the kernel component with privileged API calls [CVE-2018-4399].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the the kernel component to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges [CVE-2018-4340, CVE-2018-4419, CVE-2018-4425].A remote user can trigger a memory corruption error in the the kernel component to execute arbitrary code [CVE-2018-4259, CVE-2018-4286, CVE-2018-4287, CVE-2018-4288, CVE-2018-4291].An application can trigger a memory handling error in the the kernel component to read restricted memory [CVE-2018-4413].An attacker is a privileged network position can trigger a memory corruption error in the the kernel component [CVE-2018-4407].An application can trigger a buffer overflow in the the kernel component to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges [CVE-2018-4424].A local user can trigger a flaw in the Login Window component to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-4348].A remote user can process a specially crafted email message to lead to user interface spoofing [CVE-2018-4389].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the mDNSOffloadUserClient component to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges [CVE-2018-4326].An application can trigger a flaw in the MediaRemote component to bypass sandbox restrictions [CVE-2018-4310].A local user can trigger an error in the Microcode component to gain speculative execution side-channel analysis [CVE-2018-3640].A remote user can connect to a VPN server to cause DNS queries to be leaked to a DNS proxy [CVE-2018-4369].A remote user can trigger a S/MIME flaw in the Security component to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-4400].A local user can trigger a flaw in the Security component to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-4395].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the Spotlight component to execute arbitrary code with system privileges [CVE-2018-4393].An application can trigger an access control flaw in the Symptom Framework component to read restricted memory [CVE-2018-4203].A wireless user in a privileged network position can trigger a flaw in the WiFi component to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-4368].Baris Kasikci, CVE-2018-6808.title: Citrix NetScaler ADC and NetScaler Gateway Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Download Files, Traverse the Directory, Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks and Let Remote Authenticated Users Gain Root Privileges
CVE-2018-6808.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Citrix NetScaler Application Delivery Controller (ADC) and NetScaler Gateway. A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges. A remote user can obtain files on the target system. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.A remote user can send a specially crafted request to traverse the directory on the target system [CVE-2018-6810].A remote user can download arbitrary files on the target system [CVE-2018-6808].A remote user can gain elevated privileges on the target system [CVE-2018-6809].[Editor's note: The vendor did not indicate whether authentication is required to exploit CVE-2018-6808, CVE-2018-6809, and CVE-2018-6810. The specific impact of the directory traversal vulnerability (CVE-2018-6810) was not disclosed.]The interface does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2018-6811]. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Citrix NetScaler interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote authenticated webapp user can conduct a server-side request forgery attack via '/rapi/read_url' to gain access to the 'nsroot' account and execute commands with root privileges on the target system [CVE-2018-6186]. Citrix NetScaler VPX through NS12.0 53.13.nc is affected.The Qualys Security Research Team reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-6808.extra: A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote user can obtain files on the target system.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Citrix NetScaler interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the interface, or take actions on the interface acting as the target user.

Citrix NetScaler VPX through NS12.0 53.13.nc is affected.The Qualys Security Research Team reported these vulnerabilities.

CVE-2018-6905.title: TYPO3 Input Validation Flaw in 'sitename' Parameter Lets Remote Administrative Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-6905.body: A vulnerability was reported in TYPO3. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The 'typo3/sysext/backend/Classes/Controller/PageLayoutController.php' script does not properly filter HTML code from administrator-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the TYPO3 software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The $GLOBALS['TYPO3_CONF_VARS']['SYS']['sitename'] parameter is affected.A demonstration exploit proof-of-concept is available at:https://github.com/pradeepjairamani/TYPO3-XSS-POCPradeep Jairamani reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-6905.extra: A remote administrative user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the TYPO3 software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-6913.title: Perl Heap Overflows Let Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information, Deny Service, and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-6913.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Perl. A local user can execute arbitrary code or cause denial of service conditions on the target system. A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A local user can run Perl code with a specially crafted regular expression to trigger a heap overflow S_regatom() in 'regcomp.c' and execute arbitrary code on the target system or cause the target system to crash [CVE-2018-6797].A local user can run Perl code with a specially crafted locale dependent regular expression to trigger a heap buffer overread and access potentially sensitive information on the target system [CVE-2018-6798].A local user can run Perl code with a specially crafted pack() function call to trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system or cause the target system to crash [CVE-2018-6913].These vulnerabilities can also be exploited by remote or remote authenticated users with the ability to upload and execute Perl scripts.Brian Carpenter, Nguyen Duc Manh, and GwanYeong Kim reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-6913.extra: A local user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2018-6914.title: Apple macOS/OS X Multiple Remote Code Execution, Denial of Service, and Information Disclosure Attacks and Local Privilege Escalation Attacks
CVE-2018-6914.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Apple macOS/OS X. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system. A local user can gain system privileges on the target system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A remote attacker may be able to attack AFP servers through HTTP clients [CVE-2018-4295].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the AppleGraphicsControl component to execute arbitrary code with system privileges [CVE-2018-4410].An application can trigger a input validation flaw in the AppleGraphicsControl component to read restricted memory [CVE-2018-4417].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the ATS component to gain elevated privileges [CVE-2018-4411].An application can trigger a read-only memory flaw in the ATS component to read restricted memory [CVE-2018-4308].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the CFNetwork component to execute arbitrary code with system privileges [CVE-2018-4126].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the CoreAnimation component to execute arbitrary code with system privileges [CVE-2018-4415].A local user can trigger a weakness in the Miller-Rabin primality test to identify prime numbers [CVE-2018-4398].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the CoreFoundation component to gain elevated privileges [CVE-2018-4412].A remote user can replace the message content from the print server with arbitrary content [CVE-2018-4153].A remote user in a privileged network position can conduct denial of service attacks using the CUPS protocol [CVE-2018-4406].A remote user can trigger a input validation flaw in the Dictionary component to disclose user information [CVE-2018-4346].An application can trigger a restricted file flaw in the Dock component [CVE-2018-4403].A malicious application may be able to trigger a logic error in the dyld component to gain elevate privileges [CVE-2018-4423].An application on EFI systems cannot read access via a speculative side-channel analysis [CVE-2018-3639].A local user can trigger a modification error in the EFI component [CVE-2018-4342].A remote user can trigger an access control flaw in the Foundation component to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-4304].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the Grand Central Dispatch component to execute arbitrary code with system privileges [CVE-2018-4426].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the Heimdal component to execute arbitrary code with system privileges [CVE-2018-4331].A local user can exploit a flaw in the L1 data cache at the virtual machine entry to determine guest OS privilege [CVE-2018-3646].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the Hypervisor component to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges [CVE-2018-4242].A remote user can trigger a memory corruption error in the ICU component to trigger heap corruption [CVE-2018-4394].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the Intel Graphics Driver component to execute arbitrary code with system privileges [CVE-2018-4334].An application can trigger a input validation flaw in the Intel Graphics Driver component to read restricted memory [CVE-2018-4396, CVE-2018-4418].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the Intel Graphics Driver component to execute arbitrary code with system privileges [CVE-2018-4350].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the IOGraphics component to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges [CVE-2018-4422].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the IOHIDFamily component to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges [CVE-2018-4408].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the IOKit component to execute arbitrary code with system privileges [CVE-2018-4402].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the IOKit component [CVE-2018-4341, CVE-2018-4354].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the IOUserEthernet component to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges [CVE-2018-4401].An application can trigger an out-of-bounds access control flaw in the IPSec component to gain elevated privileges [CVE-2018-4371].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the the kernel component to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges [CVE-2018-4420].An application can trigger an access control error in the kernel component with privileged API calls [CVE-2018-4399].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the the kernel component to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges [CVE-2018-4340, CVE-2018-4419, CVE-2018-4425].A remote user can trigger a memory corruption error in the the kernel component to execute arbitrary code [CVE-2018-4259, CVE-2018-4286, CVE-2018-4287, CVE-2018-4288, CVE-2018-4291].An application can trigger a memory handling error in the the kernel component to read restricted memory [CVE-2018-4413].An attacker is a privileged network position can trigger a memory corruption error in the the kernel component [CVE-2018-4407].An application can trigger a buffer overflow in the the kernel component to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges [CVE-2018-4424].A local user can trigger a flaw in the Login Window component to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-4348].A remote user can process a specially crafted email message to lead to user interface spoofing [CVE-2018-4389].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the mDNSOffloadUserClient component to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges [CVE-2018-4326].An application can trigger a flaw in the MediaRemote component to bypass sandbox restrictions [CVE-2018-4310].A local user can trigger an error in the Microcode component to gain speculative execution side-channel analysis [CVE-2018-3640].A remote user can connect to a VPN server to cause DNS queries to be leaked to a DNS proxy [CVE-2018-4369].A remote user can trigger a S/MIME flaw in the Security component to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-4400].A local user can trigger a flaw in the Security component to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-4395].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the Spotlight component to execute arbitrary code with system privileges [CVE-2018-4393].An application can trigger an access control flaw in the Symptom Framework component to read restricted memory [CVE-2018-4203].A wireless user in a privileged network position can trigger a flaw in the WiFi component to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-4368].Baris Kasikci, Daniel Genkin, Ofir Weisse, and Thomas F. Wenisch of University of Michigan, Mark Silberstein and Marina Minkin of Technion, Raoul Strackx, Jo Van Bulck, and Frank Piessens of KU Leuven, Rodrigo Branco, Henrique Kawakami, Ke Sun, and Kekai Hu of Intel Corporation, Yuval Yarom of The University of Adelaide, Brandon Azad, Brian Carpenter, Bruno Keith (@bkth_) working with Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative, CodeColorist of Ant-Financial LightYear Labs, Craig Young of Tripwire VERT, Dr. Silvio Cesare of InfoSect, Dropbox Offensive Security Team, Theodor Ragnar Gislason of Syndis, Fabiano Anemone (@anoane), Ian Beer of Google Project Zero, Innokentiy Sennovskiy from BiZone LLC (bi.zone), Zdenek Sojka, Rudolf Marek and Alex Zuepke from SYSGO AG (sysgo.com), Jann Horn (@tehjh) of Google Project Zero (GPZ), Ken Johnson of the Microsoft Security Response Center (MSRC), Jianjun Chen (@whucjj) from Tsinghua University and UC Berkeley, Juwei Lin (@panicaII) of TrendMicro Mobile Security Team, Ken Gannon of MWR InfoSecurity and Christian Demko of MWR InfoSecurity, Kevin Backhouse of Semmle Ltd., Kevin Backhouse of Semmle and LGTM.com, Lee of the Information Security Lab Yonsei University working with Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative, Liang Zhuo working with Beyond Security's SecuriTeam Secure Disclosure, Lufeng Li, Martin Albrecht, Jake Massimo and Kenny Paterson of Royal Holloway, University of London, and Juraj Somorovsky of Ruhr University, Bochum, Michael Hanselmann of hansmi.ch, Milan Stute and Alex Mariotto of Secure Mobile Networking Lab at Technische Universitt Darmstadt, Mohamed Ghannam (@_simo36), Patrick Wardle of Digita Security, Proteas of Qihoo 360 Nirvan Team, The UK's National Cyber Security Centre (NCSC), Tim Michaud (@TimGMichaud) of Leviathan Security Group, Timothy Perfitt of Twocanoes Software, Wojciech Regua (@_r3ggi) of SecuRing, Yu Wang of Didi Research America, Yukinobu Nagayasu of LAC Co., Ltd., Zhuo Liang of Qihoo 360 Nirvan Team,Zhuo Liang of Qihoo 360 Nirvan Team, cc working with Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative, Juwei Lin (@panicaII) of Trend Micro working with Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative, jianan.huang (@Sevck), and lilang wu moony Li of Trend Micro working with Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-6914.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can obtain system privileges on the target system.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.

CVE-2018-6916.title: FreeBSD IPsec Processing Bugs Let Remote Users Cause the Target System to Crash
CVE-2018-6916.body: A vulnerability was reported in FreeBSD. A remote user can cause the target system to crash.A remote user on a trusted host can send a specially crafted IP packet to trigger a kernel panic and cause the target system to crash.Systems that use IPsec are affected.A remote user can also send a specially crafted packet to trigger a use-after-free memory error in the IPsec Authentication Header (AH) with unpredictable impact.Maxime Villard reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-6916.extra: A remote user can cause the target system to crash.

CVE-2018-6917.title: FreeBSD vt(4) Driver Integer Overflow Lets Local Users View Portions of System Memory on the Target System
CVE-2018-6917.body: A vulnerability was reported in FreeBSD. A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information from system memory.A local user can load a specially crafted font to trigger an integer overflow in the vt(4) driver and view potentially sensitive information from kernel memory on the target system.Dr Silvio Cesare of InfoSect reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-6917.extra: A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information from kernel memory on the target system.

CVE-2018-6924.title: FreeBSD Kernel ELF Header Parsing Error Lets Local Users Obtain Memory Contents and Cause the Target System to Crash
CVE-2018-6924.body: A vulnerability was reported in FreeBSD Kernel. A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system. A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information from system memory.A local user can execute a specially crafted ELF binary to obtain potentially sensitive information from system memory on the target system or cause the target system to crash.Thomas Barabosch, Fraunhofer FKIE, and Mark Johnston reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-6924.extra: A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information from system memory on the target system.

CVE-2018-6958.title: VMware vRealize Automation Bugs Let Remote Users Hijack Sessions and Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-6958.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in VMware vRealize Automation. A remote user can hijack the target user's session. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2018-6958]. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the VMware vRealize software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The system does not properly handle session token renewal [CVE-2018-6959]. A remote user can hijack a target user's session.Oliver Matula and Benjamin Schwendemann of ERNW Enno Rey Netzwerke GmbH reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-6958.extra: A remote user can hijack the target user's session.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the VMware vRealize software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-6960.title: VMware Horizon DaaS Lets Remote Users Bypass Two Factor Authentication on the Target System
CVE-2018-6960.body: A vulnerability was reported in VMware Horizon DaaS. A remote user can bypass two-factor authentication.A remote user with a valid account on the target system can bypass authentication on the target system.Peter Ivezaj, President - Digital Upkeep, reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-6960.extra: A remote user with a valid account on the target system can bypass two-factor authentication on the target system.

CVE-2018-6961.title: VMware NSX SD-WAN Edge Local Web User Interface Command Injection Flaw Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2018-6961.body: A vulnerability was reported in VMware NSX SD-WAN Edge by VeloCloud. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user on the local web user interface can inject commands to gain elevated privileges on the target system.Cory Mathews, Quentin Rhoads-Herrera, and Maggie Ligon of Critical Start and Brian Sullivan from Tevora separately reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-6961.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2018-6963.title: VMware Workstation and Fusion Flaws Let Local Users Deny Service and Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2018-6963.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in VMware Workstation and Fusion. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system. A local on the guest system can cause denial of service conditions on the same guest system.A local user can exploit a signature bypass flaw to gain elevated privileges on the target system [CVE-2018-6962]. VMware Fusion is affected.A local user on a guest system can trigger a null pointer dereference in the RPC handler to cause denial of service conditions on the same guest system [CVE-2018-6963].CodeColorist of AntFinancial LightYear Security Labs, Hahna Latonick and Kevin Fujimoto (via Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative), and Bruno Botelho (@utxsec) reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-6963.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local on the guest system can cause denial of service conditions on the same guest system.

CVE-2018-6965.title: VMware Workstation and Fusion Out-of-Bounds Memory Read Errors Let Local Users Deny Service and Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2018-6965.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in VMware Workstation and Fusion. A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system. A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A local user can trigger an out-of-bounds memory read error in the shader translator to obtain potentially sensitive information or cause their virtual machine to crash.A member of Cisco Talos and RanchoIce of Tencent ZhanluLab reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-6965.extra: A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.

CVE-2018-6966.title: VMware Workstation and Fusion Out-of-Bounds Memory Read Errors Let Local Users Deny Service and Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2018-6966.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in VMware Workstation and Fusion. A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system. A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A local user can trigger an out-of-bounds memory read error in the shader translator to obtain potentially sensitive information or cause their virtual machine to crash.A member of Cisco Talos and RanchoIce of Tencent ZhanluLab reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-6966.extra: A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.

CVE-2018-6967.title: VMware Workstation and Fusion Out-of-Bounds Memory Read Errors Let Local Users Deny Service and Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2018-6967.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in VMware Workstation and Fusion. A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system. A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A local user can trigger an out-of-bounds memory read error in the shader translator to obtain potentially sensitive information or cause their virtual machine to crash.A member of Cisco Talos and RanchoIce of Tencent ZhanluLab reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-6967.extra: A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.

CVE-2018-6969.title: VMware Tools Out-of-Bounds Memory Read Error Lets Local Users on a Guest System Gain Elevated Privileges on the Guest System
CVE-2018-6969.body: A vulnerability was reported in VMware Tools. A local user on the guest system can gain elevated privileges on the guest system.A local user on the guest system can trigger an out-of-bounds memory read error in HGFS to obtain potentially sensitive information on the guest system or gain elevated privileges on the guest system.Guest systems with file sharing enabled are affected.Windows guest virtual machines are affected.Anurudh reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-6969.extra: A local user on the guest system can gain elevated privileges on the guest system.

CVE-2018-6970.title: VMware Horizon Out-of-Bounds Memory Read Error in Message Framework Lets Local Users View Portions of System Memory on the Target System
CVE-2018-6970.body: A vulnerability was reported in VMware Horizon. A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information from system memory.A local user can trigger an out-of-bounds memory read error in the Message Framework library to obtain potentially sensitive information from a privileged process running on the target system.The Horizon Connection Server, Horizon Agent, and Horizon Client are affected.Horizon Agents on Linux-based systems and Horizon Clients on non-Windows systems are not affected.Steven Seeley (mr_me) of Source Incite (via Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-6970.extra: A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information from system memory on the target system.

CVE-2018-6972.title: VMware ESXi Null Pointer Dereference in RPC Handler Lets Local Users on a Guest System Cause Denial of Service Conditions on Their Guest System
CVE-2018-6972.body: A vulnerability was reported in VMware ESXi. A local user on the guest system can cause denial of service conditions on their guest system.A local user on a guest system can trigger a null pointer dereference in the RPC handler and cause their virtual machine to crash.Hahna Latonick and Kevin Fujimoto (via Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-6972.extra: A local user on the guest system can cause denial of service conditions on their guest system.

CVE-2018-6972.title: VMware Workstation/Fusion Null Pointer Dereference in RPC Handler Lets Local Users on a Guest System Cause Denial of Service Conditions on Their Guest System
CVE-2018-6972.body: A vulnerability was reported in VMware Workstation/Fusion. A local user can cause denial of service conditions on their virtual machine.A local user on a guest system can trigger a null pointer dereference in the RPC handler and cause their virtual machine to crash.Hahna Latonick and Kevin Fujimoto (via Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-6972.extra: A local user can cause denial of service conditions on their virtual machine.

CVE-2018-6973.title: VMware Workstation and Fusion Memory Write Error Lets Local Users on a Guest System Gain Elevated Privileges on the Host System
CVE-2018-6973.body: A vulnerability was reported in VMware Workstation and Fusion. A local user on the guest system can gain elevated privileges on the host system.A local user on the guest system can exploit an out-of-bounds memory write error to execute arbitrary code and gain elevated privileges on the host system.Workstation and Fusion on the e1000 device are affected.Anonymous (via Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-6973.extra: A local user on the guest system can gain elevated privileges on the host system.

CVE-2018-6974.title: VMware Workstation/Fusion SVGA Out-of-Memory Read Error Lets Local Users on a Guest System Gain Elevated Privileges on the Host System
CVE-2018-6974.body: A vulnerability was reported in VMware Workstation/Fusion. A local user on the guest system can gain elevated privileges on the host system.A local user on the guest system can run a specially crafted application to read arbitrary memory from a SVGA device on the host system.Anonymous (via Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-6974.extra: A local user on the guest system can gain elevated privileges on the host system.

CVE-2018-6974.title: VMware ESXi SVGA Out-of-Memory Read Error Lets Local Users on a Guest System Gain Elevated Privileges on the Host System
CVE-2018-6974.body: A vulnerability was reported in VMware ESXi. A local user on the guest system can gain elevated privileges on the host system.A local user on the guest system can run a specially crafted application to read arbitrary memory from a SVGA device on the host system.Anonymous (via Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-6974.extra: A local user on the guest system can gain elevated privileges on the host system.

CVE-2018-7092.title: HPE Intelligent Management Center PLAT Directory Traversal Flaw Lets Remote Users Delete Files on the Target System
CVE-2018-7092.body: A vulnerability was reported in HPE Intelligent Management Center PLAT. A remote user can delete files on the target system.A remote user can exploit a directory traversal flaw to delete files on the target system.sztivi (via Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-7092.extra: A remote user can delete files on the target system.

CVE-2018-7108.title: HPE StorageWorks XP7 Automation Director Flaw Lets Remote Users Obtain Passwords on the Target System
CVE-2018-7108.body: A vulnerability was reported in HPE StorageWorks XP7 Automation Director. A remote user can obtain passwords on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted request to view passwords on the target system.This condition may occur when running a service template.[Editor's note: The vendor assigned CVSS metrics show no impact.]
CVE-2018-7108.extra: A remote user can obtain passwords on the target system.

CVE-2018-7114.title: HPE Intelligent Management Center Overflows Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges and Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2018-7114.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in HPE Intelligent Management Center. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can supply a specially crafted command to trigger a stack overflow and execute arbitrary commands on the target system with System privileges [CVE-2018-7114].A remote user can trigger a buffer overflow in 'dbman.exe' opcode 10001 and cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-7115].A remote user can trigger a buffer overflow in 'dbman.exe' opcode 10003 and cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-7116].sztivi (via Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative) and Chris Lyne of Tenable, Inc. reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-7114.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2018-7115.title: HPE Intelligent Management Center Overflows Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges and Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2018-7115.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in HPE Intelligent Management Center. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can supply a specially crafted command to trigger a stack overflow and execute arbitrary commands on the target system with System privileges [CVE-2018-7114].A remote user can trigger a buffer overflow in 'dbman.exe' opcode 10001 and cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-7115].A remote user can trigger a buffer overflow in 'dbman.exe' opcode 10003 and cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-7116].sztivi (via Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative) and Chris Lyne of Tenable, Inc. reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-7115.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2018-7116.title: HPE Intelligent Management Center Overflows Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges and Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2018-7116.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in HPE Intelligent Management Center. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can supply a specially crafted command to trigger a stack overflow and execute arbitrary commands on the target system with System privileges [CVE-2018-7114].A remote user can trigger a buffer overflow in 'dbman.exe' opcode 10001 and cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-7115].A remote user can trigger a buffer overflow in 'dbman.exe' opcode 10003 and cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-7116].sztivi (via Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative) and Chris Lyne of Tenable, Inc. reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-7116.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2018-7284.title: Asterisk Accept Header Processing Error in 'res_pjsip_pubsub' Lets Remote Users Cause the Target Service to Crash
CVE-2018-7284.body: A vulnerability was reported in Asterisk. A remote user can cause the target service to crash.A remote user can send a SUBSCRIBE request with specially crafted Accept headers to trigger a flaw in the 'res_pjsip_pubsub' module and cause the target service to crash. More than 32 Accept headers can trigger a crash.Sandro Gauci reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-7284.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to crash.

CVE-2018-7285.title: Asterisk Payload Negotiation Error Lets Remote Users Cause the Target Service to Crash
CVE-2018-7285.body: A vulnerability was reported in Asterisk. A remote user can cause the target service to crash.A remote user can send specially crafted RTP data during SDP negotiation to trigger a payload number error and cause the target service to crash.Sebastien Duthil reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-7285.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to crash.

CVE-2018-7542.title: Xen Local APIC Error Lets Local Users on a Guest System Cause Denial of Service Conditions on the Host System
CVE-2018-7542.body: A vulnerability was reported in Xen. A local user on the guest system can cause the hypervisor to crash.A local user on an x86 PVH guest system that is configured without local Advanced Programmable Interrupt Controllers (APICs) can trigger a null pointer error to cause the hypervisor to crash.x86 systems are affected.Ian Jackson of Citrix reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-7542.extra: A local user on the guest system can the hypervisor to crash.

CVE-2018-7584.title: QNAP Storage Devices PHP Buffer Error Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2018-7584.body: A vulnerability was reported in QNAP Storage Devices. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.
CVE-2018-7584.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2018-7600.title: Drupal Form API Flaw Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code on the Target System
CVE-2018-7600.body: A vulnerability was reported in Drupal. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a flaw in the processing of renderable arrays in the Form API and cause the target system to render the user-supplied data and execute arbitrary code on the target system.Multiple subsystems are affected.Demonstration exploit code is available at:https://github.com/a2u/CVE-2018-7600Jasper Mattsson reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-7600.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2018-7636.title: Palo Alto PAN-OS Input Validation Flaw in URL Filtering 'continue page' Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-7636.body: A vulnerability was reported in Palo Alto PAN-OS. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The URL Filtering 'continue page' and 'admin override page' does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Palo Alto PAN-OS interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Ayushman Dutta reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-7636.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Palo Alto PAN-OS interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the interface, or take actions on the interface acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-8011.title: Apache HTTPD Null Pointer Dereference in mod_md Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2018-8011.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apache HTTPD. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted requests to trigger a null pointer dereference in the mod_md challenge handler and cause the target child process to crash.Daniel Caminada reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-8011.extra: A remote user can cause the target child process to crash.

CVE-2018-8030.title: Apache Qpid Broker-J Maximum Message Size Processing Bug Lets Remote Users Cause the Target Service to Crash
CVE-2018-8030.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apache Qpid Broker-J. A remote user can cause the target service to crash.A remote user can publish a message with a size that is larger than the maximum message size limit to cause the target broker to crash.AMQP protocols 0-8, 0-9, and 0-91 are affected.The Qpid development team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-8030.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to crash.

CVE-2018-8038.title: Apache CXF Fediz XML DTD Processing Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2018-8038.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apache CXF Fediz. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote user can supply specially crafted XML DTD data via a Fediz plugin to cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote user can supply specially crafted XML DTD data via WS-Federation request parameters to cause denial of service conditions on the Apache CXF Fediz Identity Provider (IdP).
CVE-2018-8038.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2018-8043.title: Linux Kernel Null Pointer Dereference in unimac_mdio_probe() Lets Local Users Cause Denial of Service Conditions on the Target System
CVE-2018-8043.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Linux kernel. A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A local user can trigger a null pointer dereference in the unimac_mdio_probe() function in 'drivers/net/phy/mdio-bcm-unimac.c' to cause a kernel panic on the target system.
CVE-2018-8043.extra: A local user can cause a kernel panic on the target system.

CVE-2018-8045.title: Joomla! Input Validation Flaw in User Notes List View Lets Remote Authenticated Users Inject SQL Commands
CVE-2018-8045.body: A vulnerability was reported in Joomla!. A remote authenticated user can inject SQL commands.The the User Notes list view function does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote authenticated user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute SQL commands on the underlying database.The vendor was notified on March 8, 2018.Entropy Moe reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-8045.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.

CVE-2018-8110.title: Microsoft Edge Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code, Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information, and Bypass Security Restrictions on the Target System
CVE-2018-8110.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Edge. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can bypass security controls on the target system. A remote user can obtain files on the target system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error in the Chakra scripting engine and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-8227, CVE-2018-8229].The system does not properly mark files. A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will access file contents on the target user's system [CVE-2018-0871].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-8110, CVE-2018-8111, CVE-2018-8236].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error and obtain potentially sensitive information on the target user's system [CVE-2018-8234].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will bypass Same-Origin Policy (SOP) restrictions [CVE-2018-8235].Lokihardt of Google Project Zero, Ziyahan Albeniz of Netsparker, Marcin Towalski (@mtowalski1), Yunhai Zhang of NSFOCUS, Zhenhuan Li(@zenhumany) of Tencent Zhanlu Lab, Jake Archibald - Google - https://jakearchibald.com, Chakra working with Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative, and Yuki Chen of Qihoo 360 Vulcan Team reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-8110.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can bypass security controls on the target system.A remote user can obtain file contents on the target system.

CVE-2018-8111.title: Microsoft Edge Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code, Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information, and Bypass Security Restrictions on the Target System
CVE-2018-8111.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Edge. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can bypass security controls on the target system. A remote user can obtain files on the target system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error in the Chakra scripting engine and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-8227, CVE-2018-8229].The system does not properly mark files. A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will access file contents on the target user's system [CVE-2018-0871].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-8110, CVE-2018-8111, CVE-2018-8236].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error and obtain potentially sensitive information on the target user's system [CVE-2018-8234].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will bypass Same-Origin Policy (SOP) restrictions [CVE-2018-8235].Lokihardt of Google Project Zero, Ziyahan Albeniz of Netsparker, Marcin Towalski (@mtowalski1), Yunhai Zhang of NSFOCUS, Zhenhuan Li(@zenhumany) of Tencent Zhanlu Lab, Jake Archibald - Google - https://jakearchibald.com, Chakra working with Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative, and Yuki Chen of Qihoo 360 Vulcan Team reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-8111.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can bypass security controls on the target system.A remote user can obtain file contents on the target system.

CVE-2018-8114.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Flaws Let Remote Users Bypass UMCI Policy and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-8114.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Internet Explorer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can bypass security controls on the target system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-0955].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-8114, CVE-2018-8122]. This can be exploited via an embedded ActiveX control marked "safe for initialization" in an application or Microsoft Office document that hosts the Internet Explorer (IE) rendering engine. Version 11 is affected.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will bypass Device Guard User Mode Code Integrity (UMCI) policies on the target user's system [CVE-2018-8126]. Version 11 is affected.Matt Nelson (@enigma0x3) of SpecterOps and Yuki Chen of Qihoo 360 Vulcan Team reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-8114.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can bypass security controls on the target system.

CVE-2018-8115.title: Windows Host Compute Service Shim (hcsshim) Library Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-8115.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Windows Host Compute Service Shim (hcsshim) Library. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted container image file that, when imported (i.e., pulled) by the target authenticated administrator user, will trigger an input validation flaw in the Windows Host Compute Service Shim (hcsshim) library and cause a container management service that uses the library to execute arbitrary code on the target host system.Michael Hanselmann reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-8115.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2018-8122.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Flaws Let Remote Users Bypass UMCI Policy and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-8122.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Internet Explorer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can bypass security controls on the target system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-0955].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-8114, CVE-2018-8122]. This can be exploited via an embedded ActiveX control marked "safe for initialization" in an application or Microsoft Office document that hosts the Internet Explorer (IE) rendering engine. Version 11 is affected.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will bypass Device Guard User Mode Code Integrity (UMCI) policies on the target user's system [CVE-2018-8126]. Version 11 is affected.Matt Nelson (@enigma0x3) of SpecterOps and Yuki Chen of Qihoo 360 Vulcan Team reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-8122.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can bypass security controls on the target system.

CVE-2018-8123.title: Microsoft Edge Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code, Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information, and Bypass Security Restrictions on the Target System
CVE-2018-8123.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Edge. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can bypass security controls on the target system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-8128, CVE-2018-8137, CVE-2018-8139, CVE-2018-0945, CVE-2018-0946, CVE-2018-0951, CVE-2018-0953, CVE-2018-8123, CVE-2018-8178, CVE-2018-8179].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error in the Chakra scripting engine and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-8130, CVE-2018-8133, CVE-2018-0943].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error in the Chakra scripting engine and access potentially sensitive memory contents on the target user's system [CVE-2018-8145].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error and access potentially sensitive information on the target user's system [CVE-2018-1021, CVE-2018-1025].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-0954, CVE-2018-1022]. This can be exploited via and embeded ActiveX control marked as "safe for initialization" or via an application or Microsoft Office document that hosts the browser rendering engine.A remote user can bypass Same-Origin Policy (SOP) restrictions to cause the target user's browser to send potentially sensitive data [CVE-2018-8112].Lokihardt of Google Project Zero, Johnathan Norman, Windows & Devices Group - Operating System Security Team, Yuki Chen of Qihoo 360 Vulcan Team, Zhong Zhaochen of tophant.com, akayn (via Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative), RanchoIce of Tencent ZhanluLab (via Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative), Instructor of Tencent ZhanluLab, Danny__Wei of Tencent's Xuanwu Lab (via Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative), Aradnok, Richard Zhu (fluorescence) (via Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative), and Marcin Towalski (@mtowalski1) reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-8123.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can bypass security controls on the target system.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.

CVE-2018-8125.title: Microsoft Edge Multiple Object Memory Handling Errors Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Bypass Security Restrictions
CVE-2018-8125.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Edge. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can bypass security controls on the target system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-8262, CVE-2018-8274, CVE-2018-8275, CVE-2018-8279, CVE-2018-8301, CVE-2018-8125].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error in Chakra scripting engine and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-8280, CVE-2018-8286, CVE-2018-8290, CVE-2018-8294].A remote user can create a specially crafted ActiveX control marked "safe for initialization" in an application or Microsoft Office document that hosts the related rendering engine that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error in the JavaScript engine and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-8287, CVE-2018-8288, CVE-2018-8291].A remote user can bypass the Chakra scripting engine Control Flow Guard (CFG) [CVE-2018-8276].Omair (via KrashConsulting), Akayn (via Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative, Aradnok, Jihui Lu of Tencent KeenLab, Simon Zuckerbraun with Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative, Kai Kang (@4B5F5F4B), Lokihardt of Google Project Zero, Johnathan Norman - WDG OS Security Team, Alexandru Pitis of Microsoft Corporation, Debasish Mandal of the McAfee Labs HIPS R&D reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-8125.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can bypass security controls on the target system.

CVE-2018-8127.title: Windows Kernel Multiple Flaws Let Local Users Bypass Security Restictions, Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information, and Gain Elevated Privileges on the Target System
CVE-2018-8127.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in the Windows Kernel. A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system. A local user can bypass security restrictions.A local user can run a specially crafted application to exploit an object memory handling flaw in Windows Scripting Host and bypass Device Guard User Mode Code Integrity (UMCI) policy on the target system [CVE-2018-0854]. Versions 2016, 10, 10 Version 1607, 10 Version 1703, and 10 Version 1709 are affected.A local user can run a specially crafted application to exploit a policy validation flaw and bypass Device Guard User Mode Code Integrity (UMCI) policy on the target system [CVE-2018-0958]. Versions 2016, 10, 10 Version 1607, 10 Version 1703, 10 Version 1709, and 10 Version 1803 are affected.A local user can run a specially crafted application to exploit a policy validation flaw and bypass Device Guard User Mode Code Integrity (UMCI) policy on the target system [CVE-2018-8129, CVE-2018-8132].A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A local user can run a specially crafted application to exploit an object memory handling flaw in Win32k and execute arbitrary code on the target system with kernel-level privileges [CVE-2018-8120, CVE-2018-8124].A local user can run a specially crafted application to exploit an object memory handling flaw in the kernel and obtain potentially sensitive information [CVE-2018-8127, CVE-2018-8141].A local user can run a specially crafted application to exploit a permissions management flaw in the Windows Kernel API and impersonate processes and cross-process communications on the target system [CVE-2018-8134].A local user with a domain user account can create a specially crafted request to trigger an object memory handling flaw and execute arbitrary code with elevated permissions on the target system [CVE-2018-8136].A local user can run a specially crafted application to trigger an object memory handling flaw in the kernel and execute arbitrary code with kernel-level privileges on the target system [CVE-2018-8897A local user can run a specially crafted application to trigger an object memory handling flaw in the Windows kernel image and execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges on the target system [CVE-2018-8170].Matt Graeber of SpecterOps, Lee Christensen (@tifkin_) of SpecterOps, nyaacate of Viettel Cyber Security (via Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative), Andrei Vlad Lutas of Bitdefender, Rohit Mothe of Project Minus Storm Team, Intel Corp., Aaron Margosis of Microsoft, Alex Bass of Microsoft, James Forshaw of Google Project Zero, Kushal Arvind Shah of Fortinet's FortiGuard Labs, Nick Peterson, Everdox Tech LLC, Andy Lutomirski, Anton Cherepanov, Senior Malware Researcher of ESET, and Ken Johnson reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-8127.extra: A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can bypass security controls on the target system.

CVE-2018-8128.title: Microsoft Edge Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code, Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information, and Bypass Security Restrictions on the Target System
CVE-2018-8128.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Edge. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can bypass security controls on the target system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-8128, CVE-2018-8137, CVE-2018-8139, CVE-2018-0945, CVE-2018-0946, CVE-2018-0951, CVE-2018-0953, CVE-2018-8123, CVE-2018-8178, CVE-2018-8179].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error in the Chakra scripting engine and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-8130, CVE-2018-8133, CVE-2018-0943].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error in the Chakra scripting engine and access potentially sensitive memory contents on the target user's system [CVE-2018-8145].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error and access potentially sensitive information on the target user's system [CVE-2018-1021, CVE-2018-1025].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-0954, CVE-2018-1022]. This can be exploited via and embeded ActiveX control marked as "safe for initialization" or via an application or Microsoft Office document that hosts the browser rendering engine.A remote user can bypass Same-Origin Policy (SOP) restrictions to cause the target user's browser to send potentially sensitive data [CVE-2018-8112].Lokihardt of Google Project Zero, Johnathan Norman, Windows & Devices Group - Operating System Security Team, Yuki Chen of Qihoo 360 Vulcan Team, Zhong Zhaochen of tophant.com, akayn (via Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative), RanchoIce of Tencent ZhanluLab (via Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative), Instructor of Tencent ZhanluLab, Danny__Wei of Tencent's Xuanwu Lab (via Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative), Aradnok, Richard Zhu (fluorescence) (via Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative), and Marcin Towalski (@mtowalski1) reported these vulnerabilities.
