CVE-2018-8394.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft GDI+. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information from system memory.A remote user can create a specially crafted file or HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will access potentially sensitive information from system memory on the target system [CVE-2018-8394, CVE-2018-8396, CVE-2018-8398].A remote user can create a specially crafted web site that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-8397].Lin Wang of Beihang University (via Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative), Anonymous (via Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative), and Behzad Najjarpour Jabbari, Secunia Research at Flexera reported these vulnerabilities.

CVE-2018-8412.title: Microsoft AutoUpdate for Mac Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2018-8412.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Office Microsoft AutoUpdate (MAU). A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.The application does not properly validate updates before executing them. A local user can create a specially crafted executable in a specific location used by the MAU application to cause the application to execute arbitrary code on the target system with elevated privileges.CodeColorist from AntFinancial LightYear Security Lab reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-8412.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2018-8414.title: Windows Shell File Path Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-8414.body: A vulnerability was reported in Windows Shell. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a file path validation flaw and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Matt Nelson (@enigma0x3) of SpecterOps reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-8414.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2018-8415.title: Microsoft Windows Powershell Bugs Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges and Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-8415.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Powershell. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Powershell file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2018-8256].A local user can create a specially crafted Powershell files that, when loaded by the target user, will allow the user to execute unlogged code [CVE-2018-8415].Snyk Security Research Team and Amirreza Niakanlahiji (@DissectMalware) of University of North Carolina at Charlotte reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-8415.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2018-8421.title: Microsoft .NET Framework File Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-8421.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft .NET. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted document or application that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Soroush Dalili of NCC Group reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-8421.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2018-8423.title: Microsoft Jet File Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-8423.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Jet. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Microsoft JET Database Engine file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.Lucas Leong (@wmliang) (via Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative) and Steven Seeley (mr_me) of Source Incite reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-8423.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2018-8426.title: Microsoft SharePoint Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-8426.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft SharePoint. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Microsoft SharePoint software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Ashar Javed of Hyundai AutoEver Europe GmbH reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-8426.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Microsoft SharePoint software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-8427.title: Microsoft GDI+ Multiple Bugs Lets Local Users Gain Potentially Sensitive Information and Obtain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2018-8427.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft GDI+. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system. A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A local user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a flaw in the Microsoft Graphics Components and execute arbitrary commands on the target system with elevated privileges [CVE-2018-8432].A local user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling flaw in the DirectX Graphics Kernel (DXGKRNL) driver [CVE-2018-8484].A local user can run a specially crafted application to cause DirectX to disclose potentially sensitive information [CVE-2018-8486].A local user can run a specially crafted application to cause a Microsoft Graphics Components object memory handling error and disclose potentially sensitive information [CVE-2018-8427].A local user can run a specially crafted application to cause a Microsoft Graphics Components object memory handling error and disclose potentially sensitive information [CVE-2018-8472].Lin Wang of Beihang University, Communications Security Establishment, Ruibo Liu of Baidu XLab Tianya Team, Lin Wang of Beihang University, and Symeon Paraschoudis of Pen Test Partners LLP reported some of these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-8427.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2018-8429.title: Microsoft Office Excel File Processing Flaws Let Remote Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-8429.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Excel. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will access information previously deleted from the active worksheet on the target user's system [CVE-2018-8331].A remote user can create a specially crafted document file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-8429].Jaanus Kaap Clarified Security (via Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative) and Nicolas Joly of Microsoft Corporation reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-8429.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.

A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Microsoft SharePoint software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Ashar Javed of Hyundai AutoEver Europe GmbH reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-8431.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Microsoft SharePoint software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-8434.title: Microsoft Hyper-V Multiple Bugs Let Local Guest System Users Deny Service, Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information, and Cause the Host System to Crash
CVE-2018-8434.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Hyper-V. A local user on the guest system can gain elevated privileges on the host system. A local user on the guest system can cause denial of service conditions on the target system. A local user on the guest system can obtain potentially sensitive information.A local user on the guest system can run a specially crafted application to trigger an input validation error and execute arbitrary code on the target host system [CVE-2018-0965]. Versions 2016 and 10.x are affected.A local user on the guest system can run a specially crafted application to trigger an input validation error and execute arbitrary code on the target host system [CVE-2018-8439].A local user on the guest system can run a specially crafted application to trigger an input validation error and obtain potentially sensitive information from host system memory [CVE-2018-8434].A local user on a guest system can reboot the guest system multiple times until the Windows Hyper-V BIOS loader fails to provide a high-entropy source [CVE-2018-8435].A local privileged user on a guest operating system can send specially crafted data to trigger an error in the Microsoft Hyper-V Network Switch on the host system and cause the host system to crash [CVE-2018-8436, CVE-2018-8437, CVE-2018-8438].Giwan Go, Hyoung-Kee Choi in HIT Lab at Sungkyunkwan University, Niels Ferguson of Microsoft Corporation, Peter Hlavaty (@zer0mem), KeenLab at Tencent, Nick Freeman, and Daniel King (@long123king) of MSRC Microsoft reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-8434.extra: A local user on the guest system can cause denial of service conditions on the target host system.A local user on the guest system can gain elevated privileges on the target host system.A local user on the guest system can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target host system.

CVE-2018-8441.title: Windows Subsystem for Linux Integer Overflow Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2018-8441.body: A vulnerability was reported in Windows Subsystem for Linux. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can run a specially crafted application to trigger an integer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system with elevated privileges.Anthony LAOU HINE TSUEI of Tencent Keen Security Lab reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-8441.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2018-8442.title: Windows Kernel Multiple Flaws Let Local Users Deny Service, Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information, and Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2018-8442.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Windows Kernel. A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system. A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can exploit an object memory handling flaw in the Windows bowser.sys kernel-mode driver to obtain potentially sensitive information from system memory [CVE-2018-8271].A local user can run a specially crafted application to exploit an object memory handling error in the kernel and obtain potentially sensitive information [CVE-2018-8336, CVE-2018-8442, CVE-2018-8443, CVE-2018-8445, CVE-2018-8446].The kernel fails to properly initialize a memory address. A local user can run a specially crafted application to obtain potentially sensitive information [CVE-2018-8419].A local user can run a specially crafted application to exploit a flaw in the Windows Kernel API to gain elevated privileges on the target system [CVE-2018-8410].A local user can run a specially crafted application to exploit an object memory handling flaw and execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges on the target system [CVE-2018-8455].Ruibo Liu of Baidu X-Lab Tianya Team, Amichai Shulman Tal Be'ery, Haikuo Xie of Baidu Security Lab (via Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative), James Forshaw of Google Project Zero, Mauro Leggieri of TRAPMINE Inc., Tanghui Chen of Baidu X-Lab Tianya Team, and Alex Ionescu, CrowdStrike Inc. reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-8442.extra: A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2018-8447.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-8447.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Internet Explorer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-8461]. Version 11 is affected.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-8447].The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2018-8470]. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from any site that is open on the target user's Microsoft Internet Explorer software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.ca0nguyen (via Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative), Anonymous (via Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative), and Masato Kinugawa of Cure53 reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-8447.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Microsoft Internet Explorer software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-8448.title: Microsoft Exchange Server Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2018-8448.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Exchange. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user and with actions performed by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2018-8265].A remote user can create a specially crafted Microsoft Exchange Outlook Web Access (OWA) web request to conduct script and content inject attacks to view potentially sensitive information on the target user's system [CVE-2018-8448].Sabri Haddouche of Wire Swiss GmbH and Adrian Ivascu reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-8448.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.

CVE-2018-8452.title: Microsoft Edge Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code, Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information, Gain Elevated Privileges, and Spoof Content on the Target System
CVE-2018-8452.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Edge. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system. A remote user can spoof servers.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error in the Chakra scripting engine and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-8367, CVE-2018-8456, CVE-2018-8459, CVE-2018-8465, CVE-2018-8466, CVE-2018-8467].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-8354].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will read privileged data across trust boundaries [CVE-2018-8315].A remote user can create specially crafted HTML content that, when loaded by the target user, will spoof a target web site [CVE-2018-8425].The Microsoft Edge Fetch API does not properly handle a filtered response type. A remote user can access potentially sensitive information from a different origin as URL parameters [CVE-2018-8366].A remote user can exploit a separate vulnerability and then escape from the AppContainer sandbox in the browser [CVE-2018-8469, CVE-2018-8463].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error and access potentially sensitive information on the target user's system [CVE-2018-8452].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-8457]. This can also be exploited via an embedded ActiveX control marked "safe for initialization" in an application or via a Microsoft Office document that hosts the scripting rendering engine.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error in the Microsoft Edge PDF Reader and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-8464].Yuki Chen of Qihoo 360 Vulcan Team, Qixun Zhao of Qihoo 360 Vulcan Team, Anonymous (via Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative), Jonathan Birch of Microsoft Corporation, Michael Holman, Microsoft Chakra Core Team, Jun Kokatsu, Windows & Devices Group - Operating System Security Team, James Lee @Windowsrcer of Kryptos Logic, Yu Zhou of Ant-financial Light-Year Security Lab, Lokihardt of Google Project Zero, and Omri Herscovici of Check Point reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-8452.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A remote user can spoof content.

CVE-2018-8454.title: Windows Audio Service Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2018-8454.body: A vulnerability was reported in Windows Audio Service. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can trigger a flaw in the 'browser.sys' kernel-mode driver's handling of object memory and obtain potentially sensitive information about the state of the kernel.Alex Ionescu, CrowdStrike Inc., reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-8454.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

This can also be exploited via an embedded ActiveX control marked "safe for initialization" in an application or via a Microsoft Office document that hosts the scripting rendering engine.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error in the Microsoft Edge PDF Reader and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-8464].Yuki Chen of Qihoo 360 Vulcan Team, Qixun Zhao of Qihoo 360 Vulcan Team, Anonymous (via Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative), Jonathan Birch of Microsoft Corporation, Michael Holman, Microsoft Chakra Core Team, Jun Kokatsu, Windows & Devices Group - Operating System Security Team, James Lee @Windowsrcer of Kryptos Logic, Yu Zhou of Ant-financial Light-Year Security Lab, Lokihardt of Google Project Zero, and Omri Herscovici of Check Point reported these vulnerabilities.

CVE-2018-8460.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Ojbect Memory Handling Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-8460.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Internet Explorer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-8460, CVE-2018-8491].Anonymous (via Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative), Lucas Pinheiro - Windows & Devices Group - Operating System Security Team, and Simon Zuckerbraun of the Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative reported these vulnerabilities.

CVE-2018-8461.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-8461.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Internet Explorer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-8461]. Version 11 is affected.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-8447].The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2018-8470]. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from any site that is open on the target user's Microsoft Internet Explorer software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.ca0nguyen (via Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative), Anonymous (via Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative), and Masato Kinugawa of Cure53 reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-8461.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Microsoft Internet Explorer software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-8472.title: Microsoft GDI+ Multiple Bugs Lets Local Users Gain Potentially Sensitive Information and Obtain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2018-8472.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft GDI+. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system. A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A local user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a flaw in the Microsoft Graphics Components and execute arbitrary commands on the target system with elevated privileges [CVE-2018-8432].A local user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling flaw in the DirectX Graphics Kernel (DXGKRNL) driver [CVE-2018-8484].A local user can run a specially crafted application to cause DirectX to disclose potentially sensitive information [CVE-2018-8486].A local user can run a specially crafted application to cause a Microsoft Graphics Components object memory handling error and disclose potentially sensitive information [CVE-2018-8427].A local user can run a specially crafted application to cause a Microsoft Graphics Components object memory handling error and disclose potentially sensitive information [CVE-2018-8472].Lin Wang of Beihang University, Communications Security Establishment, Ruibo Liu of Baidu XLab Tianya Team, Lin Wang of Beihang University, and Symeon Paraschoudis of Pen Test Partners LLP reported some of these vulnerabilities.

CVE-2018-8474.title: Microsoft Lync for Mac Lets Remote Users Bypass Security Restrictions and Download Files to the Target System
CVE-2018-8474.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Lync. A remote user can bypass security controls on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted message to the target user to bypass security controls and cause file types that are listed on the target user's safe file type list to be downloaded to the target user's system.Paul Burkeland of TrustedSec reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-8474.extra: A remote user can bypass security controls and cause files to be downloaded to the target user's system.

CVE-2018-8476.title: Windows Deployment Services TFTP File Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-8476.body: A vulnerability was reported in Windows Deployment Services. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Omer Gull of Checkpoint Software Technologies reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-8476.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2018-8480.title: Microsoft SharePoint Input Validation Flaws Let Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-8480.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft SharePoint. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Microsoft SharePoint software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Ashar Javed of Hyundai AutoEver Europe GmbH reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-8480.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Microsoft SharePoint software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-8509.title: Microsoft Edge Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Obtain Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks on the Target System
CVE-2018-8509.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Edge. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-8473, CVE-2018-8509].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object memory handling error in the Chakra scripting engine and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-8503, CVE-2018-8505, CVE-2018-8510, CVE-2018-8511, CVE-2018-8513].A remote user can create a specially crafted document that, when processed by the Edge Content Security Policy, will bypass the CSP [CVE-2018-8512].A remote user can create a specially crafted document that, when loaded, will bypass Same-Origin Policy (SOP) restrictions and allow requests that should otherwise be ignored [CVE-2018-8530Qixun Zhao of Qihoo 360 Vulcan Team, Lokihardt of Google Project Zero, Lucas Pinheiro - Windows & Devices Group - Operating System Security Team, and Richard Shupak reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-8509.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Microsoft Edge software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-8518.title: Microsoft SharePoint Input Validation Flaws Let Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-8518.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft SharePoint. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Microsoft SharePoint software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Ashar Javed of Hyundai AutoEver Europe GmbH reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-8518.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Microsoft SharePoint software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-8541.title: Microsoft Edge Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Obtain Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks on the Target System
CVE-2018-8541.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Edge. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error in Chakra and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-8541, CVE-2018-8542, CVE-2018-8543, CVE-2018-8551, CVE-2018-8555, CVE-2018-8556, CVE-2018-8557, CVE-2018-8588].A remote user can host content from one domain and then inject it into another domain [CVE-2018-8567].Qixun Zhao of Qihoo 360 Vulcan Team, Jonathan Jacobi (@j0nathanj) of MSRC-IL, Microsoft Chakra Core Team, Anonymous (via iDefense Labs), and dannywei of Tencent Security Xuanwu Lab reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-8541.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Microsoft Edge software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-8544.title: Windows VBScript Engine File Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2018-8544.body: A vulnerability was reported in Windows VBScript Engine. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.This can also be exploited via an ActiveX control marked as "safe for initialization" in an application or via Microsoft Office document that hosts the Internet Explorer rendering engine.Anonymous (via Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative), Ivan Fratric of Google Project Zero, and Yuki Chen of Qihoo 360 Vulcan Team reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-8544.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2018-8741.title: SquirrelMail Input Validation Flaw in 'Deliver.class.php' Lets Remote Authenticated Users View Files on the Target System
CVE-2018-8741.body: A vulnerability was reported in SquirrelMail. A remote authenticated user can obtain files on the target system.A remote authenticated user can upload a file with a specially crafted filename containing directory traversal characters (e.g., '../') to trigger an input validation flaw in 'Deliver.class.php' cause the system to attach arbitrary files to an email message with the privileges of the target PHP process.This can also be exploited to delete arbitrary files with the privileges of the target PHP process.The original advisory is available at:https://insinuator.net/2018/03/squirrelmail-full-disclosure-troopers18/Florian Grunow from ERNW reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-8741.extra: A remote authenticated user can obtain or delete files on the target system with the privileges of the target PHP process.

CVE-2018-8779.title: Apple macOS/OS X Multiple Remote Code Execution, Denial of Service, and Information Disclosure Attacks and Local Privilege Escalation Attacks
CVE-2018-8779.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Apple macOS/OS X. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system. A local user can gain system privileges on the target system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A remote attacker may be able to attack AFP servers through HTTP clients [CVE-2018-4295].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the AppleGraphicsControl component to execute arbitrary code with system privileges [CVE-2018-4410].An application can trigger a input validation flaw in the AppleGraphicsControl component to read restricted memory [CVE-2018-4417].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the ATS component to gain elevated privileges [CVE-2018-4411].An application can trigger a read-only memory flaw in the ATS component to read restricted memory [CVE-2018-4308].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the CFNetwork component to execute arbitrary code with system privileges [CVE-2018-4126].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the CoreAnimation component to execute arbitrary code with system privileges [CVE-2018-4415].A local user can trigger a weakness in the Miller-Rabin primality test to identify prime numbers [CVE-2018-4398].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the CoreFoundation component to gain elevated privileges [CVE-2018-4412].A remote user can replace the message content from the print server with arbitrary content [CVE-2018-4153].A remote user in a privileged network position can conduct denial of service attacks using the CUPS protocol [CVE-2018-4406].A remote user can trigger a input validation flaw in the Dictionary component to disclose user information [CVE-2018-4346].An application can trigger a restricted file flaw in the Dock component [CVE-2018-4403].A malicious application may be able to trigger a logic error in the dyld component to gain elevate privileges [CVE-2018-4423].An application on EFI systems cannot read access via a speculative side-channel analysis [CVE-2018-3639].A local user can trigger a modification error in the EFI component [CVE-2018-4342].A remote user can trigger an access control flaw in the Foundation component to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-4304].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the Grand Central Dispatch component to execute arbitrary code with system privileges [CVE-2018-4426].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the Heimdal component to execute arbitrary code with system privileges [CVE-2018-4331].A local user can exploit a flaw in the L1 data cache at the virtual machine entry to determine guest OS privilege [CVE-2018-3646].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the Hypervisor component to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges [CVE-2018-4242].A remote user can trigger a memory corruption error in the ICU component to trigger heap corruption [CVE-2018-4394].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the Intel Graphics Driver component to execute arbitrary code with system privileges [CVE-2018-4334].An application can trigger a input validation flaw in the Intel Graphics Driver component to read restricted memory [CVE-2018-4396, CVE-2018-4418].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the Intel Graphics Driver component to execute arbitrary code with system privileges [CVE-2018-4350].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the IOGraphics component to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges [CVE-2018-4422].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the IOHIDFamily component to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges [CVE-2018-4408].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the IOKit component to execute arbitrary code with system privileges [CVE-2018-4402].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the IOKit component [CVE-2018-4341, CVE-2018-4354].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the IOUserEthernet component to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges [CVE-2018-4401].An application can trigger an out-of-bounds access control flaw in the IPSec component to gain elevated privileges [CVE-2018-4371].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the the kernel component to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges [CVE-2018-4420].An application can trigger an access control error in the kernel component with privileged API calls [CVE-2018-4399].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the the kernel component to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges [CVE-2018-4340, CVE-2018-4419, CVE-2018-4425].A remote user can trigger a memory corruption error in the the kernel component to execute arbitrary code [CVE-2018-4259, CVE-2018-4286, CVE-2018-4287, CVE-2018-4288, CVE-2018-4291].An application can trigger a memory handling error in the the kernel component to read restricted memory [CVE-2018-4413].An attacker is a privileged network position can trigger a memory corruption error in the the kernel component [CVE-2018-4407].An application can trigger a buffer overflow in the the kernel component to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges [CVE-2018-4424].A local user can trigger a flaw in the Login Window component to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-4348].A remote user can process a specially crafted email message to lead to user interface spoofing [CVE-2018-4389].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the mDNSOffloadUserClient component to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges [CVE-2018-4326].An application can trigger a flaw in the MediaRemote component to bypass sandbox restrictions [CVE-2018-4310].A local user can trigger an error in the Microcode component to gain speculative execution side-channel analysis [CVE-2018-3640].A remote user can connect to a VPN server to cause DNS queries to be leaked to a DNS proxy [CVE-2018-4369].A remote user can trigger a S/MIME flaw in the Security component to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-4400].A local user can trigger a flaw in the Security component to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-4395].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the Spotlight component to execute arbitrary code with system privileges [CVE-2018-4393].An application can trigger an access control flaw in the Symptom Framework component to read restricted memory [CVE-2018-4203].A wireless user in a privileged network position can trigger a flaw in the WiFi component to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-4368].Baris Kasikci, Daniel Genkin, Ofir Weisse, and Thomas F. Wenisch of University of Michigan, Mark Silberstein and Marina Minkin of Technion, Raoul Strackx, Jo Van Bulck, and Frank Piessens of KU Leuven, Rodrigo Branco, Henrique Kawakami, Ke Sun, and Kekai Hu CVE-2018-8779.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can obtain system privileges on the target system.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.

CVE-2018-8780.title: Apple macOS/OS X Multiple Remote Code Execution, Denial of Service, and Information Disclosure Attacks and Local Privilege Escalation Attacks
CVE-2018-8780.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Apple macOS/OS X. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system. A local user can gain system privileges on the target system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A remote attacker may be able to attack AFP servers through HTTP clients [CVE-2018-4295].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the AppleGraphicsControl component to execute arbitrary code with system privileges [CVE-2018-4410].An application can trigger a input validation flaw in the AppleGraphicsControl component to read restricted memory [CVE-2018-4417].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the ATS component to gain elevated privileges [CVE-2018-4411].An application can trigger a read-only memory flaw in the ATS component to read restricted memory [CVE-2018-4308].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the CFNetwork component to execute arbitrary code with system privileges [CVE-2018-4126].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the CoreAnimation component to execute arbitrary code with system privileges [CVE-2018-4415].A local user can trigger a weakness in the Miller-Rabin primality test to identify prime numbers [CVE-2018-4398].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the CoreFoundation component to gain elevated privileges [CVE-2018-4412].A remote user can replace the message content from the print server with arbitrary content [CVE-2018-4153].A remote user in a privileged network position can conduct denial of service attacks using the CUPS protocol [CVE-2018-4406].A remote user can trigger a input validation flaw in the Dictionary component to disclose user information [CVE-2018-4346].An application can trigger a restricted file flaw in the Dock component [CVE-2018-4403].A malicious application may be able to trigger a logic error in the dyld component to gain elevate privileges [CVE-2018-4423].An application on EFI systems cannot read access via a speculative side-channel analysis [CVE-2018-3639].A local user can trigger a modification error in the EFI component [CVE-2018-4342].A remote user can trigger an access control flaw in the Foundation component to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-4304].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the Grand Central Dispatch component to execute arbitrary code with system privileges [CVE-2018-4426].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the Heimdal component to execute arbitrary code with system privileges [CVE-2018-4331].A local user can exploit a flaw in the L1 data cache at the virtual machine entry to determine guest OS privilege [CVE-2018-3646].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the Hypervisor component to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges [CVE-2018-4242].A remote user can trigger a memory corruption error in the ICU component to trigger heap corruption [CVE-2018-4394].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the Intel Graphics Driver component to execute arbitrary code with system privileges [CVE-2018-4334].An application can trigger a input validation flaw in the Intel Graphics Driver component to read restricted memory [CVE-2018-4396, CVE-2018-4418].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the Intel Graphics Driver component to execute arbitrary code with system privileges [CVE-2018-4350].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the IOGraphics component to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges [CVE-2018-4422].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the IOHIDFamily component to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges [CVE-2018-4408].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the IOKit component to execute arbitrary code with system privileges [CVE-2018-4402].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the IOKit component [CVE-2018-4341, CVE-2018-4354].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the IOUserEthernet component to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges [CVE-2018-4401].An application can trigger an out-of-bounds access control flaw in the IPSec component to gain elevated privileges [CVE-2018-4371].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the the kernel component to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges [CVE-2018-4420].An application can trigger an access control error in the kernel component with privileged API calls [CVE-2018-4399].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the the kernel component to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges [CVE-2018-4340, CVE-2018-4419, CVE-2018-4425].A remote user can trigger a memory corruption error in the the kernel component to execute arbitrary code [CVE-2018-4259, CVE-2018-4286, CVE-2018-4287, CVE-2018-4288, CVE-2018-4291].An application can trigger a memory handling error in the the kernel component to read restricted memory [CVE-2018-4413].An attacker is a privileged network position can trigger a memory corruption error in the the kernel component [CVE-2018-4407].An application can trigger a buffer overflow in the the kernel component to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges [CVE-2018-4424].A local user can trigger a flaw in the Login Window component to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-4348].A remote user can process a specially crafted email message to lead to user interface spoofing [CVE-2018-4389].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the mDNSOffloadUserClient component to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges [CVE-2018-4326].An application can trigger a flaw in the MediaRemote component to bypass sandbox restrictions [CVE-2018-4310].A local user can trigger an error in the Microcode component to gain speculative execution side-channel analysis [CVE-2018-3640].A remote user can connect to a VPN server to cause DNS queries to be leaked to a DNS proxy [CVE-2018-4369].A remote user can trigger a S/MIME flaw in the Security component to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-4400].A local user can trigger a flaw in the Security component to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-4395].An application can trigger a memory corruption error in the Spotlight component to execute arbitrary code with system privileges [CVE-2018-4393].An application can trigger an access control flaw in the Symptom Framework component to read restricted memory [CVE-2018-4203].A wireless user in a privileged network position can trigger a flaw in the WiFi component to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2018-4368].Baris Kasikci, CVE-2018-8953.title: CA Workload Control Center Flaw in Apache MyFaces Component Lets Remote Authenticated Users Execute Arbitrary Code on the Target System
CVE-2018-8953.body: A vulnerability was reported in CA Workload Control Center. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote authenticated user can trigger a flaw in the Apache MyFaces component to execute arbitrary code on the target system.The vulnerability resides in the Apache MyFaces component.Hamed Merati and Kacper Nowak from Sense of Security Labs reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-8953.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2018-8954.title: CA Workload Control Center Flaw in Apache MyFaces Component Lets Remote Authenticated Users Execute Arbitrary Code on the Target System
CVE-2018-8954.body: A vulnerability was reported in CA Workload Control Center. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote authenticated user can trigger a flaw in the Apache MyFaces component to execute arbitrary code on the target system.The vulnerability resides in the Apache MyFaces component.Hamed Merati and Kacper Nowak from Sense of Security Labs reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-8954.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2018-9185.title: Fortinet FortiGate/FortiOS SSL-VPN Web Portal Bookmark Feature Lets Local Users View Passwords
CVE-2018-9185.body: A vulnerability was reported in Fortinet FortiGate/FortiOS. A local user can obtain passwords on the target system.When a user bookmarks a page in the SSL-VPN portal that uses single sign-on (SSO), the web portal returns the target user's login and password in plain text in a javascript file. A local user on the target user's system can obtain the password.Stephan Neidhardt - link protect GmbH reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-9185.extra: A local user on the target user's system can obtain the target user's password in certain cases.

CVE-2018-9242.title: Palo Alto PAN-OS Management Interface Parameter Processing Bug Lets Remote Authenticated Users Delete Files on the Target System
CVE-2018-9242.body: A vulnerability was reported in Palo Alto PAN-OS. A remote authenticated user can delete files on the target system.A remote authenticated user can supply specially crafted request parameters to exploit a flaw in the Management interface and delete files on the target system.Xinming Nie with Aisinfo-Sec reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-9242.extra: A remote authenticated user can delete files on the target system.

CVE-2018-9334.title: Palo Alto PAN-OS Flaw Lets Remote Authenticated Users View Hashed Passwords on the Target System
CVE-2018-9334.body: A vulnerability was reported in Palo Alto PAN-OS. A remote authenticated user can obtain hashed passwords on the target system.A remote authenticated administrator user can modify HTML markup on the management web interface to obtain GlobalProtect password hashes of local users.Bill Chaison from GCI Inc. reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-9334.extra: A remote authenticated administrator user can obtain hashed passwords on the target system.

CVE-2018-9335.title: Palo Alto PAN-OS Input Validation Flaw in Session Browser Lets Remote Authenticated Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-9335.body: A vulnerability was reported in Palo Alto PAN-OS. A remote authenticated user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The web-based management interface does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote authenticated user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Palo Alto PAN-OS interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The PAN-OS session browser is affected.Davide 'Peru' Peruzzi - GoSecure! reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-9335.extra: A remote authenticated user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Palo Alto PAN-OS interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the interface, or take actions on the interface acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-9337.title: Palo Alto PAN-OS Input Validation Flaw in Administration Page Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2018-9337.body: A vulnerability was reported in Palo Alto PAN-OS. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The web-based management interface does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote authenticated user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Palo Alto PAN-OS interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A PAN-OS web interface administration page is affected.Davide 'Peru' Peruzzi - GoSecure! reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-9337.extra: A remote authenticated user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Palo Alto PAN-OS interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the interface, or take actions on the interface acting as the target user.

CVE-2018-9427.title: Google Android Multiple Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Let Applications Gain Elevated Privileges and Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2018-9427.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Google Android. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. An application can gain elevated privileges. An application can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.An application can exploit flaws in the Framework to bypass user interaction requirements to gain elevated privileges on the target system [CVE-2018-9438, CVE-2018-9445, CVE-2018-9451, CVE-2018-9458].An application can exploit flaws in the System component to bypass user interaction requirements to gain elevated privileges on the target system [CVE-2018-9436, CVE-2018-9446, CVE-2018-9448, CVE-2018-9450, CVE-2018-9453, CVE-2018-9454, CVE-2018-9455, CVE-2018-9459].An application can exploit flaws in the Kernel component to bypass user interaction requirements to gain elevated privileges on the target system [CVE-2017-18249, CVE-2018-9465].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a flaw in the Media framework and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2018-9427, CVE-2018-9437, CVE-2018-9444].A remote user can exploit flaws in Several Qualcomm components to view potentially sensitive information on the target system [CVE-2017-13077, CVE-2017-18281, CVE-2018-11260, CVE-2018-5383].Several Qualcomm closed-source components are affected by other vulnerabilities [CVE-2017-18280, CVE-2017-18282, CVE-2017-18283, CVE-2017-18292, CVE-2017-18293, CVE-2017-18294, CVE-2017-18295, CVE-2017-18296, CVE-2017-18297, CVE-2017-18298, CVE-2017-18299, CVE-2017-18300, CVE-2017-18301, CVE-2017-18302, CVE-2017-18303, CVE-2017-18304, CVE-2017-18305, CVE-2017-18308, CVE-2017-18309, CVE-2017-18310, CVE-2018-11258, CVE-2018-11305].
CVE-2018-9427.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.An application can gain elevated privileges on the target system.An application can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.

CVE-2018-9489.title: Google Android Local WiFi Broadcasts Let Local Users Access Identifying Data on the Target System
CVE-2018-9489.body: A vulnerability was reported in Google Android. A local user can access identifying data on the target system.A local application can monitor NETWORK_STATE_CHANGED_ACTION and WIFI_P2P_THIS_DEVICE_CHANGED_ACTION system WiFi broadcasts to obtain identifying data on the target system, including network names, BSSIDs, local addresses, and DNS server addresses.The vendor has assigned Android bug ID number A-77286245 to this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:https://wwws.nightwatchcybersecurity.com/2018/08/29/sensitive-data-exposure-via-wifi-broadcasts-in-android-os-cve-2018-9489/Yakov Shafranovich reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-9489.extra: A local user can obtain identifying data on the target system.

CVE-2018-9842.title: CyberArk Password Vault Flaw Logon Response Lets Remote Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information from System Memory on the Target System
CVE-2018-9842.body: A vulnerability was reported in CyberArk Password Vault. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted Logon request to cause the target service to return a response containing 49 bytes of potentially sensitive information from system memory on the target system.The vendor was notified on February 5, 2018.The original advisory is available at:https://www.redteam-pentesting.de/advisories/rt-sa-2017-015RedTeam Pentesting GmbH reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2018-9842.extra: A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information from memory on the target system.

CVE-2018-9997.title: Open-Xchange App Suite Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks and Remote Authenticated Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2018-9997.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Open-Xchange App Suite. A remote authenticated user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted XML external entity data to determine if specified files exist on the target system or to cause the target system to connect to other hosts.A remote authenticated user can trigger an error when requesting task folders to cause the target system to disclose the name of 'foreign' folders belonging to other users in the same context [CVE-2018-9998].The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2018-9997]. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Open-Xchange software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Script gadgets are affected. HTML files, mail, and contacts are affected. HTML mail and other HTML attachments are affected. Certain content-types are affected.Michael Reizelman, Secator, and Antonio (rceman) reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2018-9997.extra: A remote authenticated user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Open-Xchange software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
